story:
THE NEED

I need to acquire and renovate a travel trailer to help me provide quality mobile mental health care services to those children, adolescents, and families who are in need. Moreover, I want to create a space that maintains the same privacy, warm, and professionalism that would be fostered in a traditional therapy setting. I seek a mobile commercial space to create Houston’s first-ever mobile therapy office dedicated to children, adolescent, and families in the lower-income areas of Houston and the surrounding rural areas. Having a mobile office space will enable me to provide mental health education and awareness to these communities, i.e. literature and free screening for depression, suicidality, stress, and anxiety, parent education, etc. When everything in the community feels chaotic and unsafe, I want the healing arts office to create a safe space to learn, evolve, and love.

ALLOCATION OF MONEY

To create this space, I will need to acquire a previously owned travel trailer (for renovation that will require painting, new flooring, and removal of any sleeping space), art supplies, storage space for therapeutic board games and toys, furnishings, printer, and other basic office materials. This is where the funds from our Kickstarter will come into play. Your support will allow us working capital to acquire a used travel trailer to renovate and create a unique mobile office space for Metamorphosis Behavioral Support & Psychotherapy to deliver mental health services. The working capital will also allow us the ability to hire the necessary professionals to ensure that the children and adolescents are in a safe space. These include contractors, plumbers, electricians, painters, etc. as well as completing the required inspection, licensing fees and city permits.  

THE VISION

Our vision for the healing arts mobile office is “to make families whole”. This means that we provide services to that ensure that parents feel confident and empowered, when balancing their work-life isn’t so easy. Moreover, we are committed to our children and adolescents who struggle with bullying, poor self-esteem, stress, anxiety, etc. We strive to fill in the gaps of quality mental health care.

How You Can Help My Campaign Goal to raise a minimum of $8,500.

•  Choose your pledge amount, and provide information requested.

• You’ll be sent something special for your pledge.

• Share this campaign with friends, family, colleagues, or just people who love other people (or not, but just share!)

Thank you in advance for your support!

Ase

CHALLENGES AND RISKS

This campaign needs your support to get the mobile office open and serving communities. The greatest challenge is not having the funding to acquire a reliable mobile unit that does not require major repairs. At any rate, I will use my tenacity and ability to connect with others to move pass the barriers. 

When you back this project, you'll be providing a vessel in which the practice of healing art can be accessible to children, adolescents, and families in poor communities and/or rural areas near Houston, Texas.

The best part is you'll also be able to give the gift of mental health awareness to yourself and others who travel the bumpy road of parenting children with mental illness and/or behavioral problems.

story:
Your Personal Relaxation Revolution

 

Transforming  the energy of any room through light, smell and humidity, Zoe instantly personalizes a room into your own oasis. Sleek design lines and high-quality wood, glass and ceramic make for a product that is not only stunning to look at, but contains industry leading technology and function to make Zoe the must have addition to any home.

 

PRESS

 

 Italian design meets french essential oil craftsmanship

 

Designed to improve and enhance mood, air quality and more indoors, Pilgrim’s Zoè is innovative aroma diffusing light changing the way you relax and detox in your home or office. Zoe includes three bottles of French-made, high-quality essential oil to address stress, sleeping habits and energy boosting.

Zoè works with all organic oils on the market.

Three Made in France 100% organic pure essential oils included for three different home settings:

Fresh +:  Ultra-refreshing blend thanks to a sweet citrus aroma. Made of organic Lemongrass, Basil, Lemon, Rosewood and Bergamot essential oils.

Zen at home: A sweet and sensual fragrance that will generate a Zen atmosphere in your home. A blend of three oils:  Ylang-ylang, Litsée and Sweet Orange.

Deep breath: An essential oil blend of 100% organic oils: Eucalyptus Globulus, Scots pine, Niaouli, Thyme borneol, Lavender and Rosemary cineole

 

 

How it works

 

 

 

 

 

Benefits of Aromatherapy

 

According to the University of Maryland Medical Center, aromatherapy has been used to address a myriad of mental and health ailments with overwhelming success for over 3,000 years. Studies have shown that aroma and light therapy can help users dealing with alopecia, agitation, anxiety and depression, insomnia, gastrointestinal issues, cold and sinus infections, pain from rheumatoid arthritis to headaches and more.

 

Early Tester Product Reviews

Cool look, great quality

I love that Zoe looks nothing like other relaxation devices I have tried. With the oak wooden base and the opaque glass I am actually proud to display it in my living room.

Anne-Sofie, Copenhaguen Denmark

 

Great work, Pilgrim!

I always prefer supporting start-ups rather than big corporations. These guys hit it perfectly, right out of the gate. Cool design, great functionality. The whole product works amazingly. I am curious to see what comes next from the Pilgrim Collection.

Robert, New York

 

I'm obsessed with the new Zoe mood enhancer from Pilgrim! Kudos to the designer!

Andrea, Chicago

 

I was really worried trying this from online without having seen it in real-life. But it’s GREAT QUALITY! It’s just soooo pretty! I can’t wait to show my friends.

Marcela, Los Angeles

 

I’ve never used this type of product before, but this winter season I really needed something different to keep winter blues away. It arrived quickly and works like a charm. I LOVE the wooden base, which is Italian designed, like me.

Mattia, Milan

 

After a long day in a hectic city, it has become a new ritual to sit with Zoe, read, meditate and generally shed the stresses of the day. Truly a transformative addition to my apartment.  

Sam, Hong Kong

 

Options

 

What We Need & What You Get

By offering Zoè on Indiegogo we are able to cut out the middleman and bring this revolutionary product to you at an affordable price. By backing Zoè,  you’re joining our journey to make a positive impact on people’s lives through the power of aroma, light and humidity therapy. We can’t wait for you to give it a try!

 

Perks

Timeline

Risks

Even though Zoe is still a working prototype, we have run hundreds of tests (aging test, using tests, reliability, production capability at all our spare part suppliers) and Zoe have been proven to be a huge success by numerous early testers.

On top of that, you can trust us to be able to produce your Zoe based on our three years experience in aromatherapy and our manufacturing experience with more than 100,000 products around the world.

By purchasing on Indiegogo you can refund your order until 10 days after your payment went through.

 

Zoè - The achievement of an intense personal journey for two young entrepreneurs

 

Developing Zoe was a personal journey for our team. A three year period saw us turn from European University Students trying to navigate a new life in Asia, to business owners who have overseen high quality home appliance products finding their way into the homes of people all over the world. It has not been an easy road, learning important lessons the hard way. However overcoming challenges and throwing ourselves into the task at hand has given us an untold amount of satisfaction and ultimately got us to where we are today.

 

Zoe was born and brought to you out of every experience we faced along the way.  On our journey, we have been able to make Zoè for ourselves and more important, for you!



 

Zoè Product Features

 

Technology meets high-quality design.  Zoè is made from organic oak hardwood.  The handmade Italian ceramic and glass, 500 mL (17 ounces) of water BPA (bisphenol A)-free plastic water tank, one of the largest on the market, combines the best components for you and your environment.

Adjust from anywhere. The remote control with timer functionality, meditation light and dimmer combination, intelligent mist level controls and alternative mist mode allows users to customize settings from anywhere in the room.

Fit for Any Space: Ultrasonic technology allows the essential oils to be broken down finely and fill a 300 square-foot room with amazing scent.

Set and forget: Zoè’s auto-stop function and extra silent fan (<45 Decibels) lets you relax in your own oasis without a second thought.

 

 

 

 

About Pilgrim Collection

 

Pilgrim Collection is the world’s leading direct-to-consumer aroma and light therapy company. Helping consumers transform their living spaces through customizable diffusers and mediation lights, Pilgrim devices bring overwhelming mental, emotional and physical health benefits to users. Pilgrim Collection products destress and restore zen, protect and heal the immune system, improve sleep patterns and bring overall well-being.

 

 

FAQ:

  • Is Zoè under warranty:

    • Every Zoè is warranty 1 year!

  • Can I get refunded in case I change my mind?

    • Yes ! You can refund your purchase until 10 days after your payment went through.

  • Is it possible to buy a spare glass in case I break one?

    • Yes, both spare glass models will be available for worldwide shipping

  • Is the water boiled or heated to be evaporated?

    • No, Zoe does not use heat or open flame to vaporize water. The water is vaporized using ultrasonic technology.

  • Can I use the mist setting independently of the light settings?

    • Yes, you can use Zoè as a lamp,as a diffuser, or together!

  • Will I receive a US, UK or EU power plug?

    • Once you checkout you can select which power plug type you’d like to receive with Zoè.

  • What is the range of the remote control?

    • More than 10 Meters.

  • Is it possible to buy a spare remote control if I loose one?

    • Yes, remote controls can be bought separately and shipped worldwide.

  • Is the remote control battery included in the product I will receive?

    • Yes each Zoè receives a CR2032 type battery for the remote control.

  • Where can I find a spare battery?

    • Our remote uses a CR2032 type battery and can be find in grocery stores, major retailers or on Amazon.

  • Is the wood base made of real wood?

    • Yes, the base is made of real organic oak wood.

  • What do you mean by “Zoe is made of BPA free plastic”?

    • It means Zoè’s water tank does not contain any toxic (bisphenol A)- or non eco friendly material.

  • How long can Zoè run on fully on mode?

    • Depending of the humidity of your room it will run for about 12 Hours.

  • How do I clean Zoe?

    • Use a wet tissue to remove dirt inside the water tank.

  • How long is the power cord?

    • We made an extra long power cord (72 inch/ 1.8m) to make sure you can install Zoe in each room at home.

  • What is the water tank capacity?

    • 500 ML./ 17 Ounces

THANK YOU

 

The FDA has not evaluated the statements or claims on this website. No claims are made as to any medicinal value of this oil or any products from Pilgrim Collection. The information presented here is for educational purposes of traditional uses and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

story:
Thanks for coming to our campaign page. My name is Justin Franich and I am the Director of Shenandoah Valley Teen Challenge. I've been given the great privilege to serve at SVTC since the opening of our first residential center 8. Over the past 8 years, I have observed God set many addicts free and restore many broken families. The Men & Women that came to our doors without any hope have left with a new life and purpose.

Why do we need to raise these funds?

With our ministry growing we are in major need of this administrative building to be able to serve the growing operational needs as we continue to reach out to the addicted and their families. 

We have been given a great opportunity to acquire a 6,000 sq. ft. modular office building for our campus. This campaign is to raise the $25,000 needed to move the 7 sections of the building onto our campus. 

How will the money be spent?

Here is the breakdown of the $25,000 we are trying to raise.

$7,000 of the raised funds will cover the cost of pouring footers and concrete blocks needed for the foundation.

$18,000 of the raised funds will go toward the transport and setting of the buildings. This is the major expense of getting the buildings from their current location our property.

How will this make a difference?

In the last year the amount of residents in our centers have doubled. Currently our capacity is for 32 Men and 8 Ladies. Within the next month, we will be opening a new Women's center with an additional 16 beds. We have been running at about 90% capacity on a consistent basis.  We have used all the square footage in our buildings to provide bed-space and common area for our residents. When we move this building onto our campus we will be able to have much needed office space, classrooms, larger space for weekly chapel. conference room, & reception area. 

What challenges are you facing?

The buildings need to be moved within the next 45 - 60 days. They are not going to be able to be stored where they are much longer. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity for our ministry but in  order to take advantage we have to act now.  

How can you help?

Give - Every donation through this campaign will get us one step closer to moving these buildings onto our campus. 

Pray - Please pray for the resources. 

Tell - Share this campaign on social media and with your friends. Lets get this thing to go viral!! Momentum is a powerful tool!!!

Thank you for helping us make this a reality. Your continued faithfulness in giving and support of this ministry has allowed many lives to be transformed and families to be restored.

story:
Summary

For less than 50 cents a day, Vibrant Pets will:

Support Your Pet's Health: "Our 8-year-old Siberian Husky had seizures approximately once a month since he was 4 years old. We began giving Vibrant Pets to him that evening and he has not had a seizure since." Leisa and Greg Sutherlin

Boost Your Pet's Energy: "After starting her on the Vibrant Pets she literally seemed to revert back to how fit she was at age 5 or 6. She no longer exhibits any signs of limping or soreness in her joints. She tears around the back yard like a dog half her age." Courtney, owner of 12 year old mix 'Fred'

Support Your Best Friend Today: "Thank you Vibrant Pets for making my best friend healthy and happy again"

Support Your Pet Today: "Funding our campaign today will help animals in need across the country. That's because I'm not taking any profits from this campaign. I will use the proceeds to help your pet and spread the word about Vibrant Pets. I promise you'll see results in 2 weeks or your money back." Lee Phillips, lover of animals and CEO of Vibrant Pets.

Simple, easy to feed supplement Vibrant Pets is releasing a new and simplified daily supplement products: Ultimate Formula & Ultimate Plus Formula (for Senior Dogs) 

  • Easier to serve the right amount on a daily basis
  • Sprinkle Vibrant Pets on dry, canned or raw food daily, that's it!
  • Improve your pet's health and appearance without any guesswork
  • Support your pet's immune system for improved energy and healthy outcomes.

With your support, we can continue this expansion and support our sole mission is to improve the health of all pets. All funding raised from this effort will go to telling America about improving their pet’s health. Vibrant Pets will take no profit from this funding. 

Why Support Us?

We believe that good nutrition is the foundation of vibrant health and our sole mission is to improve the health of all pets. With this funding, we expand our product line and start to travel across America to share this wonderful product. Again, we will take no profit out of this.

Vibrant Pets is made in America and proudly a Serviced Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business.

Vibrant Pets is an affordable, effective, and proven all-in-one supplement for pets, backed by 8 years of research and development along with 6 years in production and hundreds of positive experiences. 

 

Our Customers Love Vibrant Pets

Watch a couple of videos below and those stories continue to be the reason why we want to spread this valuable product:

 

 

The effectiveness and quality of this proprietary formula come from its nutrition-rich ingredients like proteins, zinc, vitamins, probiotics, enzymes, iron, glucosamine and more. This guarantees that this dog immune system supplement will supply powerful health and immune enhancement. No other dog supplement in the world contains these clinically evaluated ingredients in these amounts. 

With the daily usage, Vibrant Pets is able to maintain and restore your pet’s health, appearance and energy-level, including to alleviate most chronic and common pet health issues within two weeks. 

 

Incentives

Pledge $20 or more

Vibrant Pets: 
•    Personalized Thank You Card
•    Two week All-in-Pet” Supplement Packet, and 
•    Coupon code 10% off in their next order with Vibrant Pets
•    Vibrant Pets T-shirt for your dog
 
Pledge $30 or more
Vibrant Pets: 
•    Personalized Thank You
•    Not One but TWO months of “All-in-Pet” Supplement (a 50% savings!), and 
•    Coupon code 20% off in their next order with Vibrant Pets
•    Vibrant Pets T-shirt for your dog
 
Pledge $60 or more
Vibrant Pets: 
•    Personalized Thank You
•    Not Two but FOUR months of “All-in-Pet” Supplement(a 50% savings!), and 
•    Coupon code 20% off in their next order with Vibrant Pets
•    Vibrant Pets T-shirt for your dog
 
Pledge $90 or more
Vibrant Pets: 
•    Personalized Thank You
•    Not Three but SIX months of “All-in-Pet” Supplement (50% savings), and 
•    Coupon code 30% off in their next order with Vibrant Pets
•    One 15 minute personal consultation with Lee
•    Vibrant Pets T-shirt for your dog 

Pledge $1,000 or more

•    Personalized Thank You
•    Not Three but NINE months of “All-in-Pet” Supplement, and 
•    Coupon code 30% off in their next order with Vibrant Pets
•    One 15 minute personal consultation with Lee
•    Vibrant Pets T-shirt for your dog 
•    Hand painted signed by artists rendering of your pet, ($1,000 value donated by http://mattbowmanart.com/)

Testimonials


 

 

Many more testimonials can be found at: vibrantpets.com

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign page by using the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Hello! Our group consists of Jonathan Clemons, Will Henderson, Shawn Mckay, and Griffin Fraser. We are all business majors at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville. We are looking to raise money for Special Spaces http://specialspaces.org, a non-profit organization that designs and constructs rooms for children with life-threatening illnesses between the ages 2-19. We wanted to run campaign for this organization because it is important for children to live in a safe and healthy environment in the most comfortable setting. With money raised in this campaign we will be able to donate money to help with the materials to construct and design the rooms for the children. The two kids we are raising money for are Isaac and Henley. 

Henley is 3 years old and has cancer. Special Spaces plans to use to money to create a Princess and Horses dream room, her two favorite things. 

 

Isaac is 9 years old and is diagnosed with Leukemia. Isaac rooms main focus is going to be on the Braves, his favorite Major League Baseball team. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal for this campaign is to raise $1,000 for the Special Spaces non-profit organization. All of the money raised will donated to the Special Spaces branch in Chattanooga who is currently 3 weeks away from their next dream bedroom! To encourage you to donate to this special cause we are offering you perks if you donate!

The Impact

Our campaigns mission, along with Special Spaces, strives to give children with life threatening illnesses a healthy distraction from the challenges they must face every day dealing with their conditions by creating a dream bedroom of the child's wishing. The value of this project is incomparable to any other in that it makes the lives of children who were given a hand of less fortunate cards, just a little bit easier. For if we can contribute a little of all that we’ve been blessed with to help the life of just one child, it can show that child that there is hope. It can also raise awareness to the many other less fortunate children out there that need your help so that they may keep fighting through these advanced conditions.   

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are looking to help out in anyway there are many other ways to do so other than donations. First, You can share this page with other people, using the Indigogo share tool,  to help us raise money and to get the word out. Second, you can volunteer for a project near you. Special Spaces has locations all throughout the US where you can help to construct the rooms.

story:
Story of My Book

My name is Brandon Posivak and I am the author of Step on the Cracks: Reinventing Happiness, Positivity, and Optimism. This book is targeted at a Generation Z audience and uses a combination of personal experiences, interviews, and psychological data to cover a different concept that Gen Z struggles with in each chapter. This book offers a new perspective on Gen Z happiness, positivity, and optimism, showing the reader in a conversational style that they are not alone and despite temporary defeat and negativity in life, happiness and success is achievable for themselves and for Generation Z as a whole.

One of the main goals of this book is to offer a new perspective on Gen Z happiness from a fellow member of the generation. Additionally, through the text I hope to show the reader that I am right there with them and still currently working on each of the concepts that appear in the chapters. For this reason, I also wanted to thank all the people who have had a positive impact on my life for their constant support and help. Different from a psychology professor’s Ted Talk or a motivational speaker’s videos, I want my book to be a breath of fresh air to my Gen Z audience and present them with new information on how to better understand their own unique happiness.

My hope is that, in reading this book, the reader will discover how their own unique happiness fingerprint plays a role in their life and that it is also achievable for the future of Gen Z as a whole. Additionally, I hope to show that a “positive and optimistic outlook” in life may be a little different than what they were told as a kid. I am a member of Generation Z who is still figuring it all out, and I want to share with you what I have learned and show you that I am on this journey with you. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for helping others, self-reflection, and learning about happiness in you. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you build a foundation for your own happiness and future success and see how to apply what you learn in this book to not only your own life but to the lives of those around you as well.

In this book, you'll learn about concepts that Gen Z struggles with and a new perspective on these issues:

- Social media use and the comparison aspect to others that turns social media from a fun way to share memories with friends into a highlight reel of only “the best moments” which people inherently compare each other to

- The difference between happiness and joy, the two different forms of happiness (natural and synthetic) and why our psychological immune system is so powerful if we utilize it effectively

- Persistence and an understanding of the benefits of delayed gratification are important tools in pushing through temporary defeats in life to ultimately reach our goals

- Recognizing the importance of technology in our lives, but still being able to see the importance of humanity and as technology continues to advance, not letting it overshadow our human relationships and our appreciation of the world around us as we’re buried in our iPhones.

- An understanding of how to cultivate our “Why”- our personal motivation for wanting to go into a specific occupation or make the choices for our future- and how to use our “Why” to channel our passion into helping others

- The Gen Z perspective on accruing wealth, financial security, finding a job, and making an impact on that job using a combination of real interviews from Gen Z members as well as recent and relevant psychological data

You will love this book if you are a member of Gen Z interested in making a positive impact on the world as well as members of other generations who want to learn more about the psychology of Gen Z as we begin to inherit this world.
 

The Book- Step on the Cracks: Reinventing Happiness, Positivity, and Optimism

The book is written in Three Parts....

- Part One of the book is meant to be an introduction to Gen Z happiness topics, including the affects of social media, the different forms of happiness (natural and synthetic), the importance of our inner child, and how temporary defeat and delayed gratification play a role in our overall happiness. The social media chapter is one of the most relevant chapters in the book because it is a very significant factor in both Gen Z happiness and anxiety depending on how it’s handled.

- Part Two focuses on the importance of perspective in relation to a positive outlook and an understanding of our psychological and emotional states as we transition from college into the real world. This section of chapters focuses on more “abstract concepts” such as why making your bed in the morning reduces the micro stress doses you accumulate in your day, how 64.28% of our life is spent at work, how the unpredictability of life should create opportunity and excitement rather than a fear of the unknown, how human beings have shifted from surviving to thriving and what that means for Gen Z, and how both negativity and positivity are necessary in our lives for us to fully appreciate the nuances of our existence.

- Part Three focuses on optimism and is the most “concrete” or “practical application” of the sections. It covers the intersection between money and happiness, how Gen Z defines success and a meaningful career, the importance of our “why” as we attempt to make an impact on our future, conceptualizing our goals using reference points, and the stigma of “being busy” in society today and why socialization is a key factor in the happiness journey.
 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press Publishing. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing this book.

Money raised will go towards the following:

- The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020

- The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder! (Mine is Blue)

- The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

- The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

- The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
- You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

- A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

- Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

- Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

- The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

- I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

- A bookmark with images related to the book

- And more...

About the Author

Brandon Posivak is a recent college graduate and former Division 1 baseball player from Los Angeles, CA. After graduating Magna Cum Laude, Brandon is currently an incoming law student at the Pepperdine University Caruso School of Law interested in both Sports Law and Business Law.

In going through one of the most difficult times in his life during his senior year of college, Brandon found writing a cathartic way of expressing his emotions. Faced with multiple serious family member illnesses, Brandon made the decision to stay home to work and go to school full-time while helping his family, giving up his senior year of baseball at school.

Struggling to find happiness among the challenges in his life, Brandon turned to his family and his research for a solution. He’s always believed that one of the most powerful things a human being can do is make someone else feel good and smile. In addition to his passion for sports and the outdoors, writing was always Brandon’s way to connect with his inner-self, and this book was a dual opportunity for him to share his personal experiences as well as interviews and psychological research to help even just one person reading his book smile and have a better life. That person will in turn share what they have learned with another and another and so on. With a new perspective and a new understanding of happiness, positivity, and optimism, Brandon hopes to be a voice of positivity and motivation for his generation.

Outside of writing, Brandon enjoys playing sports, hiking, fishing, scuba diving, and traveling. He lives an active lifestyle, and is always looking for the next adventure!

For more information you can connect with Brandon on social media at:

- Personal Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brandon_posivak/

- Book Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brandon_posivak_bookj...

- Author Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/brandonposivakauthor/

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/brandon_posivak

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/brandon-posivak/

- Email: brandon@brandonposivak.com

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #StepOnTheCracks and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

  • Please share Step on the Cracks with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks Again,
Brandon Posivak

story:
By now you’ve heard about the $10.5 million payment that Justin Trudeau gave to confessed terrorist Omar Khadr.

$10.5 million and an apology -- to a convicted, confessed terrorist and war criminal. 

Meanwhile, the real victims get nothing. Khadr killed U.S. army medic Sgt. Christopher Speer, leaving his wife Tabitha a widow, and his two young kids fatherless.

It's a disgrace. It's outrageous. But there is something POSITIVE we can do.

We can help the Speer family, by raising one million dollars for the Speer children, to pay for their education, and anything else they need in life.

All the money we raise will go to them. Indiegogo, the transparent crowdfunding site that we are using, takes a small processing fee to cover their expenses and credit card fees, but anything we get will go to the Speer kids.

We’ve done this before. Back in the Sun News days we raised just shy of $100,000 for the Speer kids. They got all the money then and they will get all the money now.

If you can only afford $5, that will help. But if you can give $25, $100 or $1,000 - maybe more, consider doing that.

If you want to donate by cheque, via snail mail, do that. too!

Just put "Speer Kids" in the memo section and make the cheque payable to:

For Canada
PO Box 61056 Eglinton/Dufferin RO
Toronto, ON M6E 5B2

Here is  an email from Leisl Morris, whose husband Layne Morris was injured by Khadr -- he lost sight in one eye. Here's what she wrote:

I first met Tabitha Speer in Germany after our husbands were wounded by a grenade thrown by Omar Khadr. Christopher Speer was mortally wounded and left his young family with no father to care for them. Tabitha's children were toddlers at the time and have grown up not knowing their father.  Previously, funds have been raised for the Speer children. The Speer family has been touched by the generosity of others and greatly appreciates any assistance offered to to them. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts! 

Leisl Morris

And here is an email from Tabitha: 

I am overwhelmed by the outpouring  of positive support. If you would like to start a crowdfund for Taryn and Tanner, I have no objection.

Thank you for your continued support.

Sincerely, 
Tabitha Speer 

So please consider helping. There's nothing we can do to stop Justin Trudeau from grovelling before this terrorist, and giving him our hard-earned taxpayers money. It's a national disgrace, but we are powerless to stop it.

What we have the power to do is actually help the victims -- something Trudeau has never considered doing.

Let's show the world that what happened in Canada was not in our name. Let's do something constructive and positive, and help the real victims, the Speer kids who grew up without their father.

--Brian Lilley

*We will e-mail you updates on this campaign and other news about Omar Khadr and the Speer family and related issues. You can opt out any time.

Indiegogo, the transparent crowdfunding site that we are using, takes a small processing fee to cover their expenses and credit card fees, but anything we get will go to the Speer kids.We’ve done this before. Back in the Sun News days we raised just shy of $100,000 for the Speer kids. They got all the money then and they will get all the money now.If you can only afford $5, that will help. But if you can give $25, $100 or $1,000 - maybe more, consider doing that.If you want to donate by cheque, via snail mail, do that. too!Just put "Speer Kids" in the memo section and make the cheque payable to:For CanadaPO Box 61056 Eglinton/Dufferin ROToronto, ON M6E 5B2Here is  an email from Leisl Morris, whose husband Layne Morris was injured by Khadr -- he lost sight in one eye. Here's what she wrote:I first met Tabitha Speer in Germany after our husbands were wounded by a grenade thrown by Omar Khadr. Christopher Speer was mortally wounded and left his young family with no father to care for them. Tabitha's children were toddlers at the time and have grown up not knowing their father.  Previously, funds have been raised for the Speer children. The Speer family has been touched by the generosity of others and greatly appreciates any assistance offered to to them. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts! Leisl MorrisAnd here is an email from Tabitha: I am overwhelmed by the outpouring  of positive support. If you would like to start a crowdfund for Taryn and Tanner, I have no objection.Thank you for your continued support.Sincerely, Tabitha Speer So please consider helping. There's nothing we can do to stop Justin Trudeau from grovelling before this terrorist, and giving him our hard-earned taxpayers money. It's a national disgrace, but we are powerless to stop it.What we have the power to do is actually help the victims -- something Trudeau has never considered doing.Let's show the world that what happened in Canada was not in our name. Let's do something constructive and positive, and help the real victims, the Speer kids who grew up without their father.--Brian Lilley*We will e-mail you updates on this campaign and other news about Omar Khadr and the Speer family and related issues. You can opt out any time.

story:
Why do we reach out 
Up to now the treatments were given in several places that we rented. We recently received the opportunity to buy land (1000m2) in Kerala. At the moment we are busy with the renovation of the building: the kitchen, treatment rooms, bedrooms and the common space are almost ready. Meanwhile we have received many requests from women and children for help in educational, health and hygienic support. Although we (Aneesh and Miriam) are volunteering in this project in order to help as much as possible people we need to buy medicines (herbs, oils), hire doctors, therapists and build new spaces to meet the amount of requests we received. Besides this we need to buy the educational support materials and pay the school fees. That’s why we need your help!

 

Up to now we helped

Sangheeta - 8 years old
She goes to school every day by rickshaw instead of a 2 hour-walk, because of this transportation her mother is able to work. Which is crucial, since she is one of the few women in India that dared to divorce in order to secure the future of Sangheeta and her two sisters. Women that divorce take the risk of being excluded from the community, which means no work, no food, no prospect. Furthermore, Sangheeta received a school uniform and study material.

Sandra - 15 years old
Sandra’s grandparents (her father left his body when she was 4) were not able to pay the study material, uniform and books. In the future we need to pay her school fee as well since there is the possibility that her grandfather thinks that girls don’t need to study for a long time. Manna Home is supporting her since 2014.

Safna - 8 years old
A tough family store marks Safna’s life. Another mother that had the guts to divorce her man. This time there was no other family support besides her mother’s sisters that were both women and thus struggling with finances. Safna’s aunt begged us if we could help her to go to school so that at least Safna’s life could be better as her mother’s and aunts’ lifes.

Lakshmi - 8 years old
Unfortunately Lakshmi’s mother has health problems and was not able to take care of her daughter anymore. Manna Home was her last hope. Since 2014 Manna home supports her with all her school needs (fee, books, uniform) and also helps with food parcels. Every week the local veggie shop brings fresh fruits and vegetables.

Every little step helps
Do you want to help us to build this Ayurvedic haven? Since january 2015 we already helped 4 children to go to school and 3 children with specific health needs. With your help we can increase these numbers! Many volunteers who share our passion helped us already further. Now we are looking for some extra financial help in order to create a safe haven in which children can heal and flourish again. If you don't have the financial means but appreciate our initiative, please share this page. Eternal gratefulness in return! *Namaste*

story:
Be a founding angel and pre-register for the rootSrise -  the power of pranams course + prana flow mandala mat and live Flow for All events around the globe

Be a mover, shaker and change-maker to support the art of movement meditation for all.

In a time where stress and unexpected change is all around us, the purpose of rootSrise is to provide  empower people of all ages  to have access to the benefits of movement meditation in reducing stress, awakening inner connection, breathing for life and  increasing circulation of within and collectively. Pranams are at the heart of yoga and the world spiritual tradition and yet they were lost in translation in the exercise adaptation of yoga. 


By pre-registering for the rootSrise course, you will be a founding angel member, see the course, e-book and short documentary, live events evolve knowing that you are part of the evolution of and launch this Spring Equinox, and Earth Day 2019. As this offering goes out into the world

You will be recognized on our website as a founding angel, receive the rootSrise course, the first prana flow mandala mast or the sacred perks of your choice AND give the course to a friend in need or let us empower a scholarship recipient. 

For Mat or Mala orders:

International Shipping will take more time to fulfill. Please be patient as we fulfill orders. If you do not receive your order by March, 2019. Please message us via INDIEGOGO! If you need to be registered for a course, please email our team at yogaalchemy108@gmail.com

 

New Year's rootSrise Course on yogaalchemy.com

* Join a global rootSrise community of practitioners, teachers, families, and friends as we bring the power of pranams in to the journey of our year with this pranam starter kit.

* receive this starter pranam sanctuary of 10 pranams to begin to circulate in your daily life and be updated throughout the year on upcoming immersions.

*You can join at any time, please email yogaalchemy108@gmail.com when you have purchased the course or a perk with your course.

* integrate into your offerings in the Power of Pranams - Flow for All Guide online teacher community beginning with Earth Day.  

* experience moving prayer as sacred training cultivating your health and strength with humility and meditation as the basis of your flow. 

* experience a flexible practice 10 min - one hour accessible to seated, simple spinal movements to full strength training

* learn how to integrate pranams into your daily life for transforming stress, anxiety, depression and to bring heart, love, receptivity, listening, circulation, strength and vitality into your movement practice.

* Become a Founding Angel. Be part of the unfolding process and included on the flowforall.love website launch 

Course is offered for free to anyone who applies to Gift of Pranams  for people who are facing  health challenges, life-difficulties email yogaalchemy108@gmail.com

 

 

For more background on Shiva's journey.

 

 

The purpose of life is to find your gift and the meaning of life is to share it. - Picasso

Greetings Lovers of Life! I am your friend on the path, Shiva Rea, longtime global yoga teacher, catalyst, mother, activist, movement alchemist and, founder of Prana Flow, Samudra Global School of Living Yoga.

The last six months my world turned upside down.  I was diagnosed with Stage IIIa Invasive Breast Cancer from genetic factors in April and evacuated from fires for 2.5 weeks in the Woosely Fires in November. 

As a global yoga teacher with a life of excellent health, I turned to all of my yoga, meditation and wellness tools to stay strong, listen deep, transform, heal and navigate my path. Of all the practices, pranams or prostrations has been a soulful compass for surrendering stress, navigating,  my life-changes. 

I asked myself how can I continue to help others around the globe, expand the reach to share the benefits of movement meditation and prostrations for all in particularly any person going through a  personal challenge?

I want the 20 million practitioners of meditation to know there is a soulful practice that is the origins of sun salutations that can help everyBody,

Now, I am embarking on a 5-year healing journey towards remission and to live cancer-free.   Part of my life-mission  is to pass on my life work of the past 25 years bringing the roots of movement meditation from my studies and offering around the world to  empower as many people as possible to be able offer the gifts of meditation and breathing and soulful movement to everyone  and  revive the art of prostrations at the heart of yoga as a movement meditation practice for all. 

These virtual online meditations, "flow for all" scholarships and live events will be supported by your pre-registration for our New Year programs. 

Every Mandala Mat & rootSrise course gives the course onward - you can give to a friend or include in our pass-it-on.

As a Founding Angel Member, you can choose your  "mover, shaker and change maker" perk to you can use in the Movement Meditation courses!

ORDER BY DEC 27  FOR JAN. 5th - 18 NEW MOON NEW YEAR COURSE  (USA ORDERS)

Every rootSrise memberships that you pre-register for includes a unique perk not found anywhere else: 

PranaFlow Mandala mat in three colors:

Healing Blue, , Grounded Earth, and Royal Purple.

(Lotus of Love will be ready in February)

Maha Malas of Kashi are the prototypes of big malas made with love in Varanasi (Kashi), India initiated by the flow for all project.  Our Maha Malas of Kashi is a global mala project to make   high-quality malas on the Ganga to empower the special needs community in Varanasi  Available in Shivratri Rudraksha or Devi Crystal Glass.

Embody the Flow Hoops and Maha Mala - the perk will be available in Spring as a form of sacred training and core cultivation with joy. 

As a "mover, shaker and change maker", you will be part of the a founding circle to seed the above projects and we will put your name in our course-sponsor page. 

Choose any one of our perks or just join us for the Winter Solstice Meditation  & New Year 108 pranams that is free for all (www.pranavinyasaflow.com).

Your pre-registration supports the creation of new soulful music meditations  for our Journey of the Year/Flow for All Live + Online Immersion beginning with the first new moon of the year. 

More about:

rootSrise -The Power of Pranams

by Shiva Rea

Pranams or prostrations are a way to bring cellular change in our bodies and our world.

Physically, pranams can serve as sacred training -- increasing circulation as well as sacred strength if the practitioner desires. On the inner level, prostrations can support the difficult emotions that come with the stresses of daily life: anxiety, agitation, uncertainty, doubt, anger, grief. As a circular process, it contains both the lunar relaxation and the solar empowerment whilst letting go and rising up.

Pranams are about our direct contact with the earth below us and the sky of infinite possibilities above us. As a movement meditation it cultivates humility with empowerment. The practice of prostrations is shared in all of the world's spiritual traditions, but was lost in translation when yoga came to the West. Pranams can help people who are already yoga practitioners find a simple and profound daily, weekly, or once a year practice. At any time of day or night you can return to your center, and return to your heart.

Pranams are not just about surrendering to the earth, but they show us how we rise up with empowerment.Surya prostrations cultivate strength and purification. Lunar pranams slow us to the rhythm of nature. Once apply the tools to embody meditation as a natural state, we become a movers, shakers and change-makers wherever we walk in the world. 

Prostrations are a healing practice that is both simple and profound. They can benefit all, whether you are in a hospital bed or the night before a big day.

We can see that natural, instinctual flow in  movement meditation as our slower breath begins to lead the movement. Physiologically there is an instantaneous effect as we touch our heart and belly to the earth and shift into our parasympathetic nervous system to relax, let go, listen and restore.  When we get down to the earth and organically bow, there is a grounding humility that we are missing in the world right now that we can take refuge in.

Movement meditation with pranams teaches to receive both love and tenderness, and to activate and rise up. That's the other side of prostrations - the empowerment, the triumph, the rising again and again. We have so many physical, mental and emotional stresses that can benefit from this simple ancient, grounding, circulation and joyous movement.

With pranams, or bowing in moving meditation of any level, there is a commitment to tapas, a transformational dedication, a purification through deep listening. When you go for 19, 27, 54, 108 rounds, you  are going beyond what we think we can do. We have much greater potential and energy than we are accessing. Flow taps us into effortless effort and tunes us to our hearts like a living prayer wheel.

 

About the Mandala Mat


The Eco-Friendly Prana Flow Mandala Mat is a
durable, natural rubber/non-toxic/anti-bacterial/biodegradable mat
covered in a lush micro-suede that creates a smooth, glide for pranams (prostrations), lunar yoga, meditation and rolling arts.
This elegant prana flow mat is water-wicking with a greater grip when wet.Free from Phythalates * Latex  Free * Silicon Free.

story:
It's time to finish my yurt.

To do this I propose an exchange.

My experience for your support.

My perks are all about helping you with your own yurt experience. From staying overnight in my yurt to helping you build your own.


Why am I building a yurt?

I have been working as a cabinet maker for the past several years and now my interest in building is growing to include dwellings. I am totally in love with building my own little home.


What we've already completed

Two summers ago me and some friends went out to the Québec countryside and built a yurt frame. We cut down saplings for the the walls and roof (we left most of the saplings to grow), tied together the walls with hemp rope and I used plywood to make the centre ring in the roof and the doorway. 


What I need to finish the yurt

To finish my yurt, I need two things:

  1. a platform to install the yurt on. I'm going to build a basic deck with 3' metal deck spikes for my footings and plywood on top. I'm going to make an earthen floor to cover the plywood.
  2. a cover. I will be buying a walking foot sewing machine and a silicone-treated canvas (much better than using vinyl).


Breakdown of costs

  • 35   yards of Sunforger tent canvas and shipping   $476.60
  • 1     roll of V-138 Polyester UV resistant thread (2913 yards)   $55.25
  • 1     Sailrite Ultrafeed LSZ-1 basic walking foot sewing machine with Monster II balance wheel and shipping   $1004.50
  • 3     sheets of plywood   $103.40
  • 7     2"x6"x10'   $45.50
  • 4     2"x6"x8'     $20.50
  • 2     4"x4"x10'   $26.60
  • 9     deck spikes   $141.30
  • 1     large box of deck screws   $34.50

Note: I will be paying for all indiegogo fees. All the money you contribute will go directly to purchasing the items listed above.


Contact info

Please contact me at noplacelikeyurt@gmail.com if you have any questions about this project and its perks.

story:
A Journey of the Incredible

Tipping Point is both a world record attempt and an inspiring documentary. The climb up Kilimanjaro will be a medical testament of human endurance and the power of the breath and the mind. The film will capture the incredible journey and show the viewer that we are humanly capable of more than we ever thought possible. Tipping Point is about discovering the very limit of human potential.

It's not about amazing people doing the unthinkable...it's about how to access the untapped potential that lives within us all. 

 

Your contribution in helping to make the world a better place

Funding from this Indiegogo campaign will defray costs of the climb, the medical team and the film.

THE SCIENCE

For more than a decade, Wim Hof and his method have been analyzed by medical teams worldwide. The findings have astonished the scientific community.  And Wim has proven that he's not super human, anybody can benefit from his method. The medical research team will conduct tests of our climbers on the mountain for the advancement of science. 

THE STORY

Great storytelling moves the world.  Your contribution will help bring this story to life and inspire others to reach deep within themselves to push their own personal boundaries and live their lives to the fullest.

 Shot in 4K, this magnificent story will be dramatic and awe-inspiring.

Monies allocated to the documentary will go towards filming the climb at high altitude, travel and compensation of a world class crew. Our team of climbing cinematographers, award winning action sports producers and director and editors who excel at adventure storytelling will create an unforgettable film.

This documentary will be the first in a series exploring the world and our human capabilities.

Our core production team each have more than two decades of experience in the world of extreme sports and high end television production.

The Wim Hof Method

24 hours? No oxygen? IN SHORTS???!! How is this even possible?

During his long existential journey, Wim Hof came face to face with nature’s most primordial elements. Staring right back, the merciless cold and bountiful air revealed an energy now lost to most of modern society, dormant inside all of us and waiting to be reawakened.

Having embraced these majestic forces, and breaking record after record in a range of death-defying feats, Wim resolved to share this discovery with the rest of the world. He gradually whittled his accrued insight down to the core essentials, so that people young and old, healthy and sick could tap into this potential without having to invest the same decades worth of study, travel and daring.

The result is the Wim Hof Method: a natural path to an optimal state of body and mind. It rests on three main pillars: a breathing technique; cold exposure; and a mind-set that allows one to incorporate these tools into daily life.

Not Impossible - but I'm Possible

Paul Vincent, adventure athlete and an expert on human performance and potential is all about breaking barriers. He knows that we limit ourselves with false beliefs, and its only by pushing the envelope that we discover the greatness that lies within us all.

Paul is our guide; through interviews, conversation and his own immersion into the process, he will be the eyes of the viewer, taking us along on the climb…exposing himself to altitude sickness, freezing temperatures, and a brutal never before attempted 24 hour group climb of Mt Kilimanjaro.

Advancing Medical Science

The human body is an incredible vessel. The mind even more so. The techniques that help climbers not only survive, but thrive at high altitudes, their skin exposed to freezing temperatures, are the same techniques that can be used to help us cure our own bodies of injury and disease.  

The climbers have agreed to participate in a medical study on the mountain that will capture data on internal core body temperature regulation and oxygenation. The advancement of science is a critical focus of this expedition.

Your support

We all want to be a part of something greater - your support will help us reach the summit, capture this incredible expedition, enhance our understanding of the human body through scientific principles and share it all with the world.

Additionally, a portion of the proceeds of this climb will be donated to a local charity in Tanzania.

The climb up Kilimanjaro will be a medical testament of human endurance and the power of the breath and the mind. The film will capture the incredible journey and show the viewer that we are humanly capable of more than we ever thought possible. Tipping Point is about discovering the very limit of human potential.It's not about amazing people doing the unthinkable...it's about how to access the untapped potential that lives within us all.  Your contribution in helping to make the world a better placeFunding from this Indiegogo campaign will defray costs of the climb, the medical team and the film.THE SCIENCEFor more than a decade, Wim Hof and his method have been analyzed by medical teams worldwide. story:
During pregnancy, it is all too common for an expectant mum to be offered a wealth of generic advice and information on pregnancy, childbirth and how to care for their newborn baby.

It is far less common to get a candid conversation started about the physiological and mental changes that come after childbirth. When it comes to postpartum recovery, most mums - especially first time mothers - have no idea what to expect.

How is MUM BUB HUB offering the solution?  

Becoming a mum or parent is such a cherished life experience but no one really talks about the nitty gritty aspects of pregnancy, birth and the recovery period. Most women who have experienced pregnancy or given birth will admit that there are some unfavourable aspects and physical after shocks, yet the realities of birth and recovery is still one of the most taboo conversations to have openly and publicly.

During our own pregnancies, we struggled to find information about postpartum recovery and struggled even moreso to find products to help make the healing process a bit easier. There is often so much focus on the precious newborn that we forget to focus on our recovery and ourselves. This set a spark in us, we knew that there had to be a better way to aid recovery and to start the dialogue around birth experiences and postpartum care.

 

Our products are made for Mums, by Mums – they have been designed with the intention to help new mums heal, recover and rest. Each product is formulated with 100% natural herbs, extracts and essential oils, which are traditionally used in homeopathy and herbal medicine.

We’ve especially selected ingredients like homeopathic arnica, witch hazel and a blend of wound healing, styptic and antibacterial herbs traditionally used for soothing and healing postpartum swelling, soreness, tears, episiotomies and bruising.

 

 

Our Products

MBH Perineal Spray - A soothing, naturally cooling mist with witch hazel to ease discomfort from haemorrhoids, postpartum vaginal swelling and bruising, perineal tears, and episiotomies.

MBH Bottom Balm -  A soothing salve with natural herbs, like St. John’s wort, Arnica and Calendula to ease postpartum discomfort.

MBH Healing Soaking Salts - Soothing Herbal bath soak to help speed healing and reduce swelling by encouraging circulation and to help you relax and soothe postpartum discomfort.

MBH Herbal Bath Soak - A blend of herbs to help speed healing and reduce swelling by encouraging circulation and help you relax and soothe postpartum discomfort.

 

As with any & all skincare products & formulations, some people may experience allergic reactions. We encourage everyone to read our labels (which are easy to understand), go to our website and do a test patch on the inside of their wrist when you begin to use our products.

Our products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. The natural remedies provided should not be interpreted as a substitute for diagnosis and treatment by a health care professional. It is your responsibility to discuss any alternative or natural remedy with your health care provider before using it.

Our current goal is to bring our 4 new products - MBH Perineal Spray, MBH Bottom Balm, MBH Herbal Bath Soak and MBH Healing Soaking Salts to the retail market by August.  This means that in the next few months we will need to complete our website, design our packaging, create our marketing content, source and purchase all of our ingredients and packaging, product production and shipping all of our orders. 

Where will the money go?

60%: Manufacturing Cost 

13%: Sourcing Ingredients

13%: Testing and Insurance

8%:   Indiegogo and processing fees

6%:   Packaging Design

Stretch Goals

If we can raise another £2,000, we will be able to source 100% organic ingredients and obtain Soil Association Organic Certification. 

If we can raise a second £1,000, we would be able to place an additional bulk order of ingredients and  supplies, stocking up our inventory for the winter.

 

This means that all of our profits are reinvested back into the business or our social mission.

Our ethos is to inspire and encourage open and honest dialogue. We want to help women feel confident and comfortable in talking about the realities that come with being pregnant, the realities of birth and the gruelling realities of the post partum recovery period.  Our brand is so much more than the products we are developing. We want to tackle the taboos surrounding pregnancy, birth and post-partum healing – mental and physically.  

Our goal as a social enterprise is to make antenatal and post-partum care and support accessible to all, especially to those who cannot readily access these services and to aid parents in their transition to parenthood.  

The profits from each product go toward providing recovery care kits and antenatal workshops and support groups to vulnerable women, parents and families which will offer physical, practical and emotional care and support for mums before and after birth. 

Risks & Challenges

Our manufacturers require us to purchase a large bulk quantity of each item which significantly increases the upfront investment. This can be a major hurdle for a small business such as ours, which may prevent us from competing with the big brands.

We expect to launch and begin shipping our first orders this Summer. We have developed a great relationship with our suppliers but because we are sourcing the highest quality products from around the world, there is always a small risk of having shortages and logistics issues, which can delay factory schedule by a few days or weeks.  We pride ourselves on customer service and integrity and so keeping our backers informed during the entire process is of upmost importance. We promise we will do our best to keep updated regularly and to ship on a timely basis.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still make a big difference and here's how:

CONNECT WITH US! Click on the icons to the top right of your screen and find us on Facebook and Twitter, and swing by our website to learn more. Also, find us on Instagram @mumbubhub

SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN!  Sharing us on your social media and telling your friends is a huge help!

We appreciate everyone's support and dedication.

Please tag us/use our hashtag if you post on social media so we can send some love: #mbhrecovery @mumbubhub
