story:
Short Summary

What is Shadana Yoga?

An online Yoga and Ayurveda platform that offers Yoga classes, long term lifestyle modification programs using both yoga and Ayurvedic/ nutritional guidance in Arabic.

ما هو شدانا يوغا؟

موقع الكتروني لليوغا والأيورفيدا يقدم حصص يوغاو برامج مساعدة في تبني عادات صحية جديدة على المدى الطويل و دورات عن اليوغا و التغذية  باستخدام علوم اليوغا و الايرفيدا و التغذية  باللغة العربية.

 

Shadana Yoga also aims to use 10% of the profit into bringing more yoga to areas in need, such as refugee camps and high intensity areas.  

وتهدف شدانا يوغا إلى استخدام 10٪ من الربح في جلب المزيد من اليوغا إلى المناطق المهمشة، مثل مخيمات اللاجئين والمناطق عالية التوتر.

 

Why?

The Story

The vision started to get developed as soon as the founder moved back to Palestine; her top priority was to teach in refugee camps or areas with very restricted external spaces / constant clashes. she started volunteering at a great community studio named Farashe Yoga and through that started teaching the first course at a refugee camp.

The whole idea came from the women at the refugee camp, they loved the practice and wanted to do more at home, but they couldn’t find anything in Arabic, and that was the spark!

 

لماذا؟

القصة

لقد بدأت تتطور رؤية المشروع  بمجرد عودة المؤسِسة إلى فلسطين. فكانت أولويتها العليا ان تعلم في مخيمات اللاجئين أو المناطق ذات المساحات الخارجية المقيدة جدا و الاشتباكات المستمرة. فبدأت العمل التطوعي في استوديو مجتمعي رائع يدعى فاراشة ومن خلاله بدأت بتدريس الدورة الأولى في مخيم للاجئين.
و هنا نشأت الفكرة من النساء في إحدى المخيمات، فقد أحببن هذه الممارسة و أردن أن تمارسن المزيد في المنزل، و لكن لم يتمكنوا من العثور على أي شي باللغة العربية، و هكذا بدأنا.  

 

 

The reasons

  1. Providing access to yoga classes where a physical studio may not exist
  2. Providing an at-home solution to doing yoga for people who do not have time to go to a studio
  3. Providing a free option for people who cannot afford to pay for yoga classes
  4. Creating a community that connects people with similar interests across the MENA region
  5. Providing guidance on how to take the first steps to a healthier and more fulfilling lifestyle
  6. Simply providing a tool for people to maintain a daily practice at home

 

الاسباب
1. توفير حصص يوغا للاماكن التي لا يتوفر فيها استوديو لليوغا.
2.توفير حصص اليوغا في كل منزل للأشخاص الذين ليس لديهم الوقت للذهاب إلى الاستوديو.

3.توفير خيار مجاني للأشخاص الذين لا يستطيعون دفع ثمن دروس اليوغا.
4.إنشاء مجتمع يربط بين الناس ذوي الاهتمامات المتشابهة في الوطن العربي.
5.توفير طريق واضحة حول كيفية اتخاذ الخطوات الأولى لنمط حياة أكثر صحة وأكثر سعادة.
6.ببساطة توفير أداة للناس للحفاظ على الممارسة اليومية في المنزل.

 

Why Refugees?

The story



Growing up in Palestine, under constant bombing, shooting and curfews the owner had personally experienced what it means to feel unsafe in one's own body, trapped with no space around, only when she was given this gift she started feeling space and safety within. Her personal mission has become to humbly share this gift with the world, especially with people who have been through similar experiences.

 Yoga has incredible physical benefits for disease prevention, disease management and in some cases healing diseases! It empowers us to take control over our own well-being, and of course, it is much cheaper, and with no side effects!

 

 اللاجئين؟ لماذا؟
القصة

لقد عاشت المؤسِّسة طفولتها في فلسطين، في ظل القصف المستمر، وإطلاق النار وحظر التجول، و نتج لديها فهم بمعني الشعور بعدم الأمان، و الاختناق، حتى أُعطِيت هذه الهدية(اليوغا) بدأت تشعر بالمساحة الداخلية و السلام و الامان. فأصبح لديها  اهتمام خاص بمشاركة هذه الهدية مع العالم بكل ما تيسر لها، وخاصة مع الناس الذين مروا بتجربة مماثلة.

 لليوغا فوائد جسدية كثيرة للوقاية من الأمراض، والتحكم بالأمراض وفي بعض الحالات الشفاء التام! كما انها أداة  تمكين تساعدنا على اخذ صحتنا بيدنا و البدء بالتغيير الايجابي، و من دون أعراض جانبية . كما يقول المثل " درهم وقاية خير من قنطار علاج"

 

 

The reasons:

  1. Provide tools for people to take their own step into feeling the space within where outer space does not exist
  2. Allow people to take control over their own health in a cheap or even free way
  3. The closeness the founder feels to post-traumatic cases due to personal experiences

الأسباب
1. توفير الأدوات لاتخاذ الخطوة الاولى للشعور بالمساحة الداخلية في الأماكن التي لا يوجد فيها مساحة خارجية.
2. تقديم الادوات و التوجيه السليم للعناية بالصحة.
3. إحساس و مرور المؤسِسة بتجارب مماثلة.

 

 

This campaign aims to work in both directions, provide the MENA region with accessible yoga classes, guided meditations and simple health tips in their own mother tongue for free, and offer paid services including but not limited to courses, packages dedicated to prevention of certain diseases such as diabetes hypertension and management of others such as hypertension, chronic stress and different stages of diabetes and some physical projects. It then aims to use 10% of the profits made from selling packages to finance more work in refugee camps and other marginalized areas.

By helping us create this, you will be helping millions of people around the world find the tools they could be looking for but have no access to.

 

تهدف هذه الحملة إلى العمل في كلا الاتجاهين، احداهما توفير حصص و دورات يوغا ، وتأمل ونصائح صحية بسيطة في لغتنا الأم مجاناً، و الجانب الاخر يقدم خدمات مدفوعة الاجر  كحُزم مخصصة للوقاية من بعض الأمراض مثل ارتفاع ضغط الدم و السكري وسُبل التعامل مع أمراض أخرى  مثل ارتفاع ضغط الدم، والإجهاد و التوتر المُزمن و غيرهم. ويهدف بعد ذلك إلى استخدام 10٪ من الارباح لتمويل المزيد من العمل في مخيمات اللاجئين وغيرها من المناطق المهمشة.  

من خلال مساعدتنا في إنشاء هذا المشروع، انتم فعليا تساعدون الكثير من الناس في جميع أنحاء العالم العربي في العثور على موارد و معلومات مساعدة قد تكون ما يحتاجون اليه.  

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

*  Due to the incredible support of people offering their services, we now need 2000 USD to create 33 videos and a webpage as a start . Consisting of:

Stage One: First batch of free videos (Offered for free)

- 7 day morning yoga challenge 

-3 yoga therapy videos: Yoga for healthy digestion, Yoga for spinal health and yoga for relaxation

- 3 Ayurvedic videos: simple tips for a healthier daily life

ماذا نحتاج و على ماذا ستحصلون

  بعد استقبال دعم بعض الاشخاص بتوفير بعض الخدمات مجانا نحن الان بحاجة الى 2000 دولار أمريكي لإنشاء 33 مقطع فيديو و موقع الكتروني كبداية. تتكون الفيديوهات من:

 المرحلة الأولى: حُزمة من الفيديوهات المجانية و تتكون من:(سيقدم مجانا)

 -برنامج يوغا صباحي لمدة سبعة ايام

3 دروس متخصصة باليوغا العلاجية: يوغا لجهاز هضمي صحي ، اليوغا للصحة العمود الفقري، ويوغا للاسترخاء

    ، نصائح غذائية للمساعدة في الهضم و  لصحة الاسنان و غيرهمفيديوهات أيوفيدرية: نصائح بسيطة لحياة صحية 3
 

 

Stage Two: First package

- A 10 week spinal health package: this includes 10 yoga classes for each week, nutrition talks and a number of supporting tools to help individuals in maintaining their lifestyle modifications.

 

المرحلة الثانية: الحُزمة الأولى-

حٌزمة سلامة العمود الفقري و التخلص من أوجاع الظهر، و تتكون من برنامج لمدة 10 أسابيع يتكون من 10 حصص يوغا لكل أسبوع و محاضرات عن التغذية للحفاظ على عمود فقري و جهاز عصبي صحي و سليم مع عدد من الأدوات الداعمة للمساعدة في الحفاظ على التغير في العادات الغذائية و الحياتية.

What We Need:

2000 USD broken down as follows:

- video production, (offered for free) this will go to the video producers of shooting and editing 13 videos including yoga classes and Ayurvedic tips helpful in our daily life, and 20 videos including yoga, ayurveda and nutrition videos for the first diabetes management package.

- 500 USD Web development 

- 1500 USD Marketing: A good product can only be known with good marketing, this marketing campaign will aim to reach different areas in the Arab world through online advertising

ما نحتاج:

2000 دولار موزعة على النحو التالي:

-  انتاج الفيديوهات (عرض علينا مجانا)، وهذا المبلغ موجه إلى منتجي الفيديو و هي تتضمن33 فيديو: 13 فيديو مجاني ،موزع بين حصص اليوغا و  نصائح الايورفيدا، و 20 فيديو لأول حُزمة لصحة الظهر و العمود الفقري.

-500 دولار  لتكوين الصفحة الالكترونية

- 1500 دولار للتسويق: للوصول للناس و تعريفهم عن الموقع  يجب ان يكون لدينا خطة تسويق قوية، وسوف تهدف هذه الحملة التسويقية للوصول إلى مناطق مختلفة في العالم العربي من خلال الاعلان على الانترنت

 

Priority of funds will go on creating the product (the videos and web development).

 الأولوية للأموال ستركز على  تكوين المنتج (أشرطة الفيديو وتطوير الصفحة الالكترونية).

The Impact

Your contribution to this project will help millions of the Arabic speaking world have access to tools they may have been waiting to find in their own mother tongue, in addition to its inevitable effect on bringing more yoga for free to areas of high intensity.

  1. Empowering people to make decisions from a balanced state of mind
  2. Bring back ancient methods of healing
  3. More balanced and calm society
  4. More self-empowered society
  5. Reaching a larger audience

التأثير

ستساهم مساعدتكم في هذا المشروع الملايين من الناس حول  العالم العربي في الحصول على الأدوات التي ربما كانوا ينتظرون العثور عليها بلغتهم الأم، بالإضافة إلى تأثيره الحتمي على جلب المزيد من اليوغا مجانا إلى المناطق المهمشة

.التمكين من إتخاذ القرارات النابعة عن ذهن هادئ و واضح-

إعادة الأساليب القديمة للشفاء. -
مجتمع أكثر توازناً وهدوءاً.-
الوصول إلى جمهور أكبر-

 

Risks & Challenges

We view our biggest risks and challenges to be in the below fields:

  1. The fear of Yoga being closely related to a different religion
  2. The inability to continue the funds for the project
  3. The piracy of sold products

 

المخاطر والتحديات

لقد وجدنا أن أكبر المخاطر والتحديات التي من الممكن ان نواجهها تكمن في المجالات التالية:

 الخوف من اليوغا من الناحية الدينية. -
عدم القدرة على المواصلة تمويل المشروع-
قرصنة الحُزم المباعة-

How we can mitigate these challenges:

  1. Most women we work with in refugee camps come from a religious background, hence we will create a video showing people from different faiths talking about the benefits they have found by practicing and yoga's positive influence on their own faith
  2. The paid packages are the way we see the project ensuring its continuity; hence after establishing a sense of familiarity and trust within the audience we can introduce our first package and continue the project from there. We also aim to continuously find new and creative ways to generate income in order to further develop the project
  3. We will work directly with lawyers and web developers to find the best way to protect the product from piracy. ( If you would like to recommend any special talents you know of, please do contact us)

 

التخفيف و مواجهة التحديات:<>1.<>2.<>3.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, do not worry. You can still be part of this positive change and make a difference! How?

  1. Share this with your friends and family, spread the word out
  2. Send this personally to people you know would be interested in contributing to this
  3. Keep us in your mind and in your meditations and prayers :)

 

طرق أخرى للمساعدة إذا كنتم لا تستطيعون المساهمة، لا تقلقوا. لا يزال بإمكانكم أن تكونوا جزءا من هذا التغيير الإيجابي! كيف؟  1. شاركوا هذه الحملة مع العائلة و الاصدقاء2. إرسالوا هذه الحملة شخصيا لاصدقائكم و من تعتقدون ان يكون مهتم بدعم مشروع كهذا 3. تذكرونا في تأملاتكم و دعائكم

 

 

 

 

With much love and gratitude

مع كامل الحب و الامتنان

Shadana Yoga team

فريق شدانا يوغا

* With special thanks for Leaders Organization and Olof Palme International Center for the financial and moral support in creating this video
* My infinite gratitude to Farashe Yoga Ramallah for all the incredible work they do and the constant energy its volunteers keep pouring into it
story_txt:
Short SummaryWhat is Shadana Yoga?An online Yoga and Ayurveda platform that offers Yoga classes, long term lifestyle modification programs using both yoga and Ayurvedic/ nutritional guidance in Arabic.ما هو شدانا يوغا؟موقع الكتروني لليوغا والأيورفيدا يقدم حصص يوغاو برامج مساعدة في تبني عادات صحية جديدة على المدى الطويل و دورات عن اليوغا و التغذية  باستخدام علوم اليوغا و الايرفيدا و التغذية  باللغة العربية. Shadana Yoga also aims to use 10% of the profit into bringing more yoga to areas in need, such as refugee camps and high intensity areas.  وتهدف شدانا يوغا إلى استخدام 10٪ من الربح في جلب المزيد من اليوغا إلى المناطق المهمشة، مثل مخيمات اللاجئين والمناطق عالية التوتر. Why?The StoryThe vision started to get developed as soon as the founder moved back to Palestine; her top priority was to teach in refugee camps or areas with very restricted external spaces / constant clashes. she started volunteering at a great community studio named Farashe Yoga and through that started teaching the first course at a refugee camp.The whole idea came from the women at the refugee camp, they loved the practice and wanted to do more at home, but they couldn’t find anything in Arabic, and that was the spark! لماذا؟القصةلقد بدأت تتطور رؤية المشروع  بمجرد عودة المؤسِسة إلى فلسطين. فكانت أولويتها العليا ان تعلم في مخيمات اللاجئين أو المناطق ذات المساحات الخارجية المقيدة جدا و الاشتباكات المستمرة. فبدأت العمل التطوعي في استوديو مجتمعي رائع يدعى فاراشة ومن خلاله بدأت بتدريس الدورة الأولى في مخيم للاجئين.و هنا نشأت الفكرة من النساء في إحدى المخيمات، فقد أحببن هذه الممارسة و أردن أن تمارسن المزيد في المنزل، و لكن لم يتمكنوا من العثور على أي شي باللغة العربية، و هكذا بدأنا.    The reasons
Providing access to yoga classes where a physical studio may not exist
Providing an at-home solution to doing yoga for people who do not have time to go to a studio
Providing a free option for people who cannot afford to pay for yoga classes
Creating a community that connects people with similar interests across the MENA region
Providing guidance on how to take the first steps to a healthier and more fulfilling lifestyle
Simply providing a tool for people to maintain a daily practice at home
 الاسباب1. توفير حصص يوغا للاماكن التي لا يتوفر فيها استوديو لليوغا.2.توفير حصص اليوغا في كل منزل للأشخاص الذين ليس لديهم الوقت للذهاب إلى الاستوديو.3.توفير خيار مجاني للأشخاص الذين لا يستطيعون دفع ثمن دروس اليوغا.4.إنشاء مجتمع يربط بين الناس ذوي الاهتمامات المتشابهة في الوطن العربي.5.توفير طريق واضحة حول كيفية اتخاذ الخطوات الأولى لنمط حياة أكثر صحة وأكثر سعادة.6.ببساطة توفير أداة للناس للحفاظ على الممارسة اليومية في المنزل. Why Refugees?The storyGrowing up in Palestine, under constant bombing, shooting and curfews the owner had personally experienced what it means to feel unsafe in one's own body, trapped with no space around, only when she was given this gift she started feeling space and safety within. Her personal mission has become to humbly share this gift with the world, especially with people who have been through similar experiences. Yoga has incredible physical benefits for disease prevention, disease management and in some cases healing diseases! It empowers us to take control over our own well-being, and of course, it is much cheaper, and with no side effects!  اللاجئين؟ لماذا؟القصةلقد عاشت المؤسِّسة طفولتها في فلسطين، في ظل القصف المستمر، وإطلاق النار وحظر التجول، و نتج لديها فهم بمعني الشعور بعدم الأمان، و الاختناق، حتى أُعطِيت هذه الهدية(اليوغا) بدأت تشعر بالمساحة الداخلية و السلام و الامان. فأصبح لديها  اهتمام خاص بمشاركة هذه الهدية مع العالم بكل ما تيسر لها، وخاصة مع الناس الذين مروا بتجربة مماثلة.  لليوغا فوائد جسدية كثيرة للوقاية من الأمراض، والتحكم بالأمراض وفي بعض الحالات الشفاء التام! كما انها أداة  تمكين تساعدنا على اخذ صحتنا بيدنا و البدء بالتغيير الايجابي، و من دون أعراض جانبية . كما يقول المثل " درهم وقاية خير من قنطار علاج"  The reasons:
Provide tools for people to take their own step into feeling the space within where outer space does not exist
Allow people to take control over their own health in a cheap or even free way
The closeness the founder feels to post-traumatic cases due to personal experiences
الأسباب1. توفير الأدوات لاتخاذ الخطوة الاولى للشعور بالمساحة الداخلية في الأماكن التي لا يوجد فيها مساحة خارجية.2. تقديم الادوات و التوجيه السليم للعناية بالصحة.3. إحساس و مرور المؤسِسة بتجارب مماثلة.  This campaign aims to work in both directions, provide the MENA region with accessible yoga classes, guided meditations and simple health tips in their own mother tongue for free, and offer paid services including but not limited to courses, packages dedicated to prevention of certain diseases such as diabetes hypertension and management of others such as hypertension, chronic stress and different stages of diabetes and some physical projects. It then aims to use 10% of the profits made from selling packages to finance more work in refugee camps and other marginalized areas.By helping us create this, you will be helping millions of people around the world find the tools they could be looking for but have no access to. تهدف هذه الحملة إلى العمل في كلا الاتجاهين، احداهما توفير حصص و دورات يوغا ، وتأمل ونصائح صحية بسيطة في لغتنا الأم مجاناً، و الجانب الاخر يقدم خدمات مدفوعة الاجر  كحُزم مخصصة للوقاية من بعض الأمراض مثل ارتفاع ضغط الدم و السكري وسُبل التعامل مع أمراض أخرى  مثل ارتفاع ضغط الدم، والإجهاد و التوتر المُزمن و غيرهم. ويهدف بعد ذلك إلى استخدام 10٪ من الارباح لتمويل المزيد من العمل في مخيمات اللاجئين وغيرها من المناطق المهمشة.  من خلال مساعدتنا في إنشاء هذا المشروع، انتم فعليا تساعدون الكثير من الناس في جميع أنحاء العالم العربي في العثور على موارد و معلومات مساعدة قد تكون ما يحتاجون اليه.     What We Need & What You Get*  Due to the incredible support of people offering their services, we now need 2000 USD to create 33 videos and a webpage as a start . Consisting of:Stage One: First batch of free videos (Offered for free)- 7 day morning yoga challenge -3 yoga therapy videos: Yoga for healthy digestion, Yoga for spinal health and yoga for relaxation- 3 Ayurvedic videos: simple tips for a healthier daily lifeماذا نحتاج و على ماذا ستحصلون  بعد استقبال دعم بعض الاشخاص بتوفير بعض الخدمات مجانا نحن الان بحاجة الى 2000 دولار أمريكي لإنشاء 33 مقطع فيديو و موقع الكتروني كبداية. تتكون الفيديوهات من: المرحلة الأولى: حُزمة من الفيديوهات المجانية و تتكون من:(سيقدم مجانا) -برنامج يوغا صباحي لمدة سبعة ايام 3 دروس متخصصة باليوغا العلاجية: يوغا لجهاز هضمي صحي ، اليوغا للصحة العمود الفقري، ويوغا للاسترخاء    ، نصائح غذائية للمساعدة في الهضم و  لصحة الاسنان و غيرهمفيديوهات أيوفيدرية: نصائح بسيطة لحياة صحية 3  Stage Two: First package- A 10 week spinal health package: this includes 10 yoga classes for each week, nutrition talks and a number of supporting tools to help individuals in maintaining their lifestyle modifications. المرحلة الثانية: الحُزمة الأولى-حٌزمة سلامة العمود الفقري و التخلص من أوجاع الظهر، و تتكون من برنامج لمدة 10 أسابيع يتكون من 10 حصص يوغا لكل أسبوع و محاضرات عن التغذية للحفاظ على عمود فقري و جهاز عصبي صحي و سليم مع عدد من الأدوات الداعمة للمساعدة في الحفاظ على التغير في العادات الغذائية و الحياتية.What We Need:2000 USD broken down as follows:- video production, (offered for free) this will go to the video producers of shooting and editing 13 videos including yoga classes and Ayurvedic tips helpful in our daily life, and 20 videos including yoga, ayurveda and nutrition videos for the first diabetes management package.- 500 USD Web development - 1500 USD Marketing: A good product can only be known with good marketing, this marketing campaign will aim to reach different areas in the Arab world through online advertisingما نحتاج:2000 دولار موزعة على النحو التالي:-  انتاج الفيديوهات (عرض علينا مجانا)، وهذا المبلغ موجه إلى منتجي الفيديو و هي تتضمن33 فيديو: 13 فيديو مجاني ،موزع بين حصص اليوغا و  نصائح الايورفيدا، و 20 فيديو لأول حُزمة لصحة الظهر و العمود الفقري.-500 دولار  لتكوين الصفحة الالكترونية- 1500 دولار للتسويق: للوصول للناس و تعريفهم عن الموقع  يجب ان يكون لدينا خطة تسويق قوية، وسوف تهدف هذه الحملة التسويقية للوصول إلى مناطق مختلفة في العالم العربي من خلال الاعلان على الانترنت Priority of funds will go on creating the product (the videos and web development). الأولوية للأموال ستركز على  تكوين المنتج (أشرطة الفيديو وتطوير الصفحة الالكترونية).The ImpactYour contribution to this project will help millions of the Arabic speaking world have access to tools they may have been waiting to find in their own mother tongue, in addition to its inevitable effect on bringing more yoga for free to areas of high intensity.
Empowering people to make decisions from a balanced state of mind
Bring back ancient methods of healing
More balanced and calm society
More self-empowered society
Reaching a larger audience
التأثيرستساهم مساعدتكم في هذا المشروع الملايين من الناس حول  العالم العربي في الحصول على الأدوات التي ربما كانوا ينتظرون العثور عليها بلغتهم الأم، بالإضافة إلى تأثيره الحتمي على جلب المزيد من اليوغا مجانا إلى المناطق المهمشة.التمكين من إتخاذ القرارات النابعة عن ذهن هادئ و واضح-إعادة الأساليب القديمة للشفاء. -مجتمع أكثر توازناً وهدوءاً.-الوصول إلى جمهور أكبر- Risks & ChallengesWe view our biggest risks and challenges to be in the below fields:
The fear of Yoga being closely related to a different religion
The inability to continue the funds for the project
The piracy of sold products
 المخاطر والتحدياتلقد وجدنا أن أكبر المخاطر والتحديات التي من الممكن ان نواجهها تكمن في المجالات التالية: الخوف من اليوغا من الناحية الدينية. -عدم القدرة على المواصلة تمويل المشروع-قرصنة الحُزم المباعة-How we can mitigate these challenges:
Most women we work with in refugee camps come from a religious background, hence we will create a video showing people from different faiths talking about the benefits they have found by practicing and yoga's positive influence on their own faith
The paid packages are the way we see the project ensuring its continuity; hence after establishing a sense of familiarity and trust within the audience we can introduce our first package and continue the project from there. We also aim to continuously find new and creative ways to generate income in order to further develop the project
We will work directly with lawyers and web developers to find the best way to protect the product from piracy. ( If you would like to recommend any special talents you know of, please do contact us)
 التخفيف و مواجهة التحديات:<>1.<>2.<>3.   Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute, do not worry. You can still be part of this positive change and make a difference! How?
Share this with your friends and family, spread the word out
Send this personally to people you know would be interested in contributing to this
Keep us in your mind and in your meditations and prayers :)

story:
WHO IS FRANCOIS TESSIER?

François Tessier is a Canadian citizen living in Montreal and has been a Professional Digital Media Producer for over the last 20 years. 

He is also a Complementary Health Therapist. He graduated in 2015 with a Ph.D. in Philosophy in Therapeutic Counseling from The Open International University for Complementary Medicines, (OIUCM), in Sri Lanka.

François masters many different modalities and techniques in Energy Medicine. He is

  • a Reiki Master,
  • an Energetic Harmonization Healing Practitioner,
  • a Certified Quantum-Touch Practitioner
  • and a Pranic Healing Practitioner
  • and a therapeutic counselor.  

He has a professional practice in Montreal, Canada, providing professional care to a large number of patients. His ENERGY HEALING approach has  a great effectiveness in treating people who live with many health conditions: back pain, scoliosis, disc herniation, headaches and migraines, joint problems, various muscles breads, digestion problems, burnout, depression, chronic fatigue, ADHD, epilepsy, fibromyalgia, emotional problems, mental health problems, post-traumatic shock syndrome, general pain management, etc.

In 2014, he visited Sri Lanka for the first time and discovered the existence of the extremely poor living conditions of the people living in SLUMS and Settlements. Their health condition is really bad. 

THE HUMANITARIAN PROJECT

At his return in Canada after this first trip, the idea of starting a humanitarian mission to help these people by providing them free complementary health treatments sparkled in his mind. Since that moment, he went several times in Sri Lanka. He created a Non-Governmental Organization - The Ayubowan Foundation -  that aims to help needy people living in Slums and Settlements in Sri Lanka by providing them free health services.

A first mission took place in 2015. For 10 days, with his friend Gerard Fernando and a group of Sri Lankan Ayurvedic Doctors, they could offer over 600 treatments to the slum dwellers of Mount Lavinia: the result were amazing. At the end of the health camps, the patient were asking when we will be coming back. Francois was using he different techniques in Energy Healing with amazing results in severe cases.

Promoting complementary health care in a humanitarian context is a very innovative approach to service. Few comparable organizations are doing so since it is more common to see NGO promoting classic health approaches such as “Doctors without Borders,” the most known one.

In May 2017, he will return to Sri Lanka to continue his commitment. In this next mission his goal are:

  • Completion of the registration the Ayubowan Foundation into Sri Lankan law and regulation
  • Train acupuncture students with basic energy medicine techniques so that they can use them in a clinical setting with deprived patients who can not afford to buy drugs
  • Train Ayurvedic doctors to use energy medicine techniques to combat specific problems including diabetes and dengue fever
  • Find a suitable building to create a head office and a permanent clinic at the Ayubowan Foundation
  • Meet with the municipal authorities of Mont Lavinia to obtain the operating permits of a humanitarian clinic
  • Performing clinical interventions with residents of a Drug and Alcohol Addict rehabilitation center
  • and many other tasks related to the advancement and develpment of the Ayubowan Foundation in Sri Lanka.

HE NEEDS YOUR SUPPORT

HELP HIM HELP THEM... DONATE, AND SHARE THE MESSAGE...

Thank you!!!

story:
Projeto ‘Gerontologia em Ação’.

Cuidamos dos nossos Idosos! Amamos a Gerontologia!

Este projeto visa combater o isolamento e o sentimento de solidão de alguns idosos em situação de vulnerabilidade social na região de Trás-os-Montes através de intervenção gerontológica especializada e individualizada.

Pretendemos ir ao encontro de alguns idosos em situação de isolamento e melhorar significativamente os seus recursos sociais para um envelhecimento bem-sucedido. A intervenção abrange ações de avaliação gerontológica multidimensional, inclusão digital, animação sociocultural, mediação familiar e institucional e também a captação de conteúdos multimédia lúdicos e elucidativos da mais-valia do trabalho do Gerontólogo para a qualidade de vida dos idosos.

Em termos operacionais a angariação de fundos tem o objetivo de financiar a:

- Contratação em regime de prestação de serviços de dois recém-licenciados no curso de Gerontologia da Escola Superior de Saúde do Instituto Politécnico de Bragança por um período de 6 meses

- Meios e recursos audiovisuais para a realização de um documentário referente à intervenção gerontológica feita

- A edição de um livro sobre prática gerontológica, com base nas metodologias e resultados do projeto de intervenção.

- A realização de um seminário com todos os intervenientes do projeto.

Está já a ser levado a cabo um trabalho de articulação institucional e captação de parcerias e sinergias para maximizar o bem-estar e os ganhos gerados pelos fundos angariados.

Ajude-nos a criar bem-estar a quem mais precisa! Dependemos do seu donativo para tornar este projeto possível.

story:
In simplest terms: WILD MEDICINE SCHOOL will be like Netflix or GaiaTV, but for Plant Medicine teachings. Our platform will bring herbal teachings into your home, reestablishing plant wisdom and oral tradition, into daily life.

Our Story: I'm a budding herbalist, my fiancé Renick is filmmaker, and we were approached by our teacher and friend, Clinical Herbalist/Ethnobotanist, Michael Cottingham, and his love, herbalist Lindsey Orellano, to create WILD MEDICINE SCHOOL.

We are creating WILD MEDICINE SCHOOL as an answer to our deep concern about the state of the world. We believe that many of our modern issues stem from being disconnected, from both the natural world, and ourselves.  That's why we're creating a platform based on the teachings and experiences that have profoundly transformed our lives.

WILD MEDICINE SCHOOL will be a an extensive, plant medicine, video library. A place to: study botanical medicine, learn from a variety of herbal elders, experience oral traditions, and unlock the healing potential of your own backyard... while preserving Plant Wisdom, and Oral Tradition, for future generations! 

Our Miracle: WILD MEDICINE SCHOOL experienced its first divine push when Michael Cottingham offered over 40 hours of video of the late, world-renowned herbalist, Michael Moore, filmed in the field durning the 90's. These teachings are a treasure that need to be digitized, undergo picture and audio restoration, and be shared with the world!

Our Plan:  We plan to launch in several phases. 

Phase 1: (Present)

  • Digitize & Restore Michael Moore footage. 
  • Edit many hours of footage of Michael Cottingham, & Mimi Kamp we've already filmed.
  • Build an online video hosting website/platform to house our videos.
  • Make sure the world knows about us, so this information can be shared.
  • Address the thousands of small details entailed in launching a project of this scope.
  • Launch Platform- Spring 2019

Phase 2: (March 2019- April 2020)

  • Film Michael Cottingham teaching in the field, 4 days, every month, for a year.
  • Film Mimi Kamp in the field.
  • Film Zuni Elder Clifford Mahooty. 
  • Film other Herbal Elders.
  • Film herbal videos such as: botanical cooking, herbal yoga, etc.
  • Edit new footage as it's captured.
  • Release new videos/teachings every month.
  • Create online courses to support and contextualize our video library.
  • Continue marketing to ensure our audience is reached.

Phase 3 (May 2020 and beyond)

  • Continue releasing content.
  • Give birth to a film we have in the works. 
  • Travel outside of the southwest to film plant teaching and oral traditions around the world.
  • Much, much, more!

What We Need:  In truth, we need to raise $30,000 to fully fund phase one. Indiegogo algorithms share campaigns that reach a large percentage of their goal quickly, so it's in our best interest to set our goal as low as possible. That being said, we are asking for $22,000 and hoping we exceed this and reach our $30,000 goal!

Here's the Phase 1 breakdown:

  • $5500- build platform/website/video archive.
  • $1200- Hard drive storage (10 terabytes).
  • $300- Hi8 player to convert Michael Moore tapes.
  • $5000 -Video editing ($50 hr @ 100 hrs).
  • $550- Logo design.
  • $1200-Business startup cost/legal fees.
  • $1800- Marketing (FB & IG adds).
  • $5000- 2 months salary (to cover base expenses prelaunch).
  • $5700- Cost of perk fulfillment.
  • $2300- Indiegogo Fee & CC processing fee.
  • $1,450- roughly 5% held for 6 month's by Indiegogo for refunds.

For a total of $30,000

What YOU Get:

We are OVER-THE-MOON excited about sharing our perks with you! It was our intention to over-deliver at every reward level. Most of these rewards stack on the previous perk, so there is tremendous VALUE in each reward. There is something for everyone, regardless of budget, or herbal experience level. We are confident you will find something you LOVE among our herb walks, classes, tutorials and more.

PLEASE NOTE: All of our in person herb classes require some easy hiking. Our Zuni Adventure perk requires quite a bit of moderate hiking.

Please reach out if you have any questions about our beautiful perks.  

Final Musings:

We believe in the transformative and healing power of plants. We are deeply grateful to all the Herbal Elders, Wisdom Keepers, and Carriers of Oral Tradition that brought this information to the present moment. WE KNOW IT CAN HEAL THE WORLD, and we will do our best to give it wings..

PLEASE SUPPORT US! 

How You Can Help:

  • Donate today! Every little bit helps!
  • Share our campaign with your Friends, Family & on Social Media!
  • Share within Herbalism & Plant Medicine communities!

THANK YOU SO MUCH!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Matt and I am a BSA Life Scout in Central Ohio.  In my path to Eagle I have selected a project that will benefit potentially thousands of homeless guests at one of the largest shelters in Columbus, OH.  I will be building a Meditation Garden for the guests to reflect on their lives and the days events.  It will be a place of peace and contemplation.

What We Need & What You Get

To complete the project, we will need to purchase benches for sitting, a masonry boarder, a crushed stone surface, rearrange some shrubs and carve 4 large limestone slabs with the words "Hope", "Faith", "Love", and "Peace".  We will also be feeding volunteers in the project.  The current estimates for the materials and food is $2,500.00.  We will have more than enough labor to complete the project.  The Garden will be completed. 

The Impact

Having a place to reflect can be very therapeutic for residents at the shelter.  This shelter sees thousands of guests each year.  As the newly homeless can feel very defeated and sad about their lives at the time, this garden will provide a peaceful setting to get perspective and needed meditation.  The staff will be able to incorporate this space into their efforts to make each guest as independent as possible. 

Challenges

The biggest challenge that this project faces is the fund raising.  It is an ambitious project in materials and scope, but ultimately I think it is achievable with your donation.  As a scout I have a large pool of volunteers from which to draw from, but not a lot of donors.  With your help we can positively touch the lives of a lot of people  at this shelter. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Homelessness is a serious problem in cities all across the United States.  However, Homelessness is a problem that can be overcome.  Please consider volunteering at a shelter near you and help some one in need.

story:
Dearest Beloveds,

My name is Alyssa and I have recently moved to Boulder, CO, into the great unknown, to dive deeper on my path. My grandest passion is my crystal and sound healing practice (crystal singing bowls, drum, rattle, didgeridoo), where I also incorporate reiki and shamanic techniques I have learned along the way. I create crystal elixirs as well- soaked in moon/sun light, a highly activated crystal sacred geometry mandala and bathed in singing bowl and sound vibrations, potent prayers, healing songs and intentions.

It has been one of my deepest prayers, held long and tenderly in my heart, to open myself ever wider to greater connection with our elders and wisdom keepers of this Earth- to be graced by grandmothers and women from every corner of the planet -to walk with them, sing with them, be blessed by their teachings and healing work.  There is nothing as sacred and special as to entwine our united hearts, medicines and visions for a healthy, harmonious planet though prayer and ceremony, and the 13 Indigenous Grandmothers hold important information and guidance for us in this deeply transitional times. The opportunity to work so closely with a genuine and powerful group of Divine feminine, to dance in passionate intention for the well-being of all living things, with the grace and potency of my sisters- this gathering is a dream come true.

Furthermore, it has been a mission and passion of mine to dedicate and devote myself to the healing of this Mother Earth and all of her creatures, especially the waters.  I tend to my water altar with reverence and infinite love and pour my healing elixirs into our waters all over the world.  The water and its vitality is incredibly important to me, and it has become a very sacred and deep mission of mine to activate the purity of the waters in whatever way I can.  This amazing opportunity to join in united, collective love to bless the water already makes my spirit celebrate and dance in ecstatic joy.

I feel this gathering of love so deeply in my soul. I know that I’m meant to be there. I have been asked to be the steward of this blessing by my community in Boulder, to bring back wisdom and gifts to share with all my sisters and brothers who are not able to attend. The importance of my presence at this ceremony is not only one of my own growth and awakening, but one of service- to share the riches of ancient wisdom and tradition with all who wish to receive.

And on a soul level, I also feel that this gathering will serve greatly in activating and assisting me to further tap into my own medicine woman self, where I may be able to better serve all beings in a more illuminated and empowered way, inspiring others to grow, heal and awaken, gracefully and effortlessly. There is nothing more that I want in my heart than to be of service for the benefit and healing of ALL.

 With courage and hope in my heart, I humbly bow in humility and prayer and ask that you may help me attend this gathering with a donation. The gathering itself is $600 (for the cost of its production and flying the Grandmothers in from all over the world, and to support the furthering of their work) and getting there will probably be around another $200-300 or so, depending on how I get there (by plane or car). I am capable of contributing what I can, but without a very steady source of income at the moment, I need your extra help to make this dream a reality. Anything helps! And if you cannot make a contribution, please help spread the word to others who can!

For your heart-felt generosity and compassion, I know this blessing will return to you a thousand-fold. This gift will extend far and wide- its potency will ripple grandly as I spread this wisdom and love to all, with joy in my heart.  I bow in infinite gratitude and deep reverence- please help me make this possible- to welcome the re-birthing of the spring, to celebrate my 29th ring around the sun on March 21st, to create potent healing vibrations for the collective, and to bless the waters with a most beloved community of medicine women, magic makers, peace and harmony bringers. Your support means the world to me!

Bless you, now and always! Thank you, Thank you, Thank you.

With Gratitude, Appreciation and an Infinite Depth of Love,

  Alyssa

(if you would like any more info on this gathering, you can go here http://inthenameofthemother.net/ to find out the details!)

story:
Rose from the Concrete

At Rose From the Concrete (RFC), we aim to respond to our seemingly loveless society with (1) mentorship and (2) investments from the community in the forms of funding, opportunities and services for those who may need it. In the spirit of mutual aid funds, the gathering and redistribution of resources to support peers, we operate under the notion that our community is lacking severely in regard to our most fundamental needs (esteem, mental wellness, education, housing security etc) but that we have the power and the resources among us to fill this gap if we act collectively. 

Our Aim

At RFC, we believe that the white-supremacist, capitalist patriarchy that we inhabit has harmful impacts on our communities, especially our youth, in two specific ways: 1)  by indoctrinating us all to adapt mindsets of anti-blackness, inferiority, and hyperproductivity that hinder one’s ability to have sound mental health and 2) by limiting our financial and material resources thus impeding on the financial and physiological security that is essential to one’s growth and self actualization, according to Maslow’s hierarchy of needs. 

Thus our work, in response, is two fold. We aim to offer mentorship that explores and advises our mentees in expressing true love as defined by bell hooks in her book All About Love, the extension of oneself for another’s or their own growth. Unlike typical conceptions of love as an emotion, Rose from the Concrete asserts that declarations of love are inseparable from the behaviors that accompany them. Here at RFC, we shall rely on the motto, ‘If I truly love myself, my close ones, and my community, I’m going to do what I can to support their growth.’ Thus, our primary goal is to teach healthy schema of love to empower others, including members and nonmembers, to love themselves fully and actively spread LOVE through community engagement.

Second, we recognize that basic financial and physiological security is a prerequisite to mentees and members being able to properly learn and implement what we teach. How can we expect anyone to have proper eating and sleeping schedules, essential self love practices, when their circumstances prevent these from being an option or a priority? Thus, we also aim to crowdsource essential resources from community members in the form of funds, opportunities and affordable services so that recipients can have the security to prioritize love in its truest form. 

Our Model 

Our organization is composed of four types of members: a cluster of committees that enable the core work of mentorship and redistribution to happen properly; a network of partners that support org beneficiaries (committee members, mentors, mentees (and community members)) in a multifaceted nature; mentors; and mentees.

In order to be a committee member one must first, be placed on a committee corresponding to interest and skill set, and then go through the RFC curriculum where we teach our core content around love. The latter is a requirement because committee members are expected to benefit from the program that they work for and because they will be better able to support and advocate for RFC because their own participation grants them a clear understanding of our work. After gaining this understanding, they attend weekly committee meetings to work on tasks essential to the daily flow of the org. 

As mentors, community members volunteer to be a direct point of contact and support for mentees as they navigate our curriculum on love but also, in a bidirectional manner, they are a focal point for the org, letting us know the needs of our mentees so that we can constantly be responding directly to them. The partnerships that we aim to foster will be rooted in feedback we get from these mentors. Thus, it is a requirement that they go through the same RFC curriculum that committee members study and live by, but also that they go through extra training in order to: 1) learn how to be active listeners and effective mentors and 2) learn the expectations and proper boundaries for the mentor- mentee relationships. 

To become an RFC mentee, one must commit to the completion of three years within the program, where they’ll study self love during the first year, interpersonal love during the second, and community love in the third. This is the main requirement as we don’t aim to be selective nor exclusionary in our teachings nor the distribution of resources. If someone actively wants to do the work to better themselves and their communities, we want to welcome them with open arms. Furthermore, after completion of the three year program, mentees have the opportunity to: 1) become a mentor 2) become a committee member or 3) enter the network as someone who offers support to org beneficiaries in some way. This is aimed at maintaining the sustainability of the org but also its impact. Those that receive its benefits are expected to pay it forward either within the organization or outside of it. 

Finally, network members are those that offer a service, an opportunity or funding to committee members, mentors or mentees. Examples of these partners can be licensed therapists that offer free or more affordable services to our members, legal counselors that can support mentees and their families that are facing such obstacles, tutors, and folks from countless other professions and walks of life. The aim is to have a space for any type of person to be able to contribute. In return, network members have access to our learnings, teachings and curriculum materials so that they may grow with us in regard to how we show love to ourselves, those around us and our community members.

Here at RFC, we shall rely on the motto, ‘If I truly love myself, my close ones, and my community, I’m going to do what I can to support their growth.’ Thus, our primary goal is to teach healthy schema of love to empower others, including members and nonmembers, to love themselves fully and actively spread LOVE through community engagement.
Second, we recognize that basic financial and physiological security is a prerequisite to mentees and members being able to properly learn and implement what we teach. How can we expect anyone to have proper eating and sleeping schedules, essential self love practices, when their circumstances prevent these from being an option or a priority? Thus, we also aim to crowdsource essential resources from community members in the form of funds, opportunities and affordable services so that recipients can have the security to prioritize love in its truest form. 
Our Model 
Our organization is composed of four types of members: a cluster of committees that enable the core work of mentorship and redistribution to happen properly; a network of partners that support org beneficiaries (committee members, mentors, mentees (and community members)) in a multifaceted nature; mentors; and mentees.
In order to be a committee member one must first, be placed on a committee corresponding to interest and skill set, and then go through the RFC curriculum where we teach our core content around love. The latter is a requirement because committee members are expected to benefit from the program that they work for and because they will be better able to support and advocate for RFC because their own participation grants them a clear understanding of our work. After gaining this understanding, they attend weekly committee meetings to work on tasks essential to the daily flow of the org. 
As mentors, community members volunteer to be a direct point of contact and support for mentees as they navigate our curriculum on love but also, in a bidirectional manner, they are a focal point for the org, letting us know the needs of our mentees so that we can constantly be responding directly to them. The partnerships that we aim to foster will be rooted in feedback we get from these mentors. Thus, it is a requirement that they go through the same RFC curriculum that committee members study and live by, but also that they go through extra training in order to: 1) learn how to be active listeners and effective mentors and 2) learn the expectations and proper boundaries for the mentor- mentee relationships. 
To become an RFC mentee, one must commit to the completion of three years within the program, where they’ll study self love during the first year, interpersonal love during the second, and community love in the third. This is the main requirement as we don’t aim to be selective nor exclusionary in our teachings nor the distribution of resources. If someone actively wants to do the work to better themselves and their communities, we want to welcome them with open arms. Furthermore, after completion of the three year program, mentees have the opportunity to: 1) become a mentor 2) become a committee member or 3) enter the network as someone who offers support to org beneficiaries in some way. This is aimed at maintaining the sustainability of the org but also its impact. Those that receive its benefits are expected to pay it forward either within the organization or outside of it. 
Finally, network members are those that offer a service, an opportunity or funding to committee members, mentors or mentees. Examples of these partners can be licensed therapists that offer free or more affordable services to our members, legal counselors that can support mentees and their families that are facing such obstacles, tutors, and folks from countless other professions and walks of life. The aim is to have a space for any type of person to be able to contribute. In return, network members have access to our learnings, teachings and curriculum materials so that they may grow with us in regard to how we show love to ourselves, those around us and our community members.

story:
Who We Are...

Friends of Ferdinand is a NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION serving animals with special needs.  Our primary program RESCUE TO RECOVERY brings together last chance animals from shelters, auction houses and humane societies with women recently released from California's prisons and jails.

The Director of Friends of Ferdinand is Janice Jordan, a woman with 25 years clean and sober who co-founded and worked with Ferdinand's Familia, San Diego's All-Species Animal Rescue.  Recognizing the importance of a drug-free facility and safe space, especially for women in recovery, Ms. Jordan branched off creating Friends of Ferdinand serving special needs animals while actively addressing women-oriented issues and concerns .  Motivated by the success of Ferdinand's Familia and the amazing Pitbulls and Parolees program, Janice put together the 2 ideas to serve all animal species struggling with survival and women struggling with sobriety.

Raising money for a Rescue Ranch in North County San Diego is important for both animals and humans.  A safe, secure no-kill ranch for the animals offers growth, development and the possibility of finding a perfect permanent home.  A drug-free ranch offers safety, security and the freedom to process and express issues relating to formerly incarcerated female clients.

Why do women need their own space?  CONSIDER THIS:  Up to 85% of formerly incarcerated women have been sexually harassed or assaulted and most by people they know.  A non-threatening and caring environment with trained staff and animal companionship is the first step to healing wounds of betrayal, violence and distrust.  YOUR DONATION TODAY GIVES BOTH ANIMALS AND HUMANS HOPE!  HOPE FOR A BEAUTIFUL LIFE!
 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

We have bought a ranch in the North County area of San Diego!  It is a perfect location for the animals, a location of peace, security and beauty.  To keep the ranch running smoothy, we need your support!  Our End of Summer Special and Back to School Campaign goal is to raise $25,000.  The money raised from this campaign WILL KEEP US UP AND RUNNING AND OUR DOORS OPEN!

As a donor YOU WILL BE THE FIRST TO BE INVITED TO FRIENDS OF FERDINAND'S RESCUE RANCH OPEN HOUSE!  A day of food, animal companionship and meeting the women who will benefit from the program!

ALL FUNDS RECEIVED, regardless of the amount secures the sanctuary and daily care of the special needs animals.  If more money than our request is received, we will use funds for a new horse trailer and an account for farm feed and supplies.  ALL DONATIONS ARE WELCOMED!  ***Indiegogo ACCEPTS CREDIT CARDS-sorry, no debit cards.
 

YOUR HELP IS IMPORTANT!

Great gains have been made with the safety of animal life.  Gains have been made in rehabilitation over incarceration.  IT IS TIME TO TAKE THE NEXT STEP!  It is time for healing and moving forward in animal education and placement and human education and recovery.

Janice Jordan has 25 years clean and sober from drugs and alcohol.  Ms. Jordan has Bachelor Degrees in Women's Studies and Africana Studies; Minors in American Indian and Religious Studies from San Diego State University.  Her Master's Degree from Springfield College is in Community Counseling Psychology focusing on the impact of the environment on the development of the individual.  Ms. Jordan also co-found Ferdinand's Familia, San Diego's All Species Animal Rescue and Sanctuary.  For over 10 years she was a liaison between Ferdinand's Familia, government run shelters, many of California's Humane Societies and other rescues in California and Arizona.  For almost 15 years she has worked part-time at a residential recovery home for women on parole carrying her message of animal compassion and veganism to the women in her care.

YOUR DONATION gives Janice and volunteer staff an opportunity to offer women a location of peace, quiet, self-reflection and healing.

 

THE ROAD AHEAD

Raising money isn't easy.  There are so many great people doing great things.  YOUR TAX-DEDUCTIBLE DONATION to this great and amazing project will assist the safety of both animals and humans.  Your compassion allows the healing to begin...
 

THE WORKING-CLASS

Recognizing the millions of choices people make everyday, YOU STOPPING TO READ THIS INFORMATION IS A GREAT CHOICE.  Maybe you can't donate today-BUT YOU CAN SPREAD THE WORD VIA EMAIL, PHONE, THE COFFEE HOUSE, SOCIAL MEDIA and TEXT.  Please take a moment to share our story.  Support from all communities is welcome!

story:
Good Sweat is an indoor-cycling studio opening in 2019 that will not only be the most motivating place to get your sweat on, but will also be the first social impact studio of its kind in the Washington DC area. Good Sweat will take your fitness to the next level with the newest bikes, best coaches, and most challenging rides. Plus, a percentage of every single purchase will be invested in the community (e.g., through donations to nonprofits, or hosting subsidized rides for those who lack resources).
Our goal for this campaign is to raise $25,000 in 25 days! We must raise all $25,000 to get any of the donations and we will use the funds raised towards our stationary bikes and buildout to deliver the best indoor-cycling studio in the area. We found the perfect place for our flagship studio in Arlington, VA and this place has such potential! All it needs is some renovations, top of the line metered bikes, shower/locker area, kick-ass studio lighting, a boomin’ audio system...and this facelift will take time, money, and patience, but with your help, we know we can get there. So we're here today to ask you to join the Good Sweat movement by contributing! 


I'm Ali, the founder and CEO of Good Sweat, and I want you to help kickstart our first studio. I came up with the idea for Good Sweat Studio while working as a local DC area nonprofit Executive Director by day and an indoor cycling instructor by night. I started thinking about so many social impact brands I supported (like Warby Parker), and the fact that none were specifically in the fitness industry (beyond one-off charity classes). After over 5 years of teaching indoor cycling in the DC area (all throughout my pregnancy too!), I realized I was onto something. My classes grew super popular, with waitlists on the regular...and I had built a community of loyal riders who all believe in the importance of getting that Good Sweat. 

Since the inception of Good Sweat, we have done two pop-up workouts, also known as “Good Sweat Seshes”, that have had over 100 attendees. In our online community we have over 500 followers standing behind Good Sweat before we’ve even opened. This Good Sweat movement has inspired people to get serious about fitness and make a difference in their local community. 

Help us reach our goal and raise enough to open our first studio in 2019! Every donation makes a difference, thank you for joining the Good Sweat movement.

story:
RESUMEN/ SUMMARY

Soy Lucy Ibañez y trabajo como psicoterapeuta especializada en sexualidad y en el trabajo con la comunidad LGBT en Perú. Tengo más de 10 años de experiencia ayudando a otros con mi trabajo y en los últimos años me he enfocado en trabajar principalmente con la población LGBT. He tenido la suerte de poder ayudar a muchas personas, sin embargo recibo mensajes desde toda Latinoamérica de personas pidiéndome ayuda, ya que para la mayoría acceder a profesionales informados e inclusivos en este tema, no siempre es tarea fácil. Por ello pensé, si quizás no puedo brindar psicoterapia a todas las personas que me escriben, ¿cómo puedo ayudarlas? Así nació la idea de este libro, una guía que he escrito donde incluyo los diferentes pasos y herramientas que trabajo con mis pacientes LGBT. Esto los ayuda a informarse, conocerse, aceptarse y enfrentar retos que pueden vivir como lesbianas, gais, bisexuales o transgénero. De esa forma pueden tener cada día una vida con más felicidad, una vida en la que comienzan a decir “Elijo ser yo”.

I am Lucy Ibañez and I work as a psychotherapist specialized in sexuality and in working with the LGBT community in Peru. I have more than 10 years of experience helping others with my work, and in the last few years I have focused on working primarily with the LGBT community. I’ve been lucky enough to help many people, however I recieve messages from people from all of Latin America who asked me for help, because for most of them access to informed and inclusive professionals in this topic, is not always an easy task. So I thought, if perhaps I can’t provide psychotherapy to all the people that write me, how can I help them? That’s how the idea of this book came up, a guide that I’ve written where I’ve included the different steps and tools I use with my LGBT clients. This help them learn to know themselves, accept themselves and overcome challenges that they can live as lesbians, gays, bisexuals or transgender. That way each day they can have a life with more happiness, a life in which they begin to say "I choose to be me".

 

ETAPA DEL PRODUCTO/ PRODUCT STAGE

Ya escribí la guía, ¡así que no estoy lejos de lograr mi meta! Con tu ayuda podré financiar el proceso de edición, producción e impresión del libro, y así lograr que la guía llegue a las personas que lo necesitan.

I have already written the guide, so I'm not far from achieving my goal! With your help I will be able to finance the process of editing, production and printing of the book, and ensure that the guide reaches the people who need it.

 

¿CUÁL ES MI META CON LOS FONDOS?/ WHAT IS MY GOAL WITH THIS FUNDS?

Mi meta es producir y publicar el libro en versión impresa y en versión e-book. Si no llegara a conseguir todos los fondos, solo se realizará la versión e-book.

My goal is to produce and publish the book in printed and e-book version. If I didn’t get all the funds, only the e-book version will be published.

 

DETALLE DEL USO DE LOS FONDOS/ DETAIL OF THE USE OF FUNDS

Producción/ Production: $1160

Edición/Editing: $520

Corrección de estilo/ Style correction: $370

Diseño/ Design: $420

Ilustración/ Illustration: $500

Impresión/ Printing: $5500

Trámites de registro legal/ Legal registration procedures: $700

 

EL IMPACTO/ THE IMPACT

La situación de la población LGBT en Latinoamérica puede ser muy difícil, solo en Perú el 90% de la población LGBTIQ ha sido víctima de violencia en sus hogares, espacios públicos o instituciones educativas. Por eso colaborar con la publicación de esta guía significa poder colaborar con una herramienta de educación y salud emocional que puede salvar la vida de una persona que esté pasando por momentos difíciles y así hacer realmente un cambio en su vida.

The situation of LGBT people in Latin America can be very difficult, only in Peru 90% of the LGBTIQ population has been victim of violence in their homes, public places or educational institutions. That is why the publication of this guide means being able to collaborate with a tool of education and emotional health that can save the life of a person who is going through difficult times and this way really make a change in their life.

 

¿MÁS INFORMACIÓN SOBRE MI? / MORE INFORMATION ABOUT ME?

Soy Coordinadora de Proyectos de Psicología en It Gets Better Perú. Llevo 10 años de experiencia como psicoterapeuta. Tengo una Maestría en Sexología y Terapia Sexual en INEFOC (Madrid) y certificaciones en Terapia Racional Emotiva Conductual en Albert Ellis Institute (New  York) y Terapia Afirmativa LGBT en American Association for Marriage & Family Therapy (California).  Además soy docente en la Universidad de Lima, Perú y entreno a otros psicoterapeutas a nivel nacional.

I am the Psychology Projects Coordinator at It Gets Better Peru. I've been working as a psychotherapist for 10 years. I have a Master's degree in Sexology and Sexual Therapy at INEFOC (Madrid) and certifications in Rational Emotional Behavioral Therapy at Albert Ellis Institute (New York) and LGBT Affirmative Therapy at American Association for Marriage & Family Therapy (California). I am also a professor at University of Lima, Peru and trained other psychotherapists at national level.

Haz click aquí para leer mi curriculum/ Click here to read mi currriculum  bit.ly/linkedinlucyibanez

Haz click aquí para conocer mi blog informativo sobre sexualidad, género y LGBT. / Click here to know my informative blog about sexuality, gender and LGBT https://www.facebook.com/enelcuarto/

 

¿QUÉ HACER SI NO PUEDO HACER UNA CONTRIBUCIÓN? / WHAT CAN I DO IF I CAN'T MAKE A CONTRIBUTION?

Otra forma en la que puedes colaborar con este proyecto es compartiendo la mayor cantidad de veces posible la campaña con tus amigos, por redes sociales, mail o simplemente contarlo a todas las personas que puedas. Gracias!

Another way in which you can collaborate with this project is to share as many times as possible the campaign with your friends, by social media, mail o just telling it to all the people you can. Thanks!

story:
The prognosis isn’t good. This is an extremely aggressive and rare disease that does not respond to chemotherapy or radiotherapy. The median survival for a patient with T-PLL is just seven and a half months.

But there’s hope. Our writer-friend is getting the best care the NHS can give at the Royal Shrewsbury Hospital: a 12-week, hard-hitting regime of drugs to knock out the immune system entirely, followed by a re-boot from a bone marrow transplant. Next year there’s the possibility of a trial led by a top consultant at the Royal Marsden Hospital to find an improved, targeted drug and increase the odds of survival – IF enough funds can be raised.

With characteristic kindness, our colleague wants to do everything she can to help future sufferers of this disease to improve their odds of surviving it.  That’s why this year she's asked us to dedicate our charitable activity to raising funds for the clinical trial to help find a cure for T-PLL. Even though the trial is not until next year, we need to raise money for it NOW, so that it’s ready to go ahead on schedule. It's literally a matter of life or death. 

Every year Talent Campers face their fears and limitations through exercises that help to overcome them. You’ve heard about courage under fire, well, this exercise calls for courage over fire. Class members have committed to walking across hot coals – 1,500 degrees! A powerful expression of moving beyond whatever it is that is holding us back.

Please give whatever you can, as it will make a huge difference. A miracle is more likely to occur, if we all take positive steps to make it happen - no matter how small each individual step. 

Thank you for supporting this important cause!

Next year there’s the possibility of a trial led by a top consultant at the Royal Marsden Hospital to find an improved, targeted drug and increase the odds of survival – IF enough funds can be raised.With characteristic kindness, our colleague wants to do everything she can to help future sufferers of this disease to improve their odds of surviving it.  That’s why this year she's asked us to dedicate our charitable activity to raising funds for the clinical trial to help find a cure for T-PLL. Even though the trial is not until next year, we need to raise money for it NOW, so that it’s ready to go ahead on schedule. It's literally a matter of life or death. Every year Talent Campers face their fears and limitations through exercises that help to overcome them. You’ve heard about courage under fire, well, this exercise calls for courage over fire. Class members have committed to walking across hot coals – 1,500 degrees! A powerful expression of moving beyond whatever it is that is holding us back.Please give whatever you can, as it will make a huge difference. A miracle is more likely to occur, if we all take positive steps to make it happen - no matter how small each individual step. Thank you for supporting this important cause!

story:
The Lord Shiva Hindu Temple was started in 2011, over 4 years ago. The Lord Shiva Hindu Temple is a community service organization, bringing the Indian Community together and providing them a social and cultural platform.







Every year temple arranges various cultural activities including major Indian festivals like Shivratri, Holi, Krishna Janamastmi, Rathyatra, Dusshera and Diwali.



Temple urgently needs Euro 5000/- for renovation to maintain the facility. There are wear and tear in the temple which must be attended to by 15th Jan 2015.

story:
Hello. My name is Ruy Hinostroza, I'm from Peru and I have a dream.
I want to make a change in the world, I want peace in the world, just like you do and lots of people do. I believe that every single person in the world can be peaceful, if they use some tools.
I'm convinced and also it's been proved, that meditation helps to achieve inner peace by calming the mind and distracting thoughts.
And today I have very good news to give.
I've been selected for a fellowship in Thailand for a Meditation Retreat for people from all around the world, that will be on a Thai island, from August 11 to 24 this year thanks to Peace Revolution.
Peace Revolution is a Thai NGO, founded by Buddhist monks in one of their temples, whose mission is to promote meditation as a tool to achieve inner peace, regardless of any religion or belief. They receive donations to make this possible, and have "peace agents" all around the world working to achieve peace in the world.
The retreat consists of two weeks on a southern island in Thailand where one can learn to calm the mind in an environment of peace.
If you want more information on this, you can enter: https://peacerevolution.net/docs/en/peace-revol... and if you want to apply, it is very easy, just choose the type of scholarship you want to apply to and follow the steps on the website, there are several retreats each year and one for artists.

Now, this scholarship awarded by Peace Revolution covers lodging, meals and local transportation during those two weeks, and people between 18 and 30 years receive the 50% of the air ticket to Thailand.

This is why I need your help. Since I started the process to apply for this fellowship I've been saving and working hard. But as you can understand, the life of a musician in Peru (at least in my case) is not easy and it's difficult to cover costs of daily life and save that much money, a ticket from Peru to Thailand is very expensive.
I want to learn from buddhist monks how can we make a peaceful world and what to do, I want to be able to teach how to meditate to people who needs it, and also to guide meditations to help people to get inner peace. If every each one of us would be peaceful, our society would be different, our world would change.
Help me please to make this possible, this opportunity is very important for me and for others.
Be part of this Peace Supporting Team!
The money raised is entirely to cover airfare, which costs about $ 2000.

Please help me to make this dream true and to spread this cause!

Awards

USD 5

A big THANK YOU for supporting the Peace in the world and also a Meditative song made in Peru, by me, in mp3 format. I just need your e-mail in order to send it.

USD 10

A bigger THANK YOU for supporting Peace in the world! And also I'll send you 3 meditative songs made in Peru, by me, in mp3 format. I just need your e-mail in order to send it.

USD 20

With this contribution I will send you my first musical record, Anahata, which contains 10 meditative songs. I will send the digital version of this album, with the maximum quality. I just need your e-mail. And also a very big THANK YOU!!

USD 40

With this contribution I'll send you a beautiful Peruvian Handmade Quilt and a very big THANK YOU for supporting the peace in the world!!


USD 60

With this contribution you'll receive a Handmade Native American Flute made in Peru. And also a very very big THANK YOU for supporting the peace in the world!

story:
Short Summary

Malandra created The VeganDiva, a platform for holistic living, in 2013 to share her experience in the world of vegan and plant-based nutrition. Her goal is to encourage women of every color to learn more about holistic eating (mind, body, and soul). Her desire to educate small communities, particularly on the value of eating to live and not living to eat, fueled her motivation to write How to be a Holistic Vegan Diva. Although this campaign is geared towards women, men are absolutely welcome to purchase the book and enjoy the full benefits of what this program has to offer! 

Through this 21 Day Meal-Plan Journal, clients will:

  1. Express their creativity by cooking delicious and nutritious vegan meals 
  2. Learn everyday holistic tips, exercises, and spiritual/calming techniques
  3. Become a “vegan on a budget” by tactics like creating grocery lists and how to find local and organic affordable products

This book will offer you:

  • How to monitor what you eat daily/weekly
  • Advice for incorporating more sustainable foods in your daily diet
  • Health coaching
  • Holistic approach to primary foods through spirituality, relationship awareness, physical activity, and career goals
  • Learning recipes, tips and tricks, how-to’s, and solid budgeting techniques

Here is just a taste of what type of recipes you'll receive: 

Gluten-Free Supreme Pizza:

 

Indian-style Vegetable Fried Rice:

 

Gluten-Free Guacamole Burger:

 

    What We Need & What You Get

    Your funds for this project are broken down by:

    • 25% - Time spent writing, finalizing recipe development, and compiling research ($2,500)
    • 25% - Book and campaign design, including food photography, as well as facilitation and coordination of layout and perks ($2,500)
    • 50% - Estimated printing costs for books ($5,000)

    To make this fundraising campaign accessible and exciting, we have some AMAZING perks for our backers - from access to a digital copy of the book one month before its launch, to a catered dinner from the Vegan Diva herself. Check out these unique incentives to the right of your screen or keep scrolling!

      The Impact

      In this day and age, people aren't getting enough nutrients due to their poor eating habits (especially in America). Americans love eating fast food, and thus have the highest heart-disease rate in the world. By taking control of our choices and making sound decisions around food and personal habits, we can help prevent illnesses and make positive impacts on our health. This is especially important for women, who need to feel empowered by an alignment of the body, mind, and soul. How to be a Holistic Vegan Diva will provide a much needed tool in this quest for a sound and holistic lifestyle.

      Risks & Challenges

      Malandra is a vegan chef, a Holistic Health Coach/Consultant (certified in Dec. 2017), and is a firm believer that 'We Are What We Eat'. In 2012, Malandra discovered the world of holistic living because of a sudden personal illness. After a surgery in 2013 she started The VeganDiva to share her journey and educate women on maintaining a healthier lifestyle. Never in a million years did she see herself as vegan! But after realizing how much better her body and mind felt living a holistic lifestyle, she knew she needed to find ways to educate and help people to understand that being vegan doesn't mean a life of boring, tasteless food. The goal of this campaign is to raise enough money to cover the costs of producing How to Become a Vegan Diva, and to continue providing a platform for communities of women who desire a holistic lifestyle, without breaking the bank. Like Malandra, this campaign is a creative fighter that will produce a holistic meal-planning journal, no matter what obstacles we encounter! If we don't reach the campaign goal we will find ways to be creative in reaching our goal of completing the meal-plan journal with whatever funding we do have.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Awareness is just as important as raising money, so if you're unable to make a monetary contribution towards our project but would still like to help, please share our crowdfunding page and help us reach our goal!

Awareness is just as important as raising money, so if you're unable to make a monetary contribution towards our project but would still like to help, please share our crowdfunding page and help us reach our goal!

story:
Hi, I'm Jimena, Peruvian-Argentine and about to turn 40.
How do I introduce myself to you so that you can feel what I feel, to inspire you with what empower me?
Almost two years ago, I left Peru, my country and it wasn't easy at all, but that impulse me to find new paths, also made me dream bigger, meet women and men from different parts of the world. I started to create what is today "Jimena, The Body-Love Coach". Because when I wanted to create my own vision, and connected with the type of coaching that I wanted to do, I also found my own story. Sometimes there are events that we want to forget.

How to summarize it?

A girl who grew up in a macho and violent city that experienced abuse, harassment and sexual violence in the streets, she decided to hide or radically flee from this world, but she definitely has more lives than you can imagine.
That girl is me, I fought with myself, I mistreated and wanted to flee more than once. I hid my body, fed it badly, insulted it, hated it, chose bad relations; Until the day came. Not because we change our lives in one day, but because that day began this great journey,  more than ten years ago.
On my journey, I found my freedom, I discovered my being a woman, my beauty, my power.
From my body connection, my own movement,  listening and releasing, I realized that I was very powerful, and discovered also that I was sexy, sensual, strong, vulnerable, and that I had a very strong connection with people. I realized the power I had in my heart, to listen, to mobilize, to push, to motivate, to inspire. I can assure you that the road has not been easy, and still it is. Sometimes I found myself with doors that blocked me, but I have learned to live with some certainties and with thousands of uncertainties. I learned to travel and get away from people, family, friends. I learned to live in detachment.
In my way, my body has been my ally, after having been my enemy for many years, hurting with words and acts; and for that reason perhaps I undertook to heal it, to love it, to embrace it, and to be his best ally. My friends were the theater, dance, free movement, coaching from a body approach, Yoga, meditation.

In this last two years, I've been creating, my brand: Jimena, The Body-Love Coach in Reston, Virginia. On August I will go to India, to certified as a Yoga instructor, and to continue traveling, connecting, motivating and inspiring women and men like you with my videos, classes, conversations. There are so much pain and criticism in this world, body shaming. Social beliefs of how we should think, behave, be. And for me, the recipe for this change is to focus on "Love" and our body. The more loving we are with our bodies, the more we dedicate ourselves to this relationship. That is why I ask for your support so that you help me to continue creating this awareness with our body, to accompany me on this journey. I need your support with my trip to India and Thailand, and to spread the Body-Love coaching that I am doing online.

story:
My Story

When I was three years old, someone the same age and very close to me died of childhood cancer. Ever since then, I have been trying to help children with cancer, through cutting my hair and donating it to Locks of Love. This year, as part of my M3 Community Project, "Help Children With Cancer," I am aiming to raise awareness about children's cancer in Bermuda. I will be raising money for the Bermuda Cancer and Health Centre, so that the children with cancer can be treated here in Bermuda, instead of overseas.
