story:
Give Massage Geeks a Hand
Have you ever thought to yourself: dang, I’d like to have or gift a massage sometime before the end of 2018? Or maybe you’ve thought: those Massage Geeks, Aislinn and Daniel…. I’d like to give them a gift/ have a cup of coffee/ or support them in some small way? WELL, NOW IS YOUR CHANCE! EVEN BETTER: YOU COULD WIN A PRIZE FOR DOING SO!

Massage Geeks is getting an official massage therapy space in downtown Woodstock. That’s right! A bona fide office space with easy parking and everything! We are so excited, we could spit (but we won’t because that is unhygienic)! This has been our business dream and we are thisclose to having it realized. An independent office space will allow us to market ourselves to a broader community and will offer us a location to continue providing the best orthopedic/therapeutic massage around. We see this as a huge launching point and opportunity for our business.

Why Do We Need This Money?
You may already know this, but building an office space and jumping through bureaucratic hoops is $$$$. We are super pleased to join the City of Woodstock business community, but there are a lot of extra $$s tied to being independent massage therapists within the city limits. We’ve done our best to financially prepare for the transition from home business to legit office space, yet navigating the thicket of red tape has been more challenging than anticipated. Given the bureaucratic timeline of permits, inspections, paperwork, et al, we will be paying our lease for at least a month or two before we can actually begin practicing out of the space. And after that chore is completed, we have some start up costs involved in establishing Massage Geeks as the place to get the best massage in the metro-Atlanta area.

Your generosity can help us realize our business dream. Our goal of $2000 will assist us in covering the costs of:

  • Getting our bureaucratic Ts crossed and Is dotted. Estimated: $300.
  • Furnishing the new office space (we plan to scour yard sales and thrift stores for deals, but these costs do add up!) - $500
  • 2 seated massage chairs; Massage Geeks plans to hire other massage therapists to work some of our larger events in 2018! $200 each; $400 total
  • Marketing expenses as we introduce ourselves to our new community! - $500
  • Massage equipment to provide the best experience possible to our clients including but not limited to:
    • Table extensions/pads for better client comfort. Massage tables are not a one-size-fits-all experience! - $150
    • Hydrocollator and heating pads - $300

All of the money will be used to directly fund building our business. We have a big year planned for 2018 - we just need a little assist to get there!

Whatever amount we receive will be very appreciated and welcomed. If we don't reach our goal, we will still apply whatever amount we receive toward our business costs. We will also honor the goodies associated with each gift. 

Yeah, But What Do I Get Out of It?
We want to make it easy and rewarding for you to assist us. Essentially, we are trying to pre-sell as much massage as we can to build a nest egg. Each opportunity offers a reward or a chance for winning a drawing. What is this about a drawing? Glad you asked. Here it is:

THE MOST SPLENDIFEROUS MASSAGE DRAWING OF ALL TIME*
*Well, the most amazing drawing the Massage Geeks has ever offered anyway.

Enter to win:

Silver Prize: One Free Hour-Long Massage. Use it yourself or be generous and gift it to a loved one.

Gold Prize: One Two-Hour Massage. You could gift it to someone else – but really, do you love anyone that much? Let’s be honest. You are keeping it to yourself.

Grand Prize: ONE FREE YEAR OF MONTHLY MASSAGE!!! You read that right – throughout 2018, you can book a one-hour massage each month FOR FREE with either of the Massage Geeks. Can’t use it yourself that month? Gift it someone else! That is TWELVE HOURS OF FREE MASSAGE.

I Don't Have Money, But I Want to Help!
Can’t help out monetarily but still want to help? We got you covered. There is a second drawing for sharing our fundraising campaign. One click on the Share on Facebook button gets you entered. Prize for this drawing is a free one-hour massage gift certificate and a $20 gift card to Think Geek (because we’re geeks). And yes, you can enter both drawings!!!

THE PERKS!!!
You know you want them!

$5 – Fond wishes from the Massage Geeks. Fond like whoa.

$10 – Heartfelt thanks and fond wishes from the Massage Geeks. Probably shown in the physical form of a thank-you card.

$25 – One entry into the Grand Prize drawing AND a $5 discount on a massage gift certificate.

$50 – A one hour massage, one entry into the Grand Prize drawing.

$75 – TWO entries into the Grand Prize drawing, a one-hour massage, and a $15 gift card for a future massage.

$100 – A two-hour massage, two entries for the Grand Prize drawing, and a $20 gift card for a future massage.

$200 – FOUR entries into the Grand Prize drawing, FOUR hours of massage to be used in 60/90/120 minute increments of your choosing, a $25 gift card for a future massage, and a recognition shout-out.

$400 - Opportunity to select a geek fandom for a knick-knack/object d’art to decorate the Massage Geek offices (you love Doctor Who - we'll include a TARDIS just for you), EIGHT hours of massage to be used in 60/90/120 minute increments of your choosing, a $30 gift card for a future massage, FIVE Grand Prize entries, and a recognition shout-out.

When Will This Drawing Happen Anyway?
The Grand Prize drawing will be held on Friday, December 8 – just in time for holiday gifting! The Facebook Share drawing will be held the same day.

And When Will the Massage Geeks Office Open for Business?
Not soon enough in our opinion! We hope to hold a grand opening in early January 2018. Keep an eye out for an invite to our grand opening party!

We hope you will help, even if it is by sharing our story. Because Sharing is Caring (and gives you a chance to win, too!).
story_txt:
Give Massage Geeks a HandHave you ever thought to yourself: dang, I’d like to have or gift a massage sometime before the end of 2018? Or maybe you’ve thought: those Massage Geeks, Aislinn and Daniel…. I’d like to give them a gift/ have a cup of coffee/ or support them in some small way? WELL, NOW IS YOUR CHANCE! EVEN BETTER: YOU COULD WIN A PRIZE FOR DOING SO!
Massage Geeks is getting an official massage therapy space in downtown Woodstock. That’s right! A bona fide office space with easy parking and everything! We are so excited, we could spit (but we won’t because that is unhygienic)! This has been our business dream and we are thisclose to having it realized. An independent office space will allow us to market ourselves to a broader community and will offer us a location to continue providing the best orthopedic/therapeutic massage around. We see this as a huge launching point and opportunity for our business.Why Do We Need This Money?You may already know this, but building an office space and jumping through bureaucratic hoops is $$$$. We are super pleased to join the City of Woodstock business community, but there are a lot of extra $$s tied to being independent massage therapists within the city limits. We’ve done our best to financially prepare for the transition from home business to legit office space, yet navigating the thicket of red tape has been more challenging than anticipated. Given the bureaucratic timeline of permits, inspections, paperwork, et al, we will be paying our lease for at least a month or two before we can actually begin practicing out of the space. And after that chore is completed, we have some start up costs involved in establishing Massage Geeks as the place to get the best massage in the metro-Atlanta area.
Your generosity can help us realize our business dream. Our goal of $2000 will assist us in covering the costs of:

Getting our bureaucratic Ts crossed and Is dotted. Estimated: $300.
Furnishing the new office space (we plan to scour yard sales and thrift stores for deals, but these costs do add up!) - $500
2 seated massage chairs; Massage Geeks plans to hire other massage therapists to work some of our larger events in 2018! $200 each; $400 total
Marketing expenses as we introduce ourselves to our new community! - $500
Massage equipment to provide the best experience possible to our clients including but not limited to:
Table extensions/pads for better client comfort. Massage tables are not a one-size-fits-all experience! - $150
Hydrocollator and heating pads - $300



All of the money will be used to directly fund building our business. We have a big year planned for 2018 - we just need a little assist to get there!
Whatever amount we receive will be very appreciated and welcomed. If we don't reach our goal, we will still apply whatever amount we receive toward our business costs. We will also honor the goodies associated with each gift. 
Yeah, But What Do I Get Out of It?We want to make it easy and rewarding for you to assist us. Essentially, we are trying to pre-sell as much massage as we can to build a nest egg. Each opportunity offers a reward or a chance for winning a drawing. What is this about a drawing? Glad you asked. Here it is:THE MOST SPLENDIFEROUS MASSAGE DRAWING OF ALL TIME**Well, the most amazing drawing the Massage Geeks has ever offered anyway.
Enter to win:
Silver Prize: One Free Hour-Long Massage. Use it yourself or be generous and gift it to a loved one.
Gold Prize: One Two-Hour Massage. You could gift it to someone else – but really, do you love anyone that much? Let’s be honest. You are keeping it to yourself.
Grand Prize: ONE FREE YEAR OF MONTHLY MASSAGE!!! You read that right – throughout 2018, you can book a one-hour massage each month FOR FREE with either of the Massage Geeks. Can’t use it yourself that month? Gift it someone else! That is TWELVE HOURS OF FREE MASSAGE.
I Don't Have Money, But I Want to Help!Can’t help out monetarily but still want to help? We got you covered. There is a second drawing for sharing our fundraising campaign. One click on the Share on Facebook button gets you entered. Prize for this drawing is a free one-hour massage gift certificate and a $20 gift card to Think Geek (because we’re geeks). And yes, you can enter both drawings!!!
THE PERKS!!!You know you want them!
$5 – Fond wishes from the Massage Geeks. Fond like whoa.
$10 – Heartfelt thanks and fond wishes from the Massage Geeks. Probably shown in the physical form of a thank-you card.
$25 – One entry into the Grand Prize drawing AND a $5 discount on a massage gift certificate.
$50 – A one hour massage, one entry into the Grand Prize drawing.
$75 – TWO entries into the Grand Prize drawing, a one-hour massage, and a $15 gift card for a future massage.
$100 – A two-hour massage, two entries for the Grand Prize drawing, and a $20 gift card for a future massage.
$200 – FOUR entries into the Grand Prize drawing, FOUR hours of massage to be used in 60/90/120 minute increments of your choosing, a $25 gift card for a future massage, and a recognition shout-out.
$400 - Opportunity to select a geek fandom for a knick-knack/object d’art to decorate the Massage Geek offices (you love Doctor Who - we'll include a TARDIS just for you), EIGHT hours of massage to be used in 60/90/120 minute increments of your choosing, a $30 gift card for a future massage, FIVE Grand Prize entries, and a recognition shout-out.
When Will This Drawing Happen Anyway?The Grand Prize drawing will be held on Friday, December 8 – just in time for holiday gifting! The Facebook Share drawing will be held the same day.And When Will the Massage Geeks Office Open for Business?Not soon enough in our opinion! We hope to hold a grand opening in early January 2018. Keep an eye out for an invite to our grand opening party!
We hope you will help, even if it is by sharing our story. Because Sharing is Caring (and gives you a chance to win, too!).

story:
I'm Crystal, and this is my husband Jeremiah. I grew up around big cars & tires in my dad's garage, and now I have a "garage" of my own where we flip tires and workout everyday!

Owners Crystal & Jeremiah

The truth is, we've outgrown our current space and have the opportunity to knock out a few walls in order to expand our offerings as a gym.

We're raising funds to do the demolition and construction of our new workout space, along with funding some of the new furnishings, floor mats, and workout equipment.

We've created some awesome perks for you, your friends and your family, and we'd so appreciate it if you would share our project with everyone you know.

Let's do this together!

Here's a rundown of our rewards:

#1 - Test Drive a TFP Bootcamp - Pledge $5 or more.


Experience our 60 minute, group bootcamp class, specifically designed for all fitness levels.

#2 - Shaker Bottle + Reward #1 - Pledge $15 or more.


Experience our 60 minute, group bootcamp class, specifically designed for all fitness levels and get your very own Truth Fitness Project Shaker Bottle.

#3 - 5 Bootcamp Classes + Shaker Bottle - Pledge $25 or more.

Experience FIVE of our 60 minute, group bootcamp classes, specifically designed for all fitness levels and get your very own Truth Fitness Project Shaker Bottle.

#4 - TFP 1 Month Pass - Pledge $75 or more.

Choose from CrossFit, BASIC Training, or Bootcamp and experience our 60 minute, exciting group class, specifically designed for all fitness levels.

#5 - Adopt-A-Floor-Mat + Reward #3 - Pledge $100 or more.

With this reward you will be helping to provide the floor surface for our expanded space.

Plus, you'll get to experience FIVE of our 60 minute, group bootcamp classes, specifically designed for all fitness levels and get your very own Truth Fitness Project Shaker Bottle.

#6 - Builder's Brick + Reward #3 - Pledge $125 or more.

We'll have your Family Name or Business Name placed on a brick in our gym entryway that everyone will see each time they come to workout and you'll be honored as a Truth Fitness Project Business Builder.

Plus, you'll get to experience FIVE of our 60 minute, group bootcamp classes, specifically designed for all fitness levels and get your very own Truth Fitness Project Shaker Bottle.

#7 - Meal Plan, 4 PT + Reward #3 - Pledge $350 or more.

We'll design a custom meal plan that's right for you and we'll coach you through FOUR personal trainings where we'll help you achieve your specific goals.

Plus, you'll get to experience FIVE of our 60 minute, group bootcamp classes, specifically designed for all fitness levels and get your very own Truth Fitness Project Shaker Bottle.

#8 - PICK 6 - Pledge $500 or more.

It's simple, pick 6 months of Bootcamp or CrossFit classes.

Pick 6 mo. of Bootcamp classes + Shaker Bottle

Pick 6 mo. of CrossFit classes + Jump Rope

#9 - All-In, All Year, Let's GO!!! - Pledge $1000 or more.

This reward includes 1 month of BASIC Training, 11 months of regular CrossFit classes, and a CrossFit jump rope.

What are you waiting for?

#10 - Bridal Party Package - Pledge $2000 or more.

This reward includes 1 month of Bootcamp classes for up to 10 people (choice of morning or evening classes), Before and After professional photos, Before and After body measurements and a Body Fat test.

Also included is a private nutrition challenge, goal setting clinic at the start, and BRIDAL BOOTCAMP T-Shirts for all!

story:
The Butterfly Boxes of Ottawa-Gatineau are:

  • The first-of-their-kind in our region
  • Packed with thoughtful items and local non faith-based resources to support grieving families
  • A tool to grow awareness and bust stigma surrounding pregnancy and infant loss in our community through a card-writing and storytelling project
  • Free of cost for bereaved families
     

It takes a community: We need your help 
We are deeply grateful for the support of the community for Ottawa-Gatineau Butterfly Box. Beyond the generous startup grant from JustChange Ottawa, this initiative relies entirely on volunteer time and community donations to ensure families have access to this resource in their time of grief.


What's in the Ottawa-Gatineau Butterfly Box?
Each box is packed with carefully selected items chosen by families who have experienced pregnancy and infant loss first-hand:

  • Kleenex
  • Journal
  • Forget-me-not seeds to plant a memorial garden
  • Lavender soy candle (locally crafted)
  • Lavender bath bomb (locally crafted)
  • A snack
  • Bereavement reading list 
  • Listing of local resources for bereaved families
  • A pre-stamped postcard for families to share an aspect of their loss with communtiy (optional, to be displayed in public awareness-raising project October, 2018)
  • A card of condolence written by a fellow member of the community

How will the funds be spent?  
Each box costs 20CAD to source and assemble. We will allocate 95% of funds to directly develop and distribute more boxes to bereaved families. The remaining 5% of donations will be used to fund communications, expanding our web presence and an exploration of how to bring these boxes to other regions (requests from across Canada are rolling in!). 100% of every donation will go towards these two efforts which are entirely volunteer-led. Every donor, no matter how big or small will be asked to send a personal message of condolence to be hand-written in the sympathy card included in every box. 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

Learn more about Butterfly Box Ottawa-Gatineau

story:
After working on farms in El Salvador and Ohio for the past few years I moved back to Chicago last year with the intention of continuing to work towards a just and sustainable food system in my hometown.

To that end I applied and have been accepted to a farm incubator program in Chicago. This program sets me up with a plot of land and offers training and technical support in starting a new sustainable farming operation. This is an incredibly exciting opportunity for me to work towards a dream of mine to create a farm that is oriented towards social change and the creation of a more just and sustainable local food economy in Chicago. My long-term goal is to grow this farming operation into a worker-owned cooperative.

However, I still need some additional funding for startup costs associated with certain tools and supplies: a seeder, irrigation supplies, bed prep tools. 

 

Below is an excerpt of the executive summary of my farm plan submitted to the farm incubator program:

I am establishing this farm for the purpose of creating the basis for a worker-owned cooperative farm. This endeavor is motivated by an awareness of the need for a significant paradigm shift in our current food system, a shift away from a system that is largely defined by environmental degradation and labor exploitation and in which addressing hunger is mostly incidental to the drive for profit. The farm will seek to manifest alternative values and principles to those that characterize the dominant food system and capitalism at large. This will be accomplished by not only growing food sustainably and distributing produce locally, but also by offering an example of economic relations defined by cooperation and solidarity rather than exploitation and exclusion.

 

However, before becoming a worker-owned cooperative, it is necessary to establish the farm and achieve a level of economic viability within the current market conditions and local food landscape. The farm will then gradually grow to the point at which it will be feasible to reorganize as a cooperative. This farm plan will elaborate how the goal of achieving economic viability will be realized by growing and marketing produce locally.

story:
Λίγα λόγια για τον οργανισμό που επιλέξαμε

Η Ευρωπαϊκή Έκφραση, με χρηματοδότηση του Συμβουλίου της Ευρώπης, με το ΕΡΓΟ –ΣΤΗΡΙΖΩ, υποστηρίζει την  Ανοιχτή Δομή Φιλοξενίας Αιτούντων Άσυλο και Ευάλωτων Ομάδων στον Ελαιώνα Αττικής, μέσω της λειτουργίας των Κλιμακίων Ψυχοκοινωνικής Υποστήριξης, Διοίκησης και Γραμματειακής Υποστήριξης, της Τεχνικής Υπηρεσίας και της Πύλης Εισόδου – Εξόδου της Δομής, με προσωπικό που έχει προσληφθεί για αυτόν ακριβώς τον σκοπό.

Η υποστήριξη του Κλιμακίου Ψυχοκοινωνικής Στήριξης περιλαμβάνει την υποδοχή φιλοξενούμενων, υπηρεσίες συμβουλευτικού και υποστηρικτικού χαρακτήρα, ψυχοκοινωνική υποστήριξη, διασύνδεση με υπηρεσίες, παροχή κοινωνικών και εκπαιδευτικών προγραμμάτων.

Η υποστήριξη του Κλιμακίου Διοίκησης και Γραμματειακής Υποστήριξης περιλαμβάνει καταγραφή νεοεισερχομένων, διαχείριση υλικοτεχνικού εξοπλισμού, επιδιόρθωση βλαβών και επιτήρηση χώρου.

Ωστόσο, η έλλειψη σε αναλώσιμα (είδη υγιεινής, χαρτική και γραφική ύλη κλπ) όπως και σε υλικοτεχνική υποδομή (Η/Υ, τραπέζια/θρανία κλπ) συνεχίζει να ταλανίζει την Δομή, με αποτέλεσμα να σημειώνονται συνεχείς ελλείψεις αφού η εκάστοτε χρηματοδότηση δεν αρκεί.

Ποιοι είμαστε

Είμαστε η Αριάνα και ο Δημήτρης και αποφασίσαμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε τις γνώσεις και τα εφόδια του σχολείου μας για να βοηθήσουμε μια κοινωνικά ευπαθή ομάδα: τους πρόσφυγες.

Όντας 17 χρονών και έχοντας συνειδητοποιήσει τις ποικίλες ανάγκες των προσφύγων, θεωρήσαμε ηθική μας υποχρέωση να δημιουρήσουμε αυτήν τη διαδικτυακή πλατφόρμα ως μια άμεση απόδεικη κοινωνικής ευθύνης.

Ποιο είναι το πρόβλημα

Είναι γνωστές οι διαστάσεις του προσφυγικού ζητήματος και της ανθρωπιστικής κρίσης .

Οι αριθμοί και μόνο θα αρκούσαν για να καταγράψουν το μέγεθος και την οξύτητα του προβλήματος: 5.000 πρόσφυγες φτάνουν καθημερινά στην Ελλάδα από τη Συρία και το Ιράκ. Φέτος, στην Ελλάδα, υπολογίζεται ότι ήρθαν πάνω από 650.000 πρόσφυγες και μετανάστες. Δεν πρόκειται για ένα πρόσκαιρο ή συγκυριακό φαινόμενο αλλά για το σημαντικότερο ίσως ζήτημα, μακράς διάρκειας, που θα συνεχίσει να αντιμετωπίζει η χώρα και ολόκληρη η Ευρώπη.

Τα κύματα αυτών των πληθυσμών που παίρνουν το δρόμο της Δύσης, αλλάζοντας ουσιαστικά και την ανθρωπογεωγραφία του πλανήτη, τα προκαλεί όχι μόνο η ανέχεια αλλά και η φρίκη του πολέμου και των διώξεων στις χώρες τους, ιδιαίτερα στη Μέση Ανατολή και τη Βόρεια Αφρική.

Στην Ελλάδα φτάνουν πρόσφυγες και οικονομικοί μετανάστες. Όσο θα παραμένουν στην Ελλάδα οι συνθήκες υποδοχής και διαμονής τους οφείλουν να τηρούν τα διεθνή και ευρωπαϊκά πρότυπα και να σέβονται την ανθρώπινη αξιοπρέπεια. Το σύστημα απονομής της διεθνούς προστασίας πρέπει να είναι δίκαιο, αποτελεσματικό και ταχύ και να αποτρέπει τον μακροχρόνιο εγκλωβισμό των αιτούντων άσυλο.

Πώς συμβάλλουμε εμείς

Έχοντας την επιθυμία να συμβάλλουμε, στο μέτρο που μας αναλογεί, στο φλέγον

ζήτημα της χώρας μας, το προσφυγικό, δημιουργήσαμε το  προκειμένου να αναζητήσουμε και να βρούμε χρηματοδότηση, ώστε να την διαθέσουμε στον μη κερδοσκοπικό οργανισμό Κοινωνική Ευθύνη που λειτουργεί υπό την αγίδα της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης, καλύπτοντας ανάγκες σε αναλώσιμα και υλικοτεχνική υποδομή.

Με την πεποίθηση ότι όλοι μας είμαστε ευαισθητοποιημένοι στο προσφυγικό ζήτημα ευελπιστούμε στην ανταπόκρισή σας, ανταπόκριση που συνολικά μπορεί να εξασφαλίσει ένα χρηματικό ποσό βοήθειας και συνδρομής στο ΕΡΓΟ – ΣΤΗΡΙΖΩ και να δικαιώσει την   γι’ αυτή την πρωτοβουλία της.

Επικοινωνία

Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες:

  • Τηλέφωνα:
  1. Αριάνα Λιναρά: 6992067714
  2. Δημήτρης Λινάτσας: 6944380490
  • e-mail: ucare4refugees@gmail.com
  • facebook:https://www.facebook.com/ucare4refugees/
story_txt:
Λίγα λόγια για τον οργανισμό που επιλέξαμεΗ Ευρωπαϊκή Έκφραση, με χρηματοδότηση του Συμβουλίου της Ευρώπης, με το ΕΡΓΟ –ΣΤΗΡΙΖΩ, υποστηρίζει την  Ανοιχτή Δομή Φιλοξενίας Αιτούντων Άσυλο και Ευάλωτων Ομάδων στον Ελαιώνα Αττικής, μέσω της λειτουργίας των Κλιμακίων Ψυχοκοινωνικής Υποστήριξης, Διοίκησης και Γραμματειακής Υποστήριξης, της Τεχνικής Υπηρεσίας και της Πύλης Εισόδου – Εξόδου της Δομής, με προσωπικό που έχει προσληφθεί για αυτόν ακριβώς τον σκοπό.Η υποστήριξη του Κλιμακίου Ψυχοκοινωνικής Στήριξης περιλαμβάνει την υποδοχή φιλοξενούμενων, υπηρεσίες συμβουλευτικού και υποστηρικτικού χαρακτήρα, ψυχοκοινωνική υποστήριξη, διασύνδεση με υπηρεσίες, παροχή κοινωνικών και εκπαιδευτικών προγραμμάτων.Η υποστήριξη του Κλιμακίου Διοίκησης και Γραμματειακής Υποστήριξης περιλαμβάνει καταγραφή νεοεισερχομένων, διαχείριση υλικοτεχνικού εξοπλισμού, επιδιόρθωση βλαβών και επιτήρηση χώρου.Ωστόσο, η έλλειψη σε αναλώσιμα (είδη υγιεινής, χαρτική και γραφική ύλη κλπ) όπως και σε υλικοτεχνική υποδομή (Η/Υ, τραπέζια/θρανία κλπ) συνεχίζει να ταλανίζει την Δομή, με αποτέλεσμα να σημειώνονται συνεχείς ελλείψεις αφού η εκάστοτε χρηματοδότηση δεν αρκεί.Ποιοι είμαστεΕίμαστε η Αριάνα και ο Δημήτρης και αποφασίσαμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε τις γνώσεις και τα εφόδια του σχολείου μας για να βοηθήσουμε μια κοινωνικά ευπαθή ομάδα: τους πρόσφυγες.Όντας 17 χρονών και έχοντας συνειδητοποιήσει τις ποικίλες ανάγκες των προσφύγων, θεωρήσαμε ηθική μας υποχρέωση να δημιουρήσουμε αυτήν τη διαδικτυακή πλατφόρμα ως μια άμεση απόδεικη κοινωνικής ευθύνης.Ποιο είναι το πρόβλημαΕίναι γνωστές οι διαστάσεις του προσφυγικού ζητήματος και της ανθρωπιστικής κρίσης .Οι αριθμοί και μόνο θα αρκούσαν για να καταγράψουν το μέγεθος και την οξύτητα του προβλήματος: 5.000 πρόσφυγες φτάνουν καθημερινά στην Ελλάδα από τη Συρία και το Ιράκ. Φέτος, στην Ελλάδα, υπολογίζεται ότι ήρθαν πάνω από 650.000 πρόσφυγες και μετανάστες. Δεν πρόκειται για ένα πρόσκαιρο ή συγκυριακό φαινόμενο αλλά για το σημαντικότερο ίσως ζήτημα, μακράς διάρκειας, που θα συνεχίσει να αντιμετωπίζει η χώρα και ολόκληρη η Ευρώπη.Τα κύματα αυτών των πληθυσμών που παίρνουν το δρόμο της Δύσης, αλλάζοντας ουσιαστικά και την ανθρωπογεωγραφία του πλανήτη, τα προκαλεί όχι μόνο η ανέχεια αλλά και η φρίκη του πολέμου και των διώξεων στις χώρες τους, ιδιαίτερα στη Μέση Ανατολή και τη Βόρεια Αφρική.Στην Ελλάδα φτάνουν πρόσφυγες και οικονομικοί μετανάστες. Όσο θα παραμένουν στην Ελλάδα οι συνθήκες υποδοχής και διαμονής τους οφείλουν να τηρούν τα διεθνή και ευρωπαϊκά πρότυπα και να σέβονται την ανθρώπινη αξιοπρέπεια. Το σύστημα απονομής της διεθνούς προστασίας πρέπει να είναι δίκαιο, αποτελεσματικό και ταχύ και να αποτρέπει τον μακροχρόνιο εγκλωβισμό των αιτούντων άσυλο.Πώς συμβάλλουμε εμείςΈχοντας την επιθυμία να συμβάλλουμε, στο μέτρο που μας αναλογεί, στο φλέγονζήτημα της χώρας μας, το προσφυγικό, δημιουργήσαμε το  προκειμένου να αναζητήσουμε και να βρούμε χρηματοδότηση, ώστε να την διαθέσουμε στον μη κερδοσκοπικό οργανισμό Κοινωνική Ευθύνη που λειτουργεί υπό την αγίδα της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης, καλύπτοντας ανάγκες σε αναλώσιμα και υλικοτεχνική υποδομή.Με την πεποίθηση ότι όλοι μας είμαστε ευαισθητοποιημένοι στο προσφυγικό ζήτημα ευελπιστούμε στην ανταπόκρισή σας, ανταπόκριση που συνολικά μπορεί να εξασφαλίσει ένα χρηματικό ποσό βοήθειας και συνδρομής στο ΕΡΓΟ – ΣΤΗΡΙΖΩ και να δικαιώσει την   γι’ αυτή την πρωτοβουλία της.ΕπικοινωνίαΓια περισσότερες πληροφορίες:Τηλέφωνα:
Αριάνα Λιναρά: 6992067714
Δημήτρης Λινάτσας: 6944380490

e-mail: ucare4refugees@gmail.com

story:
Good day.

When my Grand father had cancer, The Cancer Society of Trinidad and Tobago assisted my family greatly during that time. I always wanted to give back and now I believe that this is the time. I also know a couple of people who have Autistic family members and wish to assist there too.

This fund is for public donation and to give to the relevant societies within Trinidad and Tobago, so that they themselves can help others in need.

All funds after the goal has been met, will then be donated to an orphanage.

story:
My grandfather died of Alzheimer's when I was seven, my parents were devastated. I only knew that my grandfather was a gentle man and didn't always remember who we all were and then he was gone. My mom told me they found him miles from home, frozen, because he went for a walk and didn't know how to get home.

Watching a person you love start to disappear in front of you, slowly at first not remembering the day or time, then where they put things, to where they are, and worst who you are. Then potentially becoming a threat because they forgot they left a pot on the stove, or  turn off the burner. You try your very best to care for them because you love them so. Then one day they are found miles from home because they simply went for a walk and didn't know how to come home, or where home was. It's devastating.

As an architect I remembered my grandfather and wanted to find out how I could help in caring for the people with dementia.

I've researched most all the scientific data and what the most recent methods for the care and treatment of the dementia and found out that the disease is growing faster than any other sector of the healthcare industry, and there are only some medications that can slow the progression of the disease, but there is no cure, now or in the near future.  So I've designed 'the state of the art' facility with programs and protocols that enhance and prolong life for those afflicted.

Working with leading Physicians that specialize in Alzheimer's we've designed a facility in Palm Beach county, FL. that can operate completely off the grid. It has its own photo-voltaic system providing enough power to operate. It has a water cistern system that will provide all potable water needs for months. The building is designed to withstand 200 mph hurricane winds and is designated as a "place of refuge".  We can shelter in place, with enough food, power and water for months and can also take in others that may not be adequately prepared in case of hurricanes.

Our staff is specially trained for the special needs of Alzheimer's/dementia residents. This together with the loving care of all our staff, is unique in today's market.

We need your help, as we are substantially along in the development process, but we need to raise $175,000 for application for funding that will provide 40% of the total project cost. 

Experts from the Amen Institute have stated that Alzheimer's cases will double within the next 20 years. Florida has the highest per capita rate of Alzheimer's in the nation.

Help us with this very badly needed state of the art facility as until there is a cure the need will continue to rise. We've done everything we can think of to create the "22nd century" state of the art facility but we need your help!

story:
What is Courageous Self Love?

The founder of Courageous Self Love, Chrissa Tolidou is an outstanding celebrity make up artist, trainer, coach and educator with over 18 years of experience.

With her film and fashion background, years of personal development and a passion for transformation she is committed to delivering her promise to hundreds of women and that promise is:

  • Long lasting confidence.
  • Tap into your feminine power, whenever you choose to.
  • Discover the true essence of self love.
  • Break through limiting beliefs.
  • Find out what your 'Golden Asset' is.
  • Use make up as self expression & communication tool.
  • Define your self image.
  • Introduction to personal branding.

Who Is Joining Chrissa's Vision?

We already have the health and wellness coach Amy Wright (founder of www.wellnesswithamy.com) is joining our cause. She is a certified Integrative Nutrition Wellness Coach and Speaker and helps women to create healthy lives, free from stress and full of confidence and fulfilment.

We Need Your Help!

Our seminar is on the 20th of May 2018 We want to secure our location at the Strand Hotel in Central London as well as have more life coaches and experts join our cause from all over the globe!

  • Funds raised by this crowd fund go towards location, travel expenses and props for the seminar.
  • Earnings from the seminar will go towards a charity we are creating to help blind women.   

 

Perks

We want to give you as much value as possible, that is why we have created some really cool perks!

  • For £10: 45 minutes Skype - Confidence Coaching Session with Chrissa. Value £100.
  • For £10: 45 minutes Skype - Make Up Lesson with Chrissa. Value  £100. 
  • For £20: A ticket to the seminar #CourageousSelfLove. Value  £150.
  • For £55: One pack of Tolidou Lashes and a ticket to the seminar. Total value £150 + £49,99
  • For £150: A one on one coaching session with Chrissa and a ticket to the seminar. Total value £150 + £400. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think that we can bring value to you or that other people will find benefit from this seminar then please share this campaign on social media and use the #CourageusSelfLove.

Every little or big contribution helps!

 

Thank you very much.

story:
Summary

The idea behind Colorado Premium Daily Serenity CBD came about while looking for an opportunity to sell and distribute CPD products that I was using personally.  I was passionate about the product because of the effects that CBD had on me personally.   Unfortunately the company whose product I was using would not let me do this.  I began a nearly year long search for products and companies that would be   What I discovered was there were multiple companies that had "white label" programs that were offering producers that where wholesaling at what retail prices would be.  There were tremendous markups and even base product that was imported from overseas.   What was even more surprising was the Multi Level Marketing of CBD products.  One company wanted you to purchase a quantity  of product to become a "Director". 

Objective

The intent is to bring to market the Highest Quality CBD tincture at a price that is affordable. 

What You Get

  • You get our Colorado Premium CBD Tincture starting a $18 a bottle, significantly below the expected retail of $27 per bottle. 
  • Our retail is below what many others are charging wholesale.  How do we do this? Vertical product integration from the grower,  to the extractor, to the laboratory to manufacturing. We control every step of the process to insure the highest quality product.
  • We will always be direct to consumer.  No Middlemen.  No Multi-Level Marketing. 
  • As an early adopter you will have receive advance notice of new products if and when they come to market and will receive Special Promotions from time to time
  • This is an all or none crowd funding so you will not be charged unless we reach our goal.
 

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing Delays: Although not expected, there is always the potential for delays in producing product, laboratory testing or packaging.

Supply Availability: Although not anticipated, there is a potential for delays due to lack of supply. Supply will be secured once the project reaches its goal.

Ways You Can Help

  • Please share on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Pintrest account.  Help to spread the word.

story:
We ask for your support in the opening of Arlington's newest and only yoga and wellness center, HYGGE.  Our goal is to bring the principles of yoga, meditation, and self care into action in the DFW community.   HYGGE is a gym for the mind, body, and spirit.  We believe everyone has a right to well being.  Mark Freeman is quoted as saying "Everybody has a brain, so everybody has mental health."  At Hygge, we want to treat mental fitness like physical fitness. In a time where stress and anxiety are at an all time high, we believe in being proactive with our minds instead of reactive. We have some of the top instructors in Texas and can't wait to provide our community with a new hollistic approach.

 

Preorder your memberships and purchase classes today and receive unbelievable savings by becoming one of our very first members.  With different types of yoga, meditation, hooping, and life coach classes, we are the first of its kind in DFW.

story:
Zuna island resort in tropical Torres Strait is up for sale. We hope to secure the parcel and turn it into a safe space getaway for men of all walks of life to escape the daily grind and get back in touch with their happy place. The property boasts 2 accomodation buildings and comes fully furnished. A limited number of access perks have been allocated which should allow for access holders to get slots of around 2-3 days access per year, and to allow the all important slots for those who need a getaway for their headspace.

When our goal is reached a trust or non for profit will be setup to ensure the money is used to its maximum effect. The legal beagles will set this up.

Indiegogo has been used for this campaign as NONE of the funds you pledge will be released unless the goal is reached, and it allows for those of you wishing to take a bigger part in the project to do so.

An amount of funding over the purchase price has been set to allow for a legal entity to be setup to caretake the island and to hire litigators to put this in place. 

There is also the potential to hire out the residence when not in use to generate funds to be used in the fight against male depression.

 

If the goal is reached and the property is unatainable and no suitable alternative is available for the intended purpose funds will go towards Beyond Blue and The Black Dog Institute.

 

Having battled my own depression and other issues it's important to me that we do what we can to help out those still struggling, and what better way to do that than a safe space on a tropical getaway - Ben

story:
Who we are. Our experience

We are a charitable foundation established in 2008 in Ukraine. Since 2008, the Pediatricians Against Cancer foundation provided assistance to over over 300 children with cancer, including purchase of medicinal drugs, conducting tests and assessments, purchase of endoprostheses, Broviac catheters and more.

The projects implemented by the Foundations include:

  • separation chamber for thrombocytapheresis;
  • renovation of the thrombocytapheresis room;
  • argon beam electrocoagulator;
  • WiFi-enabled intensive care monitoring;
  • electric dermatome;
  • permanent project “Stop Hepatitis”;
  • permanent project “Kits for Thrombocytapheresis”;
  • modern ramp for the disabled surgical patients of the Kyiv Oncology Center;
  • sensor for portable ultrasound doppler apparatus;
  • surgical instruments for the children’s operating room of the Kyiv Oncology Center;
  • power tools (drill, oscillator saw) for children’s operating room of the Kyiv Oncology Center;
  • with hydraulic drive, functional beds for patients;
  • repairs and renovations in the operating room, children’s department;

and many more.

 

For the high level of trust and transparency of its charitable work the Pediatricians Against Cancer Foundation was given the “Ukraine National Philantropist Rating” award in 2016 and 2017s.

 

Vadym Kobys is the founder and president of the Pediatricians Against Cancer

Foundation. PhD, board certified pediatric surgeon, board certified pediatric oncologist, member of the European Musculo-Skeletal Oncology Society (EMSOS) with 28 years of professional experience.

Dr. Kobys was the first in Ukraine to perform:

  • high-dose methotrexate therapy
  • surgery to remove metastases in children with lung osteosarcoma
  • subtotal temporal bone resection using autoclave autopsy and displaced autologous bone marrow
  • introduced the use of the subcutaneous Broviac catheter
  • endoprosthetics of the hip joint of the Lumic type
  • resection of the half of the pelvis and its endoprosthesis
  • endoprosthetics of a child’s joint with a prolonged endoprosthesis

 

A 10 year old girl fighting cancer for 9 years

 

 

For 9 years this girl has been battling a horrible disease, and remains a cheerful child. This strong girl’s fight has not been in vain. A new drug, Dinutiximab, can help Oleksandra overcome the disease forever.

This is how Dinutiximab works:

The basis of the drug are monoclonal antibodies that attach themselves to the tumor cells damaging and marking them for the immune system of the patient. After that, the immunity is actively attacking and destroying the tumor. The drug destroys all cells of the neuroblastoma. Successful treatment can lead to a life without relapse – a happy life without cancer.

The cost of 1 vial of Dinutiximab (20 mg) is about 10 900 EUR .

One course of treatment requires from 1 to 5 vials, depending on how the patient tolerates the drug. Up to 5 courses may be needed. One course costs as much as 40 thousand euros.

 

How this can change the world?

 

Thanks to Oleksandra Brailovska, this new drug can cost much less! This girl is fully suitable for treatment with Dinutiximab because she has a small amount of tumor cells and she is responsive to chemotherapy. And that is why the effectiveness of this drug is very high in her case. And we will show it to the whole world, which will lead to product certification in many countries, increased demand in the world and the development of generics (duplicates), which will significantly reduce the cost of Dinutiximab – a life-saving medicine.

Let’s get together and change the world for the better!

Abodva.com - праект, які дапаможа многім знаходзіць адзін аднаго нашмат хутчэй і зручней.

 

З дастасаваннем Abodva ты бачыш чалавека, як у першыя 7 секунд вашай рэальнай сустрэчы. І ты ўжо ведаеш, які ў яго голас, якая міміка, з чаго пачне вашу першую гутарку. Ня трэба выпрошваць нумар тэлефона ці ўключыць вэб-камеру. Стварай рэальнае першае ўражанне за адзін клік. У нас толькі рэальныя людзі, мы старанна правяраем кожны профіль.
Галоўная ідэя – мы эканомім каштоўны час для вашых новых прыемных сустрэч.

 

ПРОСТЫ ПОШУК

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

РЭГІСТРАЦЫЯ Ў АДЗIН КРОК

 

 

 

 
 

100% АБАРОНА ПРОФIЛЯ

 

МЫ З МIНСКА, БЕЛАРУСЬ

 

 

ДАБРОТЫ

 

НАША КАМАНДА

 

 
 

Русский

 

Abodva.com - проект, который поможет многим находить друг друга намного быстрее и удобнее.

 

С приложением Abodva ты видишь человека, как в первые 7 секунд вашей реальной встречи. И ты уже знаешь, какой у него голос, какая мимика, с чего начнет вашу первую беседу. Не нужно выпрашивать номер телефона или включить веб-камеру. Создавай реальное первое впечатление за один клик. У нас только реальные люди, мы тщательно проверяем каждый профиль.
Главная идея – мы экономим драгоценное – время, для ваших новых приятных встреч.

 

ПРОСТОЙ ПОИСК

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ В ОДИН ШАГ

 

 

 

 

 
 

100% ЗАЩИТА ПРОФИЛЯ

 

МЫ ИЗ МИНСКА, БЕЛАРУСЬ

 

 

БЛАГА

 

НАША КОМАНДА

And you already know his/her voice, facial expression, and  what your first talk will start with. You  needn’t  beg to give a phone number or turn on the webcam. Create a real first impression about a person in one click. We have only real people, we carefully check each profile. The main idea is to save precious time to enjoy new meetings. SIMPLE SEARCH   

 
   ONE STEP REGISTRATION    100% PROFILE PROTECTION WE ARE FROM MINSK, BELARUS  PERKS OUR TEAM

story:
To learn more about AcuMed, click this link to watch founder Paolo Internicola's interview with Rox Cella: https://youtu.be/HT37Bg54ZAw

 

Every time the sun rises and offers a new day, it also brings over 130 daily opioid-related deaths. With AcuMed, addicts can now apply their very own auricular therapy device at home in order to clear energy blockages across the body’s meridians, allowing them to take a step in the right direction and to see that next morning's sunrise.

AcuMed Unlimited Inc. provides safe, natural, and effective medical products that utilize Auricular Acupressure Therapy -- a noninvasive stimulation of trigger points in the ear—to treat a variety of symptoms and afflictions. Designed in an effort to help improve overall patient health without the use of pharmaceutical medications, AcuMed can be used to treat stress, pain, drug addiction, smoking, obesity and many other ailments caused by energy blockages across the body’s meridians.

The opioid epidemic has spread like wildfire across America and the globe, and the struggle to find reasonably affordable remedies for both the addicts and their families continues to spark it. AcuMed believes its product line will be a tremendous asset to the addiction therapy regiment and that the AcuMedHelp.com forum will act as the central hub for discussions, literature and media on the many ways the product line can benefit and treat those suffering from this heartbreaking dependency.

As a drug free natural treatment that simply clips to your ear, AcuMed can be used without a doctor or any prior medical experience and can grant struggling addicts that foot in the right direction.

 

Acupressure is an external form of acupuncture that doesn’t penetrate the skin, but instead focuses on trigger points that will help correct the flow of energy throughout the body. Although both acupressure and acupuncture have proven health benefits, a medical professional is typically needed to administer the procedure. Our hope is that AcuMed will allow more addicts to take this first step on their own at home, which will in turn give them the boost and confidence to seek further treatment, ultimately rewiring their brain.

 

 

Many eastern cultures believe that the majority of illnesses, both physically and mentally, are caused by the impeded flow of energy throughout the body. By unblocking the body's various energy meridians, opioid addicts can think clearer while feeling connecting deeper with the next important step in their healing process.

 

Step 1: Remove the AcuMed device from the box.

Step 2: Clip it to the trigger point that best suits your needs.

Step 3: Apply for 20 minutes (3x daily)

 

Each backer of $25 (EARLY BIRD) or more will receive the full AcuMed box package, which includes the following:

* (1) AcuMed device

* (1) Manuel in six languages

* (1) Cleaning Cloth

* (1) Tin holding container

* (1) Key chain container adapter

 

PLUS, we will donate one (1) AcuMed device package to an addict in need for every package backed on Indiegogo!

AcuMed needs to reach its funding goal of $30,000 in order to take the next step towards FDA approval and the homeopathic alternative to curing addiction, including the following:

* Introduce the product to market

* Legal and medical fees

* Production and marketing development

* To bring awareness to addicts and their loved ones, therefore providing hope

 

And, AcuMed proudly supports and partners with Horses Healing Hearts!

story:
About Me

Hey everybody, I'm Aaron. I'm a spouse, a dad, an organizer and a church worker. I'm scheduled for gender-affirming surgery on July 17th. My insurance covers part of this but will still leave me and my family with big outstanding medical bills. Healthcare for everyone, including trans people, should be free-- Medicare for all! Until we win that, please pitch in if you can. I hate asking for help like this but between my own mental health, my family's well-being, and rising policy attacks on trans people, I feel some urgency in getting this done soon. Thanks!

What I Need

Here's a summary of costs

  • $3,000 out-of-pocket costs for surgery (that's after insurance)
  • TBD follow-up pharmacy costs
  • Two weeks of missed wages at one of my three jobs (I will attempt to keep working the other two from the couch during my recovery)

The Impact

This medically necessary intervention in my life will help me to:

  • Not exist in a chronic low-level state of dissociation
  • Be more fully present to my family as a partner and a parent
  • Double-down in my work as an organizer

Risks & Challenges

If you like toddlers, queer families, poor people's organizing, and me-- then this is the low-risk/high-return investment for you.

Other Ways You Can Help

I'll be on the couch for two weeks and we have a toddler. HELP! PM/email myself or Shelly to volunteer some childcare hours.

Many thanks!

story:
Short Summary

Hello! We are students at the University of Tennessee and our goal is to raise money for Marlin Williams’ dream. Marlin is a ten year old boy who is diagnosed with  Congenital Heart disease. He has went through two Open Heart surgeries, has a mechanical valve, and will need a new heart in the future. Our job is to raise enough money to give Marlin a well deserved break from his daily life. Marlin’s dream is to be famous like Drake, Lil Wayne, or Steph Curry and perhaps go shopping with one of them. The Dream Connection is trying to make Marlin’s dreams come true. The Dream Connection is a non-profit organization in Eastern Tennessee that makes kids, with life threatening illnesses, dreams come true! 

Our Goal

The goal of our campaign is to raise $1,000 for Marlin’s dream. The $1,000 will help contribute to any costs of meeting and shopping with one of Marlin’s idols. We have different perks for different types of donation values including handmade jewelry. Every donation counts and even if we do not reach our goal of $1,000, every dollar will go straight to Marlin’s dream.

The Impact

As a mother when you first have a child you get natural instincts to take care of them. One of those new heightened reactions is that you can easily figure out if your baby is crying and what they need to make them happy again. Imagine if your child started crying and there was nothing you could do to stop it. The worst part is that now this cry is all you hear and it has not stopped.  This is how Marlin William's mother feels right now she has been hearing this horrendous cry for help since Marlin was 4 months old. If you were to donate it is not going to stop him from crying but it will help him get a break from all of the tests, surgeries, and many nights spent in the hospital. 

Every child deserves to have a normal childhood, but unfortunately Marlin and many other kids in Eastern Tennessee do not have that. In spite of all the pain Marlin has faced recently, he deserves to have a smile on his face and live out his dream. Even if the donation is $1, it will go a long way to putting a smile on Marlin’s face. The Dream Connection fulfills between 60-75 dreams a year, and the dreams range from Disney World to meeting President George W. Bush and many more. Now it is time for Marlin’s dream of being famous with one of his idols come true.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in the financial position to donate money, but you can help by making others aware who can. If you spread the word to family and friends about Marlin’s dream, that helps just as much as donating to this cause. The more people who know about Marlin, the better chance we have of making his dream come true. If you would like to know more about The Dream Connection, you can click this link and it will take you to their website. Thank you very much for your time. Together, we can make Marlin’s dream come true!

story:
Hello! My name is Jonathan Tomines, a.k.a. The Toe Bro, a foot specialist (Chiropodist) based out of Toronto, Canada. Being a foot specialist is not only my profession but my passion! I grew up watching and helping my father, who was also a Chiropodist for over 30 years, and love my job and helping people with their feet!

Back in March 2017, I started The Toe Bro as a way to share my passion for foot care with the world. In a little over a past year, The Toe Bro Channel has gained a following of 175,000+ YouTube subscribers with over 40m views! More importantly, I've been able to share my passion and connect with foot care enthusiasts all over the world!

The team and I are looking forward to bringing more educational seminars to cities across North America. Thank you so much for all your support so far and we can’t wait to bring these events to life. The crowdfunding campaigns will start shortly with an aim to begin the tour in October 2018. We would really appreciate the support of the entire #tbtoes community to make this dream come true. If you would like to get involved, please let us know!

Based on the consistent feedback from the Toe Bro Community and the success of The Toe Bro educational seminar in Toronto, this is the RIGHT time to visit cities throughout North America. The Educational Seminar Tour will involve the following dates with more cities to follow in 2019.

New York (Manhattan), NY: Oct 11, 2018

Chicago, IL: Oct 25, 2018

Philadelphia, PA: Nov 8, 2018

Dallas, TX: Nov 29, 2018

Los Angeles, CA: Dec 6, 2018

*** This Indiegogo campaign is for Chicago, IL on October 25, 2018

With the “Step Up Your Footcare 101” Seminar, I’ll break down ways to identify, examine and treat common foot problems like Ingrown Toenails. I’ll also thoroughly discuss the following topics: 
​
Patient's Safety + Practitioner Safety
- How to protect yourself and your client
- Cross-Contamination

30 Sec Foot Assessment
- Educate your client about their feet

Common Foot Problems and Solutions
- Fungal nails
- Warts
- Corns/callouses

Post Treatment Care
- Cuts/wounds and Cleaning up
- Follow-up

Education
- Guiding your client with advice

With your contributions, either through ticket purchases for the seminar or small donations, The Toe Bro team will be able to bring educational seminars to cities across North America and share foot care knowledge with others in the industry. This is important as there is not a lot of knowledge currently available in the industry pertaining to foot health and foot care. Every contribution counts so if you would like to help in any way, it would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart and all the very best to you!

In total, we will need $7,310 CAD to fund the seminar. we hope to have 40 signups (two classes of 20) for each city and will accommodate with a bigger classroom if more people sign up. The funding will also cover flights for the team, classroom rental, accommodations (Airbnb), car rentals, workbooks, drinks/snacks for the seminar, workbooks, etc.

Also, If you would like to get directly involved and sponsor the team's expenses (flights, accommodations, car rentals, meals), please contact adam@thetoebro.com.

If we do not hit our target goal, we will not be able to host an educational seminar and the funds will be returned to each and every contributor.

Your help is imperative to making the educational seminar series a success. You can contribute by either:

1. Purchasing a ticket to the seminar 
2. Contributing with a small donation 
3. Resharing the Indiegogo links across your social channels

If you've read this far, I appreciate your time and commitment. This could potentially be the start of something BIG and the success of the first FIVE Educational Seminars will dictate our plans for future seminars in 2019. Looking forward to visiting your city!

Much Love,

Jonathan Tomines a.k.a. The Toe Bro

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt: Short Summary Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:  Introduce yourself and your background. Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you. Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.  Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?   What We Need & What You Get Break it down for folks in more detail:  Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.  Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited! Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.    The Impact Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:  Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world. Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one). Make it real for people and build trust.    Risks & Challenges  People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.  Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles. Describe your plan for solving these challenges.    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Scale and speed matter.

Every year, over 800,000 people take their own lives, and multitudes of that simply suffer and make poor decisions for themselves and their communities because of their mental & emotional challenges. The moment I recognized that I can meaningfully contribute to the lives of others is the moment I realized that taking things slowly comes at a cost. Therefore, I prioritize methods of contributing that maximize the impact of my efforts, and that's where working with psychedelics comes in.

Why Psychedelics?

Ever since psychedelics first came into popular consciousness in the 1950s and 1960s, research has suggested that there is more to these substances than wacky visuals and unusual thoughts. Indeed, the more recent wave of scientific research into psychedelics in the past few decades has shown incredibly promising results from MDMA’s potential to treat PTSD to psilocybin’s ability to produce mystical states that can conquer depression and make people’s lives more meaningful.  

 

In addition to these scientific studies, people’s personal experiences also speak volumes.  A simple YouTube search for psychedelics will yield countless results (you may even see my own popular video from 2014!) of people talking about psychedelics and the profound transformative impact these substances have induced. But this search will also reveal some truly challenging experiences people have had during the psychedelic trips. Some of these challenges are an unavoidable part of the revealing (psyche - mind, delic - manifesting) nature of the experience, but a very significant number of the “bad” experiences brought about by these substances are totally avoidable.  It is this tragedy – that psychedelics have such huge potential to promote healing, self-exploration, and realization, but can also produce totally opposite outcomes if used incorrectly – and this is the very reason that inspired us to found this company.

Why Psychedelic Evolution?

One of the single biggest roadblocks to the fruitful use of psychedelics is simply the lack of accessible, thorough, and systematic resources which make the journey of preparation, transformation, and integration clear. Many people who have had “negative” experiences with psychedelics actually end up finding these experiences some of the most transformational – though the experience felt overwhelming or scary, it was revealing a difficult truth. Realizing these truths through the experience or after the fact can be extremely liberating and can, in turn, lead to profound transformation within the individual, but this can be an exceedingly difficult process for someone without a deep understanding of the psychedelic state.


This is the need we are trying to fill. As more and more cities and countries decriminalize psychedelics, the more and more important it becomes for there to be a cultural education about how to optimally use these tools.  We want to ensure that information on best practices for psychedelic exploration is accessible and free. One of the ways we are already doing this is through our podcast where we're having conversations with some of the forerunners in research and application psychedelic therapy around how we can best utilize and integrate psychedelic experiences. But we need to go beyond just a podcast and begin to create transformational content; a project we're calling #SacredCinema.

Why #SacredCinema?

It has to feel hands-on, otherwise, no one’s going to learn anything. It has to be personal, it has to be emotional in order for it touch people in a meaningful way. Statistics, facts, reasons — they are not what move people. Stories, perspectives, and emotions are what move people.

That’s why our goal is to become the best at making psychedelic trip content. That way, the viewer, from the comfort of their home, can join in on the transformation simply by opening up to the experience and engaging with what they’re viewing in a raw & vulnerable fashion.

As long as the content is shot & recorded in a legal jurisdiction, it can be produced and published, and then viewed by every other jurisdiction in the world, regardless of their legal status. It’s absolutely brilliant.

The goal of #SacredCinema is to entertain people with spiritually transformative material while embedding within the narrative principles of how to properly navigate these experiences.

Funding Breakdown

According to our calculations, taking into account everything from flight tickets, government registrations, rent, food & transport --- as well as some camera gear costs, the whole project will cost us roughly $22,000 CAD for a three month period. We'll be able to cover roughly 10k of that our own pocket. The rest of it, we are counting on support via this campaign as well as earning by working within the trip facilitation world.

Thank you for your Support

Words of encouragement, genuine feedback, advice, and useful connections --- are all deeply meaningful for us. We appreciate each and every one of you, and are grateful for your help with this undertaking.

story:
About Me

Hello everyone,

Luckily my English is better in writing :)

I'm an electronics hobbyist, much like most of the target market for this device. My involvement with electronics started when I was a kid, but this hobby got completely replaced by programming until several years ago, when it came back strong. I think it's gonna stick for life this time.

Even though I have 20+ years of programming under my belt and I've spent most of my free time in the past few years working with microcontrollers, I'm no electronics engineer. This makes me very nervous about this project, but I have enough confidence in my skills to believe that I can actually pull it off, hence the campaign.

I am currently working as a software developer and I'd like to keep it that way, so, in my view, this entire endeavor is an extension of my hobby, a way to add more substance to it through a long term goal and engagement.


Use cases

1) Getting familiar with new ICs.

Probably the most common use case. For example, if I have a new sensor, I hook it up to the proto-talk and go through the initialization sequence, then I try to get it to do its job. When I'm done getting familiar with the chip, I can start writing code that communicates with it, with out going through as many hit and misses as I would have if I didn't do this.

2) Testing sub circuits.

Sometimes part of a project might misbehave and the only way to rule out bad communication on the bus, is by sniffing it or even taking the role of a master on the bus. (check the gallery for the I2C demo).

On other occasions you may only have to create a module that's not part of anything. When that's the case, testing it involves connecting the module to a device that talks the protocol.


Requirements

It connects over USB and shows up as a serial port, so you will need:

  • A PC with an USB 2 port.
  • A terminal client that can connect to COM ports. I prefer PuTTY both on Windows and Linux.


Proto-Talk & Compromises (the bad news)

I start with this because I like to keep the good for last and because I believe it's mandatory that you know the main downfalls of this device before you get all excited about the features. It should also give you enough information to put those features into perspective, when you read about them in the next chapter.

As with all electronic devices, the final product is just a mixture of the compromises you made.

The main chip

As I said in the video, this is not the first version, there were other versions before, but they all pale in comparison. At its core it's using a STM32F4 chip, which I didn't pick because I had a devboard laying around (which I did), but because it met most of the requirements I had in mind when I started working on this project. Some things are poorly implemented in this chip and they reflect in the limitations of the proto-talk, but I was forced to keep it because it had some other things I needed. You could say that this is the main compromise.

The baudrate

Again, as said in the video, one of the key features is the low baudrate error. The trick there is that when you're requesting a new baudrate, it reconfigures its entire clock system, from the first PLL divider, down to the peripheral clock. When doing that, it tries to keep the highest core clock it can, while still reaching the desired value, within the specified error. In some cases this leads to other issues (does not affect all peripherals), related to the fact that some operations might not have enough core clock cycles to  complete before the next bit of data needs to be processed. This was another compromise and it's documented in the Limits & Limitations section. As a work around, I plan to add an optional constrain so the baudrate request keeps the core clock to at least x times the peripheral clock,  where x is adjusted to fit the problematic operations.

USB

Another challenge which lead to another compromise, was the choice of an USB chip. Doesn't the STM32F4 already have a USB peripheral you ask? Well, I didn't want to have USB interrupts messing up any ongoing communication and I didn't want to limit how much the internal clock can change (the USB peripheral needs a specific clock), so I had to delegate that to another chip.

Because the main chip is changing its clock so casually, communication between the F4 and the USB chip had to be done in a very flexible manner, yet as fast as possible. Needless to say, this narrowed it down to a single chip family and a throughoutput of about 6 Mbps (pretty good really, but I was hoping for 10 Mbps).

The current throughoutput is directly related to the core clock, which varies with baudrate and is the main reason why an overflow could happen during tunnel mode. Overflows are indicated with a red LED on the board.

Output buffers

This was another hard choice, I went through many buffers, both unidirectional and bidirectional ones. I chose the ones I'm currently using because of their rated baudrates and because they could work at the required voltages on both sides.

The current choice is not set in stone, so it might change by the time the final version is out. Remains to be seen.

The nice thing about them is that they are auto-bidirectional, so they don't need to be configured, they just work, which offers a lot of room for new protocol implementations. This is also their downside, being able to automatically switch direction, means that they can't drive big or capacitive loads. If you try to do that, they'll think the other side is trying to drive the line as well and strange things start happening.

Another downside, related to the port B output buffer (the one in charge of I2C, 1-Wire & DHT - basically open drain protocols), is that it has a built in 10k pull-up. This means that it can't be disabled, once the buffer is enabled. I've looked into alternatives, but there doesn't appear to be any sensible solution to it, not without incurring some other major drawbacks. I'll keep looking into it, but at the moment it appears to be the only viable solution.


Specifications and Features

More to come, but currently in the prototype:

Output Levels

  • 1.2 V to 5 V.
  • 1.3 mV of resolution.

USART

  • 1 bps to 10 Mbps @ less than 0.2% baudrate error.
  • Hardware handshaking mode @ 1 bps to 5 Mbps.
  • Selectable number of stop bits (between 0.5, 1, 1.5 and 2 bits).
  • Synchronous master mode.
  • Tunnel mode. *

SPI - master only at the moment

  • 11 bps to 20 Mbps @ less than 0.2% baudrate error. **
  • All 4 SPI modes.
  • Tunnel mode. *
  • Separate instruction for CS.
    I2C

    • Standard and Fast Mode (SM & FM).
    • Allows you to violate the spec and go up to 1 Mbps in both SM and FM @ less than 0.14% baudrate error.
    • Bus sniffer.
    • Bus scanner.
    • Support for 7-bit addresses for now. 10-bit addresses planned.
    • Selectable pullups between 10k, 5k, 3.3k and 2.5k (combination of 5, 10 and the internal 10k one of the output buffer).
    • Separate start & stop instructions for more robust commands.

    1-Wire

    • Standard mode for now, overdrive mode to come.
    • Bus sniffer.
    • Bus scanner.
    • Selectable pullups between 10k, 5k, 3.3k and 2.5k (combination of 5, 10 and the internal 10k one of the output buffer).
    • Can also send individual bits.

    MicroWire

    It's under development, at the moment it can only talk this protocol, with arbitrary number of bits per opcode (0-16), arbitrary number of bits per address (0-32) and arbitrary number of bits per data value.

    LIN - needs transceiver, doesn't come with it

    • Bus sniffer.
    • Answer to custom header IDs with predefined messages.
    • Automatically adds parity bits when sending and also checks them in sniffing.

    Smart Card - the ISO 7816-3 protocol

    • Supports both MSB and LSB communication.
    • T=0 implemented, T=1 in the works.
    • Reset instruction with built in control over the VCC line.
    • ATR interpretation.
    • Baudrate generation as a function of the clock.
    • PTS & APDU instructions.

    Because of the programmable output level, the required voltage of the card can be detected by simply changing the output voltage of the proto-talk between the standard voltages at which smart cards can operate and running the reset instruction.

      DHT

      This family of sensors has grown into popularity lately, which is why I included them, I might move them in the future in a section dedicated to particular chips.

      • Can read the data from a DHT11 or DHT22 chip
      • Sniffer
      • Selectable pullups between 10k, 5k, 3.3k and 2.5k (combination of 5, 10 and the internal 10k one of the output buffer).

      PWM

      Rather useless with the current output buffers, since it can't drive any big load (like an LED) nor capacitive loads (like a filter - if the resistor is not big enough).

      LCD - HD44780 Driver

      It allows you to perform most of the functions of the LCD as well as providing a quick test routine.

      Support only for the 4-bit mode at the moment, but I also plan to add support for 8-bit mode and sniffing for both modes (this is where the output buffers shine).

      SD Card Slot & SDK

      It also comes with a SD card slot that can be used to store programs and modules that proto-talk can run.

      At this point I have managed to find files on the SD card, load them, run custom programs and implemented a basic SDK.

      This functionality will be there, but it's low priority so I haven't even thought about a proper SDK structure or module structure.


      * Subject to buffer overflow, as the incoming data may come in faster than the speed at which it's going out. A buffer overflow happens when there's incoming data, waiting to be processed, but the internal buffers are already full (with previous data).

      ** For SPI, the specified baudrate error of less than 0.2% is valid with one exception: 426 bps becomes 427 bps, which represents a baudrate error of 0.23%. In all other cases, the baudrate error is less than 0.18% (holds true for UART as well).



      Possible Features

      Most likely in future firmware updates (after the release date).

      1) A rather certain feature is semi-direct port access, so new protocols can be implemented by bitbanging from user code.

      2) API for a binary mode, so the device can be switched into that mode and controlled via scripts or programs on the PC.

      3) Logic Analyzer. Even if the buffers are not making it ideal for this task and the little available memory would make it a rather useless LA (about 60 kb of RAM left for that), the fact is that it should still be able to sample data at up to about 40 Mbps. Not a real promise, but it's more than likely that this feature will make its way in there.

      There are several things I didn't have enough time to look into, that I would like to add, but can't promise anything. If it is possible to add them, chances are they'll come in later firmware updates.

      1) CAN. I took a quick look and it seemed complex enough to delay the launch of this campaign for too long. I postponed looking into it until more important things are done.

      2) SD & MMC interface. This is something I'm very excited about and it's sort of top priority after all the basics are done. I went with the SPI mode for the built in SD Card slot because I wanted to have the native SDIO data lines free. They are routed to the two I/O ports of the proto-talk and the plan is to make it talk to cards and chips that talk the native SD / MMC protocol. This, coupled with the 1.2 to 5 V variable output level, could quickly morph it into a very nice and powerful recovery tool (for example for extracting data from broken phones and devices that have such chips).

      3) Some sort of support for IR. (very low priority, unless requested by many users)


      What I Need & What You Get

      For this section, indiegogo is suggesting me to:

      • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
      • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
      • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

      Let's start with the first one, why so much and where it's going:

      For a breakdown:

      - Most of it is going on components.
      - Another big chunk of it is going to the assembly house (they'll also handle the shipping).
      - I also expect to spend about 1k on boards with fast turnaround for the various changes I'll make.
      - At this point it looks like I may have to also buy an USB VID ($5000), which I'm not sure how to view, since it's both expensive enough to want to avoid it, but also useful enough to really want one. I'm doing my best to avoid it at the moment, but it doesn't look like it's going to happen.

      This leaves us with a rather slim slice for me, which will serve as my motivation to continue working on proto-talk and deliver a finished product.

      The way I see it, is that if this campaign gets successfully funded (the required number of devices get sold), it means there's enough interest for the device that I can keep producing it even after the campaign. What I'm trying to avoid is committing long-term, to a time sink that generates no income. I tried offering software for free and it stops being fun when you don't need it anymore, but other people do and they need you to keep working on it.

      About: Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!

      I would hope that the specifications alone got you excited enough :) Personally I'm very excited about it, with or without this campaign.

      If it will get overfunded by a lot, I will have to check with the manufacturer and see if I can throw in some additional external goodies. I never did this before, but I suspect it all comes down to the quantities.

      About: Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

      It's fixed funding, so if the goal isn't reached, the funds go back into your pocket.


      Delivery

      I hope it will be ready much sooner, but after the ordeal I've been through with the first prototype board (got delayed by one month) and because we all make mistakes, I'm going to take 2 months after this campaign is funded to keep working on it, before going into production.

      If everything goes fine and I'm confident that the hardware won't receive any more changes, it might get into production sooner, but things rarely go as you expect them to, so don't get your hopes up.

      Another note worthy thing is that it will ship directly from China, so expect the kind of shipping times that the Chinese postal service is offering.


      Risks & Challenges

      Being completely new to this, I can only imagine, but I suppose the worst thing that can happen is that nobody will receive their proto-talk. That's obviously not the plan, but hey... it happened before.

      Aside from the risks that arise from working with a foreign assembly house and not being able to overview the entire process, I am only afraid of screwups in the design.

      Because of that, I plan to get all the basic firmware features right first, in the idea that possible hardware issues might make themselves visible during this period as well as hardware requirements that I haven't foreseen for the design at hand.

      I haven't talked about it with them yet, but I believe the assembly house can do a test run as well, so I'll do that and make sure that what comes out of the factory is at the expected quality.

      You should also know that I was already quoted by the assembly house so I don't think there'll be any surprises there.

      Given that this is an actual working prototype, I'd say the risks of me spending all the money on R&D are pretty slim :) If nothing goes horribly wrong, some layout changes will be in order and that's about it.

      If I decide to try new output buffers and fail, I'll simply revert to the current design and live with the quirks of the current buffers as I described in the previous sections.


      Edits

      04-Oct-2014: The Smart Card mode was added.

      05-Oct-2014: The baudrate errors were added for SPI & I2C and the SPI baudrate span was changed from "1 bps to 20 Mbps" to "11 bps to 20 Mbps".


      Ways You Can Help

      I don't have a huge social network (actually I only have about 10 friends in my facebook account) and I don't like to spam either, so even if you don't have a use for this, but you know someone who might, please share this campaign with them.

      Thank you,
      Razvan
