story:
Tub Club’s Origin Story….. Why Should You Give a F&*ck?

The Long Answer:

Once upon a time, there was a poor, sad leetle boy from Russia named Mishka.

Life was hard in the Fatherland: bread lines, limited pop music, and a severe lack of recreational water features. In fact, Mishka’s life was so hard, and sad, that he took comfort in the small things: Almond Roca. His silky blond ringlets. Warm baths.

Yes—baths. Little Mishka’s safe place. Where water, warm as Borscht soup, hugged his body in unconditional love. The love, he knew, he’d never get from a distant father and a mother who, though supportive, worked tirelessly to bring home the (uncooked) bacon.

Though his nightly ritual did give poor, sad leetle Michka great comfort, bathing in Russia was no simple indulgence. Water had to be heated in a pot over a wood fire and poured by hand into a horse trough lined in splinters, that only came out one of two temperatures: boil-your-skin-off hot, or couldn’t-even-steep-tea tepid. No bubbles, no jets, no beer holders. Not even a hint of a waterfall.

Poor, sad leetle Mishka dreamed of a day—or maybe even a place—where water flowed like wine, and could be heated to precisely 104 degrees. Where tubs were roomy, and the ladies got naked. Mishka knew this place existed—and yearned to park his sore, aching body there.

This place, he was told, was called The United States of America. In this strange, puritanical land of cleanliness, he heard that baths were so commonplace, people even took them standing up. Liquid, hot as lava, rained down from the heavens, through faucets and fixtures of gold—and Mishka wanted in. All in.

So with nothing but a PVC pipe and a dream, Mishka immigrated to the U.S. to train to become a world-class—or just a really, really decent—plumber, working with hoses, tubs, heaters, and caulk. All things he knew might one day come in handy should a poor, sad leetle boy from Russia ever achieve his ultimate American Dream: proud owner of a tub of his own.

But of course, Mishka knew that when it comes to one’s dreams—you should never aim low. So he set his sights on an LED lit, bluetooth-enabled, 3-pump, 90-jet jacuzzi hydrotherapy experience. A 6-person heated mini-pool with cascading water, a lounging seat, and yes, a waterfall. 

But hot tubs do not grow on trees—not even in the fertile Garden State. Mishka knew if he wanted a slice of this American (pecan) pie, he’d have to beg, borrow or steal to get it (or at least, get caught across state lines carrying too much of it). So he cut corners, got caught. Did some hard time.

Though he entered the slammer a poor leetle Russian boy—he left a fully-formed, resolute Russki man, more determined than ever. And now, well-equipped with his own plumbing business, a home in the suburbs, and a spacious, landscaped backyard—just the right size for a deluxe, high-end hot tub—it started to seem to those who knew him best, that Mishka was more than ready, and deserving, of tub ownership. He just needed a little help from his friends. 

Like Mishka's closest and most-trusted childhood comrade, the unusually well-toned Mr. "Rob" Zilla Lobster II, North Jersey's most in-demand electrician. Mr. Lobster gave up many an evening (and therefore countless sexual conquests) upgrading Mishka's electrical system, just so it could withstand the tub of Mishka's wet, hot dreams. As well, his always-cheery, sweet Aunt Narnia, a great lover and supporter of the (cardboard) Arts, left a great deal of her estate, pet raccoons, and novelty inflatable sculpture collection to this dear and noble cause when she recently passed on to a better life (in Brooklyn), RIP. Not to mention Mishka's top customer and dearest confidant, the brilliant and incomparably suave real estate mogul Pasha “Paul” Spashadore of Nikulin Enterprises, who even offered to buy Mishka a hot tub—just out of the pure kindness of his heart. But alas, the offer was too generous. Mishka had to refuse. This was one human-sized pot of water he’d have to boil himself. 

Or if not himself…with a whole gang of collective—and specifically financial—love and support. And that's where you come in, Friend.

Let's ALL help poor, dear old Mishka pursue his unalienable rights to life, liberty, and soaking freely, out-of-doors with friends, intoxicated, until wrinkles and heat stroke force him inside. It's the American way! Manifest destiny! Let's all build this dream together...and then fill it with water, shock it with chemicals, and step gingerly inside. 

The Short Answer:  Because you'll get stuff. Or at least get to talk about getting stuff.

WTF hot tub is this?

Not just any tub. The Evolution Spas’ Hampton 90-Jet Lounger Spa. SOAK IT IN:

  • Seating for 6, headrests for 3 (Thunderdome!)
  • Natural water purification system (chlorine levels at 8.9 instead of 10)
  • Programmable multicolor LED lights (Rave tub!)
  • Lighted cup holders, 5 glowing swirl jets (Disco Rave Tub!)
  • Stereo system with Bluetooth capabilities (Booming Disco Rave Tub!)
  • 2 Marine-quality speakers, 2 cabinet speakers (neighbor-friendly!)
  • Underwater junk illuminators (for all your skinny dipping needs)
  • Backlit digital control panel (for those night-blind control freaks)
  • Easy to apply insulated spa hat (keep it covered, people!)

Are you ready for orgasmic, spine-tingling hot water? Because WINTER IS COMING.  

Tub Club Membership Details

Tub Club would be pretty shady if these club dues were real, but let’s pretend for a second they are. Here’s what you'll get with your elite Tub Club membership:

Member Level: Diamond Crown

  • With this impressive and sizeable contribution, you'll be memorialized in our inner circle, your name emblazoned on an expensive-looking plaque displayed in our club quarters, along with bottomless bragging rights and top club perks such as:
    • Key privileges / open door policy
    • Unlimited tub time
    • Heated towel Service
    • Table and bottle service for up to six guests (1-day notice req.)
    • One spa-style massage per visit (happy ending extra)

Member Level: Golden Star

  • With your generous contribution, you're among our club VIPs, enjoying:  
    • Open door policy
    • 2-hour tub sessions
    • Heated towel service 
    • Complimentary snacks and/or beverages (beer, wine, or booze)
    • Cleaning service included 

Member Level: Silver Spoon

  • Our largest group of contributors are still valuable members of our flock. With your support comes:
    • Pre-arranged visitation
    • 1-hour tub sessions 
    • Towels (standard temperature)
    • Costco Snacks ONLY 
    • Anything but the good wine  

Member Level: Bronze Head 

  • Your why-bother contribution means you'll probably still be invited to parties and tolerated, but you best be packin' booze and/or pancakes. Your membership comes with:
    • Pre-arranged visitation 
    • 30 min tub sessions
    • BYO towels and snacks (and extra for VIPs) 
    • 1 Budweiser per visit 
    • Clean up / LNT required  

Member Level: Pile of Lettuce 

  • You came, you saw—and maybe even got to go in the tub! At the very least, you helped everyone else have fun in the tub. What you don’t buy in user rights, you’ll contribute later via refreshments, cleaning labor, and towel/robe fetching. You are the club's first line of defense against cold, thirst, boredom, and offensive nudity. With this pitiful handful of laundry quarters you gave us, you can come over sometimes for the following: 
    • Standby (floating room only)
    • Previously used and/or wet towels
    • BYO snacks, beer, and booze
    • Fetching shifts & errands
    • You ARE the cleaning service

But of course, Mishka knew that when it comes to one’s dreams—you should never aim low. So he set his sights on an LED lit, bluetooth-enabled, 3-pump, 90-jet jacuzzi hydrotherapy experience. A 6-person heated mini-pool with cascading water, a lounging seat, and yes, a waterfall. 
But hot tubs do not grow on trees—not even in the fertile Garden State. Mishka knew if he wanted a slice of this American (pecan) pie, he’d have to beg, borrow or steal to get it (or at least, get caught across state lines carrying too much of it). So he cut corners, got caught. Did some hard time.
Though he entered the slammer a poor leetle Russian boy—he left a fully-formed, resolute Russki man, more determined than ever. And now, well-equipped with his own plumbing business, a home in the suburbs, and a spacious, landscaped backyard—just the right size for a deluxe, high-end hot tub—it started to seem to those who knew him best, that Mishka was more than ready, and deserving, of tub ownership. He just needed a little help from his friends. 
Like Mishka's closest and most-trusted childhood comrade, the unusually well-toned Mr. "Rob" Zilla Lobster II, North Jersey's most in-demand electrician. Mr. Lobster gave up many an evening (and therefore countless sexual conquests) upgrading Mishka's electrical system, just so it could withstand the tub of Mishka's wet, hot dreams. As well, his always-cheery, sweet Aunt Narnia, a great lover and supporter of the (cardboard) Arts, left a great deal of her estate, pet raccoons, and novelty inflatable sculpture collection to this dear and noble cause when she recently passed on to a better life (in Brooklyn), RIP. Not to mention Mishka's top customer and dearest confidant, the brilliant and incomparably suave real estate mogul Pasha “Paul” Spashadore of Nikulin Enterprises, who even offered to buy Mishka a hot tub—just out of the pure kindness of his heart. But alas, the offer was too generous. Mishka had to refuse. This was one human-sized pot of water he’d have to boil himself. 
Or if not himself…with a whole gang of collective—and specifically financial—love and support. And that's where you come in, Friend. 
Let's ALL help poor, dear old Mishka pursue his unalienable rights to life, liberty, and soaking freely, out-of-doors with friends, intoxicated, until wrinkles and heat stroke force him inside. It's the American way! Manifest destiny! Let's all build this dream together...and then fill it with water, shock it with chemicals, and step gingerly inside. 
The Short Answer:  Because you'll get stuff. Or at least get to talk about getting stuff.
WTF hot tub is this?
Not just any tub. The Evolution Spas’ Hampton 90-Jet Lounger Spa. SOAK IT IN:

Seating for 6, headrests for 3 (Thunderdome!)
Natural water purification system (chlorine levels at 8.9 instead of 10)
Programmable multicolor LED lights (Rave tub!)
Lighted cup holders, 5 glowing swirl jets (Disco Rave Tub!)
Stereo system with Bluetooth capabilities (Booming Disco Rave Tub!)
2 Marine-quality speakers, 2 cabinet speakers (neighbor-friendly!)
Underwater junk illuminators (for all your skinny dipping needs)
Backlit digital control panel (for those night-blind control freaks)
Easy to apply insulated spa hat (keep it covered, people!)

Are you ready for orgasmic, spine-tingling hot water? Because WINTER IS COMING.  

Tub Club Membership Details
Tub Club would be pretty shady if these club dues were real, but let’s pretend for a second they are. Here’s what you'll get with your elite Tub Club membership:
Member Level: Diamond Crown
With this impressive and sizeable contribution, you'll be memorialized in our inner circle, your name emblazoned on an expensive-looking plaque displayed in our club quarters, along with bottomless bragging rights and top club perks such as:
Key privileges / open door policy
Unlimited tub time
Heated towel Service
Table and bottle service for up to six guests (1-day notice req.)
One spa-style massage per visit (happy ending extra)


Member Level: Golden Star
With your generous contribution, you're among our club VIPs, enjoying:  
Open door policy
2-hour tub sessions
Heated towel service 
Complimentary snacks and/or beverages (beer, wine, or booze)
Cleaning service included 



Member Level: Silver Spoon
Our largest group of contributors are still valuable members of our flock. With your support comes:
Pre-arranged visitation
1-hour tub sessions 
Towels (standard temperature)
Costco Snacks ONLY 
Anything but the good wine  




Member Level: Bronze Head 
Your why-bother contribution means you'll probably still be invited to parties and tolerated, but you best be packin' booze and/or pancakes. Your membership comes with:
Pre-arranged visitation 
30 min tub sessions
BYO towels and snacks (and extra for VIPs) 
1 Budweiser per visit 
Clean up / LNT required  


Member Level: Pile of Lettuce 
You came, you saw—and maybe even got to go in the tub! At the very least, you helped everyone else have fun in the tub. What you don’t buy in user rights, you’ll contribute later via refreshments, cleaning labor, and towel/robe fetching. You are the club's first line of defense against cold, thirst, boredom, and offensive nudity. With this pitiful handful of laundry quarters you gave us, you can come over sometimes for the following: 
Standby (floating room only)
Previously used and/or wet towels
BYO snacks, beer, and booze
Fetching shifts & errands
You ARE the cleaning service

story:
Hello! My name is Jonathan Tomines, a.k.a. The Toe Bro, a foot specialist (Chiropodist) based out of Toronto, Canada. Being a foot specialist is not only my profession but my passion! I grew up watching and helping my father, who was also a Chiropodist for over 30 years, and love my job and helping people with their feet!

Back in March 2017, I started The Toe Bro as a way to share my passion for foot care with the world. In a little over a past year, The Toe Bro Channel has gained a following of 175,000+ YouTube subscribers with over 40m views! More importantly, I've been able to share my passion and connect with foot care enthusiasts all over the world!

The team and I are looking forward to bringing more educational seminars to cities across North America. Thank you so much for all your support so far and we can’t wait to bring these events to life. The crowdfunding campaigns will start shortly with an aim to begin the tour in October 2018. We would really appreciate the support of the entire #tbtoes community to make this dream come true. If you would like to get involved, please let us know!

Based on the consistent feedback from the Toe Bro Community and the success of The Toe Bro educational seminar in Toronto, this is the RIGHT time to visit cities throughout North America. The Educational Seminar Tour will involve the following dates with more cities to follow in 2019.

New York (Manhattan), NY: Oct 11, 2018

Chicago, IL: Oct 25, 2018

Philadelphia, PA: Nov 8, 2018

Dallas, TX: Nov 29, 2018

Los Angeles, CA: Dec 6, 2018

*** This Indiegogo campaign is for Dallas, TX on November 29, 2018

With the “Step Up Your Footcare 101” Seminar, I’ll break down ways to identify, examine and treat common foot problems like Ingrown Toenails. I’ll also thoroughly discuss the following topics: 

Patient's Safety + Practitioner Safety
- How to protect yourself and your client
- Cross-Contamination

30 Sec Foot Assessment
- Educate your client about their feet

Common Foot Problems and Solutions
- Fungal nails
- Warts
- Corns/callouses

Post Treatment Care
- Cuts/wounds and Cleaning up
- Follow-up

Education
- Guiding your client with advice

With your contributions, either through ticket purchases for the seminar or small donations, The Toe Bro team will be able to bring educational seminars to cities across North America and share foot care knowledge with others in the industry. This is important as there is not a lot of knowledge currently available in the industry pertaining to foot health and foot care. Every contribution counts so if you would like to help in any way, it would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart and all the very best to you!

In total, we will need $7,840 CAD to fund the seminar. we hope to have 40 signups (two classes of 20) for each city and will accommodate with a bigger classroom if more people sign up. The funding will also cover flights for the team, classroom rental, accommodations (Airbnb), car rentals, workbooks, drinks/snacks for the seminar, workbooks, etc.

Also, If you would like to get directly involved and sponsor the team's expenses (flights, accommodations, car rentals, meals), please contact adam@thetoebro.com.

If we do not hit our target goal, we will not be able to host an educational seminar and the funds will be returned to each and every contributor.

Your help is imperative to making the educational seminar series a success. You can contribute by either:

1. Purchasing a ticket to the seminar 
2. Contributing with a small donation 
3. Resharing the Indiegogo links across your social channels

If you've read this far, I appreciate your time and commitment. This could potentially be the start of something BIG and the success of the first FIVE Educational Seminars will dictate our plans for future seminars in 2019. Looking forward to visiting your city!

Much Love,

Jonathan Tomines a.k.a. The Toe Bro

story:
Objetivo General:

Generar un impacto psicosocial a nivel individual y comunitario, recolectando fondos en toda la Provincia de Tungurahua, los cuales serán entregados al Hospital de SOLCA provincial, para de esta manera ayudar a solventar algunos de los gastos que tienen los tratamientos de cáncer en niños.

Objetivo específico:

Recorrer trotando 115k conectando a todos los cantones de la Provincia de Tungurahua, solicitando el apoyo de los Municipios y de toda la colectividad en general, para de esta manera recaudar un monto base de $10.000,00 (Diez mil dólares Americanos).

 

  1. Desarrollo

El proyecto que se desarrollará se llama “115k PARA QUE NO SE PIERDA UNA SONRISA” el cual se desarrollará en 3 etapas:

1era Etapa

Se recorrerá los catones de: Tisaleo, Mocha, Quero,Cevallos y Pelileo con un total de 44km.

2da Etapa

Se recorrerá los catones de: Pelileo, Baños de Agua Santa y Patate con un total de 36km.

3era Etapa

Se recorrerá los catones de:  Patate, Pillaro, Ambato 35km

story:
^The women behind the brand! Say hello to some of our team :)

Guess what? Traditional period care products like sanitary pads and tampons aren't made from fluffy white cotton. They're made mostly from synthetics like rayon, viscose and polyester. Great for shoulder-padded suits in the 80's - but shouldn't our period care have evolved in this time? 

The impact these products have on our bodies, our relationship with our periods and the planet is colossal when you consider...

We exist to ensure healthy & conscious periods for ALL women & girls in Asia, so we created the LUÜNA Period Cup. Made from 100% medical-grade silicone, our cup combines a silky-smooth feel with superior flexy-fit technology that intuitively fits to your body shape.

Due to it's super soft form-fitting material and ridged stem, it's simple to insert, comfortable to wear and easy to remove - the women on our team can attest to that first-hand!

And because our bodies are all different, we've developed two cup sizes designed to fit different cervix shapes (see more about how to choose your size below). 

 

 

So why should we make the switch (like Sandy ^, our cup workshop lead in Shanghai)?

Well, the advantages of the cup actually go beyond its healthy and eco-friendly nature. Because this product can be used for 5 years, it means it's a lot kinder to our wallets than other disposable period care! What's not to love?

 

We don't cut corners when it comes to our products, so you can be sure that the highest safety and hygiene standards have been adhered to in the products process. 

We put it in our bodies, so you can feel safe to do so too!

 

But LUÜNA isn't just about healthy periods for ourselves, so we are working with the amazing Zoe Chan, founder of FreePeriodsHK, to sustainably fight period poverty in Hong Kong.

Through our buy-one-cup, give-one-cup initiative, we will donate a cup to FreePeriodsHK for every cup sold. But we need your help to get there. 

Our goal? 1,000 cup donates by Aug.31st 2019.

 

Check out our guide to using the cup below:

We won't lie, getting the cup right can be tricky and takes practice but we promise, it's so worth it. That's why we've developed online and offline workshops to safely guide more women and girls to enjoy them.

Email us at workshops@luuna-naturals.com to book a session for you or your friends. Our team will get back to you with more info  (check out our recent workshop in Hong Kong)!

story:
Charlotte’s story

As a soulful holistic practitioner, yogini, facilitator and artist I most enjoy employing a wide range of tools and practices to inspire and assist others to create the meaningful and beautiful life they deserve.

I am so passionate about sharing the incredible healing modality of breathwork with others.

I have been inspired to study breathwork in depth and train to deepen my understanding and capacity to share this with others for a number of reasons.

Firstly, my father suffers with COPD, which is distressing, and a daily reminder of the importance of our breath and the impact this has on the quality of our lives.

Secondly, as a yoga teacher I hear people saying every day that they can't get the breathing right, or their breathing feels back to front, stuck, or they can't take a long deep breath.

Thirdly I grew up in a family where my sister had brittle asthma, I would spend many a long night massaging her back and breathing with her to alleviate the symptoms.

I have been acutely aware of the impact our breath has on our ability to be present, resourceful, to cope in difficult situations, to find joy, peace and accept love, to find ease in our body and to be able to give more and to surrender.

What's Needed and What You Gain in Return

The funds from this campaign will enable me to complete my Breathwork Facilitator Training with the Breathwork school Alchemy of Breath.

Your donation covers my tuition fees and flight costs to and from Bali and Ibiza where I will be completing my training in May 2018.

  • Alchemy of Breath Teacher Training with Anthony Abbagnano: £3,800
  • Flight to Bali: £848
  • Flight to Ibiza: £159

*Perks must be claimed with 12 months of completion of my training (by May 2019).

Try it for yourself

If you would like to experience the power of your breath Anthony, my teacher, is offering regular FREE online breathwork sessions to unlock the power of conscious breathing and connection.

Sign up here:

https://www.alchemyofbreath.com/breathwork-webi...

story:
About the this Campaign:

Hello! Hello! Hello! First off thank you for clicking on this link!!

My names Jireh, Jireh L. Drake and I am just a young Black TGNC artist and activist, who is trying to fix my teeth and be in less pain, let me tell you about it..

So for the past three years I have been experiencing intense teeth pains. However, now that I am more financially stable and college isn’t gnawing at my brain/existence, I decided to figure out what was going on in my mouth. I started this process back in September.  I thought I only needed to remove my wisdom teeth but I also learned I needed a root canal. That is about $1900 that I have to pay up front and in full before my parents insurance will partly reimburse me.

My appointments were scheduled months out, in this time I worked a few extra art jobs, used my savings and borrowed money from my family to scrounge together this money, while holding all other life expenses. When the time came from my wisdom teeth extraction appointment in June, there were some complications, I was forced to cancel and reschedule to September. It was devastating, but I pushed forward.

Now, as I prepare for my root canal, I was recently informed after the procedure I need to go to another dentist and get a crowning and build up, which totals $1800.

I was confident that I could hold the root canal and wisdom teeth extraction procedures, especially because my appointments were spaced out which is good for an insurance refund. However, now that an extra $1800 dollars was tacked on, I cannot hold all of this by myself.

Since my parents insurance since is not accepted everywhere, I have to pay in-full upfront, wait for a slow partial refund and I will hit my max-coverage- what all of this means is I have to pay $3700 in two months.

While all of this is happening, going to countless appointments, being on the phone with UIC and insurance - to understand the ins and outs of everything, I am moving. So many stressors are colliding at the same time. I am so tired of all of these hiccups and navigating these complicated systems. I know that I don’t have the strength to restart this process or existing in more pain, so I am asking for help.

 

As I said before, i’ve pulled together part of the money but now I need some help. I need to raise $1200 by September 25th. Please donate, share, send me some good vibes and/or mushy/wisdom teeth friendly food. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.

Break down of money: I have $1000 currently, I could squeeze together another 900 by borrowing a little more from my family, nearly depleting my savings and cutting costs across the board and then hopefully I will raise 1200 from community, which comes to a total of $3100 and I am hoping that the insurance refunds will make it in time to cover that last $630 dollars.

  • Wisdom teeth extraction $1237
  • Root canal $653
  • Crowning $1495
  • Build up $330 

Totaling roughly $3730*

*All of these numbers does not take into consideration x-ray, examination fees or any extra appointments, just the procedure price.

story:
Sobre el proyecto

#ReseteAss nace con la intención de dar la bienvenida al 2021 con positivismo, ilusión y buen rollo. Está claro que el rojo no funcionó en 2020, por eso hemos apostado por romper con la tradición y jugarlo todo al verde. 

Esta NavidAss cambia la manera de dar la bienvenida al año nuevo con #ReseteAss, la ropa interior solidaria que dona todos sus beneficios a la investigación contra la COVID. 

 

¿Para qué es la financiación?

Todos los beneficios de la campaña de Navidad de DDB Health Barcelona irán destinados a la investigación del Hospital Sant Joan de Déu para hacer de 2021 un año mucho mejor y más seguro para todos. 

 

Sobre DDB Health Barcelona

Somos DDB Health Barcelona, una agencia global, joven y fresca especializada en health care y wellness que rompe con las reglas de comunicación en ambos sectores.

Formamos parte de la red global de DDB Health, presente en 6 países. En Barcelona contamos con un equipo multidisciplinar científico, creativo, estratega y de espíritu rebelde, con el que afrontamos los briefings con originalidad, buscando la diferencia en cada proyecto en el que nos involucramos. Siempre focalizados en resultados.

Tenemos la experiencia y los conocimientos para afrontar cualquier reto, incluso los que parecen imposibles de solucionar. Tenemos la actitud necesaria para atrevernos a todo. Pero sobre todo, estamos aquí para demostrar que con creatividad y estrategia podemos conseguir un mundo más sano, en el que el bienestar y la salud es nuestra prioridad.
story_txt:
Sobre el proyecto
#ReseteAss nace con la intención de dar la bienvenida al 2021 con positivismo, ilusión y buen rollo. Está claro que el rojo no funcionó en 2020, por eso hemos apostado por romper con la tradición y jugarlo todo al verde. 
Esta NavidAss cambia la manera de dar la bienvenida al año nuevo con #ReseteAss, la ropa interior solidaria que dona todos sus beneficios a la investigación contra la COVID. 

 
¿Para qué es la financiación?
Todos los beneficios de la campaña de Navidad de DDB Health Barcelona irán destinados a la investigación del Hospital Sant Joan de Déu para hacer de 2021 un año mucho mejor y más seguro para todos. 
 
Sobre DDB Health Barcelona
Somos DDB Health Barcelona, una agencia global, joven y fresca especializada en health care y wellness que rompe con las reglas de comunicación en ambos sectores.
Formamos parte de la red global de DDB Health, presente en 6 países. En Barcelona contamos con un equipo multidisciplinar científico, creativo, estratega y de espíritu rebelde, con el que afrontamos los briefings con originalidad, buscando la diferencia en cada proyecto en el que nos involucramos. Siempre focalizados en resultados.
Tenemos la experiencia y los conocimientos para afrontar cualquier reto, incluso los que parecen imposibles de solucionar. Tenemos la actitud necesaria para atrevernos a todo. Pero sobre todo, estamos aquí para demostrar que con creatividad y estrategia podemos conseguir un mundo más sano, en el que el bienestar y la salud es nuestra prioridad.

story:
*** ANNULÉE - CANCELLED *** 

 

J’ai perdu une partie de mon âme. Mon bel Eldorado, mon amour, ma muse est parti.

Eldo était à l’origine du projet,  j’ai besoin de prendre un peu de recul… Je tiens toujours au projet d’un centre d’oxygénothérapie pour chiens, car d’autres chiens en auront besoin un jour… mais je me sens moins dans l’urgence, c’est pourquoi j’ai décidé d'annuler la campagne de financement et de rembourser tous les contributeurs.

I lost a part of my soul. My beautiful Eldorado, my love, my muse is gone.

Eldo was at the origine of the project, I need to take a step back for a while… I still want this canine hyperbaric center, because other dogs will need it in the future… but, I feel less urged, that is why I decided to cancel the crowdfunding and reimburse all contributors.

 

*** English follows ***

(please be indulgent for the English version, it is not my first language) 

Objectif

Offrir aux gens la possibilité de louer un caisson hyperbare portable pour aider leur chien à recouvrer la santé ou à améliorer leur condition grâce à l’oxygénothérapie hyperbare (OHB) à basse pression. 

Qu’est-ce que l’oxygénothérapie hyperbare à basse pression?

L’oxygénothérapie hyperbare à basse pression consiste à faire respirer de l’oxygène à une pression supérieure à la pression atmosphérique. L’oxygène sous pression pénètre plus facilement dans les liquides du corps et aide à régénérer les cellules de tous les tissus et organes.

L’animal, accompagné d’un humain, est installé dans un caisson étanche faiblement pressurisé à 1,3 ATA, ce qui équivaut à une plongée sous-marine à 4 mètres de profondeur. 

Quels sont les avantages de l’oxygénothérapie hyperbare à basse pression (1,3 ATA)?

De nombreux effets bénéfiques sont reconnus et documentés. L’OHB à basse pression active les cellules réparatrices ainsi que les mécanismes de réparation cellulaire. Elle stimule la revascularisation cellulaire et la cicatrisation des tissus et organes. Elle combat l’inflammation et favorise l’élimination des métaux lourds neurotoxiques. Des recherches scientifiques ont également démontré l’efficacité de l’OHB à basse pression dans le traitement de conditions neurologiques chroniques ou aiguës.

Voici quelques exemples de conditions qui peuvent être améliorées avec l’OHB :

  • Épilepsie, car l’OHB augmente la production de glutathion peroxydase et favorise l’oxygénation des vaisseaux sanguins du cerveau en plus d'avoir un effet anti-inflammatoire.
  • Maladie de Lyme, car l’OHB augmente l’efficacité de certains antibiotiques.
  • Fractures, brûlures et autres blessures, car l’OHB favorise une guérison plus rapide.
  • Pré et post opératoire, car l’OHB favorise la vascularisation.
  • Cancer, car les cellules cancéreuses n’aiment pas l’oxygène.

L’OHB aide également à diminuer les symptômes de la fatigue chronique et de la fibromyalgie (réduit la douleur et l’inflammation) chez l’humain.

Autres avantages de l’OHB :

  • Améliore les performances sportives
  • Augmente l'endurance
  • Aide à récupérer après un effort intense
  • Réduit l'acide lactique
  • Améliore la circulation sanguine
  • Augmente le métabolisme
  • Favorise l'élimination des toxines
  • Augmente l'énergie corporelle
  • Améliore la mémoire
  • Réduit l'anxiété et le stress
  • Favorise un sommeil profond
  • Améliore le tonus de la peau
  • Favorise la perte de poids

Pourquoi un centre hyperbare pour chiens?

Mon chien, Eldorado, est très malade et l’OHB peut aider à stabiliser sa condition et à l’améliorer également. Malheureusement, il n’existe actuellement aucun distributeur qui accepte de louer un caisson pour un animal. Au cours des 2 dernières années, j’ai côtoyé plusieurs spécialistes en médecine vétérinaire et en médecine alternative pour animaux qui m’ont confirmé que cette thérapie peut être bénéfique pour Eldorado ainsi qu'à un grand nombre d’animaux de compagnie et que je n’étais pas la seule à vouloir y avoir accès pour mon chien.

Le centre hyperbare canin fera partie d’un complexe canin déjà existant, le Studio Chez Helly. Il s’agit d'un centre d’entraînement et de santé canin axé sur le bien-être physique et mental du chien… et de son humain… Côté centre d’entraînement, le Studio offre des activités sportives qui aident le chien à se développer harmonieusement en plus de favoriser l’harmonie humain/chien. Côté centre de santé, le Studio organise déjà des séances de fitness canin avec du matériel spécialisé et il offre à la location en libre-service des matelas à champs électromagnétiques pulsés. La location de caissons hyperbares sera un bel ajout à l’offre existante.  

Où sera situé le Centre hyperbare pour chiens?

J'ai décidé d'implanter le Centre à Trois-Rivières afin de bénéficier d'un emplacement au centre du Québec. Cet espace accueillera le premier caisson qui servira pour les forfaits Découverte et Désensibiliser et pour la location à l'heure. Les autres caissons seront disponibles à la location à long terme et ils se promèneront partout au Québec... et même ailleurs!!! 

Qui suis-je

J’ai 57 ans, je suis traductrice agréée et je partage ma vie avec mon conjoint Alain, mes deux chiens, Eldorado, 9 ans, Helly, 4 ans et mon cheval, Malcolm 18 ans. Je suis active dans le domaine canin depuis plus de 30 ans et j’apprends encore tous les jours…

Mais ce n’est pas suffisant pour me décrire…

Je suis une passionnée… par les arts, les lettres, les relations humaines, la nature et par les animaux… tous les animaux, mais surtout les chiens… Bien que chevaux, chiens, chats, hamsters et cie ont toujours fait partie de ma vie, ce n’est qu’en 1988 que j’ai adopté mon premier chien à moi, Léo, un berger belge tervueren. Léo a été un compagnon extraordinaire! Toujours partant pour jouer, courir, s’entraîner, etc. Avec Léo, j’ai découvert l’amour inconditionnel et la relation privilégiée qu’on peut avoir avec un chien. Mais je sais aujourd’hui que j’ai fait d’énormes erreurs, et ce, bien malgré moi, toutefois l’important est de les reconnaitre et de ne pas les répéter… Léo était un bel ambassadeur de sa race et j’ai développé une passion pour le berger belge et les sports canins tout en m’interrogeant sur les principes fondamentaux du comportement canin… Léo a partagé une bonne partie de sa vie avec Lennie que j’ai adoptée à l’âge de 3 ans! Lennie avait une telle joie de vivre malgré un début de vie extrêmement difficile. Elle était l’exemple même de la résilience! Par la suite, ma douce Folie! est venue se joindre à eux. Léo et Lennie ont pris à coeur son éducation et ils en ont fait une chienne quasi parfaite qui a développé des aptitudes extraordinaires de « chien urbain »… Malgré les bons soins de santé conventionnels que je lui ai offerts, Folie! a développé de graves problèmes de mobilité, ce qui a sonné une petite cloche et mis en doute mes « croyances » en matière de santé et d’alimentation. Après avoir perdu Léo et Lennie d’une même pathologie à quelques années d’intervalle, j’ai présenté à Folie! un nouveau compagnon… Eldorado… mon bel Eldorado… s’ils ont tous fait en sorte, chacun à leur manière, que je remette régulièrement en question mes connaissances, c’est Eldorado qui m’a donné le courage de passer à l’action, c’est lui qui m’a appris à suivre mon instinct. J’ai changé toutes mes habitudes en matière de santé, d’alimentation et d’éducation et surtout, j’ai reconsidéré la notion de respect qui est au centre de la relation. Eldorado est un être extrêmement sensible et j’ai avec lui une connexion spéciale que j’ai découverte notamment au cours de son éducation et de son entraînement sportif, mais plus particulièrement par le biais de sa maladie. Eldorado m’a appris à écouter… à l’écouter et à m’écouter… En fait, il m’a appris à vivre… mais ça, c’est une longue histoire que je vous raconterai plus tard... Et puis, il y a Helly!!! mon joyeux troubadour, mon soleil, mon petit bonheur… qui met tellement d’humour et… d’action dans ma vie!!! En fait, Eldorado est mon professeur, mon mentor et Helly… mon laboratoire, mais il ne s’en plaint pas du tout!!! 

Grâce à eux, et je dis bien, GRÂCE à eux, j’ai mis de côté une carrière en traduction qui ne me correspondait plus pour me tourner vers ma passion, le comportement canin via les sports canins… un bel amalgame!!! Je suis des formations pour confirmer et compléter mes connaissances et je me sens comme un poisson dans l’eau… Mais il reste une ombre au tableau, la santé de mon bel Eldorado… C’est comme si je lui avais fait une promesse de faire tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour qu’il vive la vie qu’il mérite et de partager mes acquis pour que les autres chiens en profitent…

Ce dont j’ai besoin et ce que vous recevrez

Mon objectif est d’amasser 30 000$ pour acheter un caisson Oxynova de la série 9

Pourquoi Oxynova? 

Pour la qualité supérieure du produit. Oxynova est le premier fabricant de caissons souples au Québec et j’ai confiance en son produit. J’ai besoin d’un produit qui a fait ses preuves puisque le caisson sera utilisé de façon intensive… Je rédigerai un article dans la FAQ pour expliquer plus en détail les points forts des caissons Oxynova.

Pourquoi un caisson de la Série 9? Parce qu’il est plus grand (282 cm x 92 cm) et qu’il possède plus de hublots (8). Il est tout indiqué pour les premières expériences, autant pour l’humain (surtout ceux qui, comme moi, souffrent de claustrophobie) que pour le chien.

De quelle façon l’argent va-t-il être utilisé?

Pour l’achat d’un caisson uniquement. J’ai déjà des collaborateurs prêts à aménager une pièce dans le Studio afin de créer un espace intime et accueillant pour les besoins de l’OHB. 

Qu’est-ce que je ferai avec les fonds amassés si je n’atteins pas mon objectif

J’espère atteindre mon objectif rapidement, toutefois si je n’y arrive pas dans le délai que je me suis donné, je pourrai relancer la campagne et obtenir du crédit grâce à l’argent amassée. De toute façon, tout l'argent recueilli servira à l’achat d’un caisson hyperbare d’une façon ou d’une autre…

Qu’est-ce que je ferai de l’argent si je dépasse mon objectif?

Il sera investi dans le 2e volet de mon projet, soit l’achat d’un 2e caisson hyperbare qui servira aux locations à long terme pour les protocoles de 40 jours à la maison. 

De quelles façons vous pouvez contribuer?

En achetant des forfaits en prévente.

En achetant des billets de tirage.

En achetant les produits et services de mes généreux collaborateurs.

Vous pouvez partager cette campagne dans votre réseau pour aider à la faire connaître.

Vous pouvez communiquer avec moi pour devenir un « généreux collaborateur »

Ce que vous pouvez obtenir en contrepartie des contributions

Pour m’aider à financer ce projet, j’offre des forfaits en prévente à prix vraiment avantageux. De plus, grâce à de généreux collaborateurs, je peux offrir des produits et services en lien avec les animaux et la santé.

Chaque dollar investi est important pour moi, il n’y a pas de petits montants, il n’y a que des dollars qui s’accumulent et qui me rapprochent de mon objectif. Je serai reconnaissante peu importe le montant versé, car il m’aidera à atteindre mes 2 buts : soigner mon bel Eldorado et permettre à d’autres personnes d’en faire autant pour « l’être vivant » qui partage leur vie.

Je ne vous demande pas de me donner de l’argent (quoique vous pouvez le faire si cela vous plaît et j'en serais ravie!!!) je vous demande d’investir dans mon projet, dans un projet de santé et de bien-être pour les chiens…Donc, si vous êtes prêt à investir, j’ai quelque chose pour vous.

Risques et défis

Je suis entourée par des vétérinaires spécialisés en neurologie, en orthopédie et en médecine sportive, par des ostéopathes et chiropraticiens spécialisés pour les animaux, etc. J’ai accumulé beaucoup d'information en discutant avec eux et en faisant des recherches. Ainsi, je me suis rendue compte que l’OHB peut vraiment faire la différence dans la vie d’un grand nombre de chiens… et de leurs humains et certains sont même prêts à référer le Centre. Plusieurs me confirment que l’OHB peut faire la différence dans la vie d’un grand nombre de chiens… et de leurs humains et ils sont prêts à référer le Centre. Par contre, je sais également que l’OHB n’est pas à la porter de tous les budgets. Ainsi, la location des caissons hyperbares ne sera pas nécessairement rentable à court terme et c’est grâce à votre soutien que je pourrai rapidement offrir ce service à ceux qui en ont un urgent besoin, sans avoir trop d’attentes en terme de rentabilité. De plus, le fait que le Centre hyperbare pour chiens fait partie d’un ensemble, il sera supporté par les autres activités du Studio. D’ailleurs, dès que la rentabilité sera au rendez-vous, je prévois créer un fonds afin d’offrir à des familles à faible revenu, sélectionnées selon certains critères, des forfaits gratuits.

 

D’autres façons d’aider

PARTAGEZ et PARLEZ de ma campagne!!!

Vous pouvez m’aider également en organisant des activités (concours amical de sports canins, séances photos pour chiens, etc.) afin d'amasser des fonds.

 

Vous voulez plus d'information? Rendez-vous dans la FAQ

 

*** English version ***

 

Goal

Give people opportunity to rent a portable hyperbaric chamber to help their dog to recover their health or to improve their condition thanks to low pressure hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HOT)

What is low pressure HOT?

Low pressure HOT consist in breathing oxygen at a pressure higher than atmospheric one. Oxygen under pressure penetrate more easily in body fluids and help to regenerate tissues and organs.

Pet, accompanied by a human, is installed in a 1.3 ATA, low pressured sealed chamber, equivalent to 4 meters diving. 

What are the benefits of low pressure HOT (1.3 ATA)?

Many effects are recognized and documented. Low pressure HOT activates repair cells and cellular repair mechanisms. It stimulates cellular revascularization and promotes tissue and organ healing. It fights inflammation and help eliminate neurotoxic heavy metals. Scientific research has show the effectiveness of the low pressure HOT in treating chronic or acute neurological conditions 

Here are some examples of conditions that could be improved with HOT:

  • Epilepsy, because HOT increases glutathion peroxidase production and promote brain’s blood vessels oxygenation in addition to have an anti-inflammatory effect.
  • Lyme disease, because HOT increases the effectiveness of certain antibiotics.
  • Fractures, burns and others injuries, because HOT promotes faster healing.
  • Pre and post surgery, because HOT promotes vascularization.
  • Cancer, because cancer cells do not like oxygen.

HOT also helps to reduce symptoms of chronic fatigue and fibromyalgia (it reduces pain and inflammation) in humans.

Other benefit of HOT: 

  • Improves sport perform
  • Increases endurance
  • Helps to recover after intensive effort
  • Reduces lactic acid
  • Improves blood circulation
  • Increases the metabolism
  • Encourages toxin elimination
  • Increases body energy
  • Improves memory
  • Reduces anxiety and stress
  • Promotes deep sleep
  • Improves skin tone
  • Promotes weight loss

Why an hyperbaric centre for dogs?

My dog, Eldorado is very sick and the HOT can help to stabilize his condition and also improve Unfortunately, there is no distributor currently that agrees to rent an hyperbaric chamber for a pet. In the last two years, I met many specialists in veterinary medicine and in alternative medicine for animals who confirmed that this therapy would be beneficial for Eldorado and to a lot of pets and I am not the only one who wants to access to this for my dog.

The canine hyperbaric centre will be part of an existing canine complex, Studio Chez Helly. This is a dog training and wellness centre that focuses on physical and mental bell-being for dog… and his human… On the training side, the Studio provides sporting activities that help dog to develop harmoniously in addition to promote human/dog harmony. On the wellness centre, the Studio organize already provides canine fitness with specialized material and offers for self service hour rental pulsed electromagnetic field mattress. The rental of hyperbaric chamber will be a welcomed addition to the existing offer.

Where the Hyperbaric Center for Dogs will be located?

I decided to locate the Center in Trois-Rivières in order to have a central place in Quebec. This space will host the fist chamber that will serve for Discover and Desensitize packages and for hourly rentals. Other chambers will be available for long term renting at home and it will travel everywhere in Quebec... and elsewhere!!! 

Who am I?

I am 67 years old, I am a certified translator and I share my life with my partner Alain, my dogs, Eldorado 9 yo and Helly 4 yo and my horse Malcolm, 18 yo. I am active in the canine world since more than 30 years and I am still learning every day…

But, this is not enough to describe me…

I’m a passionate… of arts, letters, human relations, nature and animals… all the animals, but mostly by dogs… Although, horses, dogs, cats, hamster and others have always been part of my life, it is only in 1988 that I have adopted my first own dog, Léo, a Belgian shepherd Tervuren. Léo has been an extraordinary companion! Always willing for play, run, training, etc. With Léo, I discovered unconditional love and a privileged relationship that we can have with a dog. But, I know now that I made huge mistakes, however unintentionally, but the more important is to recognize them and try to not repeat them… Léo was a great ambassador of his breed and I developed a passion for the Belgian shepherd and dog sports while I wonder about core principles of dog behaviour… Léo has shared a part of his life with Lennie who I adopted at 3 years old. Lennie had such a joy of life despite an extremely difficult start in life. She was the true example of resilience! Thereafter, my sweet Folie! came to join them. Léo and Lennie have taken to heart her education and they have made an almost perfect dog who had developed extraordinary skills to be « urban dog »… Despite good conventional health care, Folie! had developed severe mobility issues, which rang a bell for me and questioning my « beliefs » about health and nutrition. After lose Léo and Lennie from the same pathology with a few years intervals, I introduced to Folie! a new companion… Eldorado… my beautiful Eldorado… If they all made me question, each in its own way, my knowledge, this is Eldorado who give me courage to act, this is him who taught me to follow my instinct. I changed all my health, feeding and education habits and, above all, I revisited the concept of respect that is at the heart of the relationship. Eldorado is an extremely sensitive being and I have a special link with him that I discovered during his education and sport training, but more particularly, through his illness. Eldorado taught me to listen… listen to him and listen to me… Actually, he taught me to live… but that, it is a long story that I will share later… And then, there is Helly!!! my happy buddy, my sun, my happiness… who adds so much humour and… action in my life!!! In fact, Eldorado is my teacher, my mentor and Helly… my laboratory, but he does not complain at all!!!

Thanks to them, and I reiterate, THANKS to them, I left out a career in translation that no longer suited me to turn me toward my passion, canine behaviour through dog sports… a nice combination!!! I follow training programs to confirm and complete my knowledges and I feel like a fish in water… But there remains one cloud on the horizon, my beautiful Eldorado’s health… It is like I made him a promise to do everything in my power to give him the life he deserves and to share my knowledge with others to the benefits of dogs…

What I need and what you get

My goal is to raise $30 000 to buy an Oxynova series 9 hyperbaric chamber

Why Oxynova? 

For the superior quality of the product. Oxynova is the first flexible hyperbaric chamber manufacturer in Quebec and I trust their products. I need a product that has proven its worth, because the chamber will be use intensively… I will write an article in the FAQ to more fully explain particular strengths of the Oxynova hyperbaric chambers.

Why Series 9? Because it is the largest (282 cm x 92 cm) and it has more portholes (8). It is particularly well suited for first experiences, for both, human (for those that, like me, suffer from claustrophobia) and dog.

How the money will be use?

To buy the hyperbaric chamber only. I already have people ready to convert one room in the Studio to create an intimate and welcoming space for HOT needs.

What is my backup plan?

I hope to reach my goal quickly, however if I cannot reach it within the deadline, I will continue to raise money and get credit tanks to money already collected. Anyway, all money raised will be used to buy the hyperbaric chamber in one way or another…

What I am going to do if I surpass my goal?

Money will be spent for the 2nd phase of my project, the purchase of the 2nd hyperbaric chamber that will be use for long-term rents for the 40 days protocols at home.

How you can contribute?

  • By purchasing pre-sale packages.
  • By purchasing drawing tickets.
  • By purchasing products and services from my generous collaborators.
  • You may share this campaign in your network to help spread the word.
  • You can contact me to become a « generous collaborator »

What you can get in exchange for your contribution.

To help me finance this project, I offer pre-sale packages at very advantageous prices. Also, thanks to generous collaborators, I can offer products and services in link with animals and health.

Each dollar invested is important for me, there is no little amount, there is just dollars that accumulate and that bring me closer to my goal. I will be grateful no matter the amount, because it will help me to reach my 2 goals : heal my beautiful Eldorado and allow other persons to do the same for their « living being » that shares their life.

I do not ask you to give me money (although you can make it if you want and I would be grateful), I ask you to invest in my project, in a health and wellness project for dogs… So, if you are ready to invest, I have something for you.

Risks and challenges 

I am surrounded by neurologic, orthopedic and sports medicine specialists veterinarians. I accumulated a lot of information by discussing with them and by doing research. Thus, I realized that HOT can make the difference in the life of many dog… and their humans and certain are ready to refer the Centre. However, I also know that this is not everyone that can afford it. The rental will not necessarily cost-effective in the short term and it is thanks to your support that I will be able to offer rapidly this service for those who are in urgent need, without too many expectations in terms of profitability. Furthermore, the fact that the hyperbaric centre for dogs is part of an existing centre, it will be support by the others activities of the Studio. Moreover, as soon as the profitability will be there, I intend to create a fund to provide free packages for low incomes families, selected on specific criteria.

Others ways you can help

SHARE and SPREAD THE WORD!!!

You also help by organizing activities (fun match, photo shoot for dogs, etc) to raise funds.

 

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

Eldo était à l’origine du projet,  j’ai besoin de prendre un peu de recul… Je tiens toujours au projet d’un centre d’oxygénothérapie pour chiens, car d’autres chiens en auront besoin un jour… mais je me sens moins dans l’urgence, c’est pourquoi j’ai décidé d'annuler la campagne de financement et de rembourser tous les contributeurs.

Elle stimule la revascularisation cellulaire et la cicatrisation des tissus et organes. Elle combat l’inflammation et favorise l’élimination des métaux lourds neurotoxiques. Des recherches scientifiques ont également démontré l’efficacité de l’OHB à basse pression dans le traitement de conditions neurologiques chroniques ou aiguës.
Voici quelques exemples de conditions qui peuvent être améliorées avec l’OHB :

Épilepsie, car l’OHB augmente la production de glutathion peroxydase et favorise l’oxygénation des vaisseaux sanguins du cerveau en plus d'avoir un effet anti-inflammatoire.
Maladie de Lyme, car l’OHB augmente l’efficacité de certains antibiotiques.
Fractures, brûlures et autres blessures, car l’OHB favorise une guérison plus rapide.
Pré et post opératoire, car l’OHB favorise la vascularisation.
Cancer, car les cellules cancéreuses n’aiment pas l’oxygène.

L’OHB aide également à diminuer les symptômes de la fatigue chronique et de la fibromyalgie (réduit la douleur et l’inflammation) chez l’humain.
Autres avantages de l’OHB :

Améliore les performances sportives
Augmente l'endurance
Aide à récupérer après un effort intense
Réduit l'acide lactique
Améliore la circulation sanguine
Augmente le métabolisme
Favorise l'élimination des toxines
Augmente l'énergie corporelle
Améliore la mémoire
Réduit l'anxiété et le stress
Favorise un sommeil profond
Améliore le tonus de la peau
Favorise la perte de poids

Pourquoi un centre hyperbare pour chiens?
Mon chien, Eldorado, est très malade et l’OHB peut aider à stabiliser sa condition et à l’améliorer également. Malheureusement, il n’existe actuellement aucun distributeur qui accepte de louer un caisson pour un animal. Au cours des 2 dernières années, j’ai côtoyé plusieurs spécialistes en médecine vétérinaire et en médecine alternative pour animaux qui m’ont confirmé que cette thérapie peut être bénéfique pour Eldorado ainsi qu'à un grand nombre d’animaux de compagnie et que je n’étais pas la seule à vouloir y avoir accès pour mon chien.
Le centre hyperbare canin fera partie d’un complexe canin déjà existant, le Studio Chez Helly. Il s’agit d'un centre d’entraînement et de santé canin axé sur le bien-être physique et mental du chien… et de son humain… Côté centre d’entraînement, le Studio offre des activités sportives qui aident le chien à se développer harmonieusement en plus de favoriser l’harmonie humain/chien. Côté centre de santé, le Studio organise déjà des séances de fitness canin avec du matériel spécialisé et il offre à la location en libre-service des matelas à champs électromagnétiques pulsés. La location de caissons hyperbares sera un bel ajout à l’offre existante.  
Où sera situé le Centre hyperbare pour chiens?
J'ai décidé d'implanter le Centre à Trois-Rivières afin de bénéficier d'un emplacement au centre du Québec. Cet espace accueillera le premier caisson qui servira pour les forfaits Découverte et Désensibiliser et pour la location à l'heure. Les autres caissons seront disponibles à la location à long terme et ils se promèneront partout au Québec... et même ailleurs!!! 
Qui suis-je
J’ai 57 ans, je suis traductrice agréée et je partage ma vie avec mon conjoint Alain, mes deux chiens, Eldorado, 9 ans, Helly, 4 ans et mon cheval, Malcolm 18 ans. Je suis active dans le domaine canin depuis plus de 30 ans et j’apprends encore tous les jours…
Mais ce n’est pas suffisant pour me décrire…
Je suis une passionnée… par les arts, les lettres, les relations humaines, la nature et par les animaux… tous les animaux, mais surtout les chiens… Bien que chevaux, chiens, chats, hamsters et cie ont toujours fait partie de ma vie, ce n’est qu’en 1988 que j’ai adopté mon premier chien à moi, Léo, un berger belge tervueren. Léo a été un compagnon extraordinaire! Toujours partant pour jouer, courir, s’entraîner, etc. Avec Léo, j’ai découvert l’amour inconditionnel et la relation privilégiée qu’on peut avoir avec un chien. Mais je sais aujourd’hui que j’ai fait d’énormes erreurs, et ce, bien malgré moi, toutefois l’important est de les reconnaitre et de ne pas les répéter… Léo était un bel ambassadeur de sa race et j’ai développé une passion pour le berger belge et les sports canins tout en m’interrogeant sur les principes fondamentaux du comportement canin… Léo a partagé une bonne partie de sa vie avec Lennie que j’ai adoptée à l’âge de 3 ans! Lennie avait une telle joie de vivre malgré un début de vie extrêmement difficile. Elle était l’exemple même de la résilience! Par la suite, ma douce Folie! est venue se joindre à eux. Léo et Lennie ont pris à coeur son éducation et ils en ont fait une chienne quasi parfaite qui a développé des aptitudes extraordinaires de « chien urbain »… Malgré les bons soins de santé conventionnels que je lui ai offerts, Folie! a développé de graves problèmes de mobilité, ce qui a sonné une petite cloche et mis en doute mes « croyances » en matière de santé et d’alimentation. Après avoir perdu Léo et Lennie d’une même pathologie à quelques années d’intervalle, j’ai présenté à Folie! un nouveau compagnon… Eldorado… mon bel Eldorado… s’ils ont tous fait en sorte, chacun à leur manière, que je remette régulièrement en question mes connaissances, c’est Eldorado qui m’a donné le courage de passer à l’action, c’est lui qui m’a appris à suivre mon instinct. J’ai changé toutes mes habitudes en matière de santé, d’alimentation et d’éducation et surtout, j’ai reconsidéré la notion de respect qui est au centre de la relation. Eldorado est un être extrêmement sensible et j’ai avec lui une connexion spéciale que j’ai découverte notamment au cours de son éducation et de son entraînement sportif, mais plus particulièrement par le biais de sa maladie. Eldorado m’a appris à écouter… à l’écouter et à m’écouter… En fait, il m’a appris à vivre… mais ça, c’est une longue histoire que je vous raconterai plus tard... Et puis, il y a Helly!!! mon joyeux troubadour, mon soleil, mon petit bonheur… qui met tellement d’humour et… d’action dans ma vie!!! En fait, Eldorado est mon professeur, mon mentor et Helly… mon laboratoire, mais il ne s’en plaint pas du tout!!! 
Grâce à eux, et je dis bien, GRÂCE à eux, j’ai mis de côté une carrière en traduction qui ne me correspondait plus pour me tourner vers ma passion, le comportement canin via les sports canins… un bel amalgame!!! Je suis des formations pour confirmer et compléter mes connaissances et je me sens comme un poisson dans l’eau… Mais il reste une ombre au tableau, la santé de mon bel Eldorado… C’est comme si je lui avais fait une promesse de faire tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour qu’il vive la vie qu’il mérite et de partager mes acquis pour que les autres chiens en profitent…
Ce dont j’ai besoin et ce que vous recevrez
Mon objectif est d’amasser 30 000$ pour acheter un caisson Oxynova de la série 9
Pourquoi Oxynova? 
Pour la qualité supérieure du produit. Oxynova est le premier fabricant de caissons souples au Québec et j’ai confiance en son produit. J’ai besoin d’un produit qui a fait ses preuves puisque le caisson sera utilisé de façon intensive… Je rédigerai un article dans la FAQ pour expliquer plus en détail les points forts des caissons Oxynova.
Pourquoi un caisson de la Série 9? Parce qu’il est plus grand (282 cm x 92 cm) et qu’il possède plus de hublots (8). Il est tout indiqué pour les premières expériences, autant pour l’humain (surtout ceux qui, comme moi, souffrent de claustrophobie) que pour le chien.
De quelle façon l’argent va-t-il être utilisé?
Pour l’achat d’un caisson uniquement. J’ai déjà des collaborateurs prêts à aménager une pièce dans le Studio afin de créer un espace intime et accueillant pour les besoins de l’OHB. 
Qu’est-ce que je ferai avec les fonds amassés si je n’atteins pas mon objectif
J’espère atteindre mon objectif rapidement, toutefois si je n’y arrive pas dans le délai que je me suis donné, je pourrai relancer la campagne et obtenir du crédit grâce à l’argent amassée. De toute façon, tout l'argent recueilli servira à l’achat d’un caisson hyperbare d’une façon ou d’une autre…
Qu’est-ce que je ferai de l’argent si je dépasse mon objectif?
Il sera investi dans le 2e volet de mon projet, soit l’achat d’un 2e caisson hyperbare qui servira aux locations à long terme pour les protocoles de 40 jours à la maison. 
De quelles façons vous pouvez contribuer?
En achetant des forfaits en prévente.
En achetant des billets de tirage.
En achetant les produits et services de mes généreux collaborateurs.
Vous pouvez partager cette campagne dans votre réseau pour aider à la faire connaître.
Vous pouvez communiquer avec moi pour devenir un « généreux collaborateur »
Ce que vous pouvez obtenir en contrepartie des contributions
Pour m’aider à financer ce projet, j’offre des forfaits en prévente à prix vraiment avantageux. De plus, grâce à de généreux collaborateurs, je peux offrir des produits et services en lien avec les animaux et la santé.
Chaque dollar investi est important pour moi, il n’y a pas de petits montants, il n’y a que des dollars qui s’accumulent et qui me rapprochent de mon objectif. Je serai reconnaissante peu importe le montant versé, car il m’aidera à atteindre mes 2 buts : soigner mon bel Eldorado et permettre à d’autres personnes d’en faire autant pour « l’être vivant » qui partage leur vie.
Je ne vous demande pas de me donner de l’argent (quoique vous pouvez le faire si cela vous plaît et j'en serais ravie!!!) je vous demande d’investir dans mon projet, dans un projet de santé et de bien-être pour les chiens…Donc, si vous êtes prêt à investir, j’ai quelque chose pour vous.
Risques et défis
Je suis entourée par des vétérinaires spécialisés en neurologie, en orthopédie et en médecine sportive, par des ostéopathes et chiropraticiens spécialisés pour les animaux, etc. J’ai accumulé beaucoup d'information en discutant avec eux et en faisant des recherches. Ainsi, je me suis rendue compte que l’OHB peut vraiment faire la différence dans la vie d’un grand nombre de chiens… et de leurs humains et certains sont même prêts à référer le Centre. Plusieurs me confirment que l’OHB peut faire la différence dans la vie d’un grand nombre de chiens… et de leurs humains et ils sont prêts à référer le Centre. Par contre, je sais également que l’OHB n’est pas à la porter de tous les budgets. Ainsi, la location des caissons hyperbares ne sera pas nécessairement rentable à court terme et c’est grâce à votre soutien que je pourrai rapidement offrir ce service à ceux qui en ont un urgent besoin, sans avoir trop d’attentes en terme de rentabilité. De plus, le fait que le Centre hyperbare pour chiens fait partie d’un ensemble, il sera supporté par les autres activités du Studio. D’ailleurs, dès que la rentabilité sera au rendez-vous, je prévois créer un fonds afin d’offrir à des familles à faible revenu, sélectionnées selon certains critères, des forfaits gratuits.
 
D’autres façons d’aider
PARTAGEZ et PARLEZ de ma campagne!!!
Vous pouvez m’aider également en organisant des activités (concours amical de sports canins, séances photos pour chiens, etc.) afin d'amasser des fonds.
 
Vous voulez plus d'information? Rendez-vous dans la FAQ
 
*** English version ***
 
Goal
Give people opportunity to rent a portable hyperbaric chamber to help their dog to recover their health or to improve their condition thanks to low pressure hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HOT)
What is low pressure HOT?
Low pressure HOT consist in breathing oxygen at a pressure higher than atmospheric one. Oxygen under pressure penetrate more easily in body fluids and help to regenerate tissues and organs.
Pet, accompanied by a human, is installed in a 1.3 ATA, low pressured sealed chamber, equivalent to 4 meters diving. 
What are the benefits of low pressure HOT (1.3 ATA)?
Many effects are recognized and documented. Low pressure HOT activates repair cells and cellular repair mechanisms. It stimulates cellular revascularization and promotes tissue and organ healing. It fights inflammation and help eliminate neurotoxic heavy metals. Scientific research has show the effectiveness of the low pressure HOT in treating chronic or acute neurological conditions 
Here are some examples of conditions that could be improved with HOT:

Epilepsy, because HOT increases glutathion peroxidase production and promote brain’s blood vessels oxygenation in addition to have an anti-inflammatory effect.
Lyme disease, because HOT increases the effectiveness of certain antibiotics.
Fractures, burns and others injuries, because HOT promotes faster healing.
Pre and post surgery, because HOT promotes vascularization.
Cancer, because cancer cells do not like oxygen.

HOT also helps to reduce symptoms of chronic fatigue and fibromyalgia (it reduces pain and inflammation) in humans.
Other benefit of HOT: 

Improves sport perform
Increases endurance
Helps to recover after intensive effort
Reduces lactic acid
Improves blood circulation
Increases the metabolism
Encourages toxin elimination
Increases body energy
Improves memory
Reduces anxiety and stress
Promotes deep sleep
Improves skin tone
Promotes weight loss

Why an hyperbaric centre for dogs?
My dog, Eldorado is very sick and the HOT can help to stabilize his condition and also improve Unfortunately, there is no distributor currently that agrees to rent an hyperbaric chamber for a pet. In the last two years, I met many specialists in veterinary medicine and in alternative medicine for animals who confirmed that this therapy would be beneficial for Eldorado and to a lot of pets and I am not the only one who wants to access to this for my dog.
The canine hyperbaric centre will be part of an existing canine complex, Studio Chez Helly. This is a dog training and wellness centre that focuses on physical and mental bell-being for dog… and his human… On the training side, the Studio provides sporting activities that help dog to develop harmoniously in addition to promote human/dog harmony. On the wellness centre, the Studio organize already provides canine fitness with specialized material and offers for self service hour rental pulsed electromagnetic field mattress. The rental of hyperbaric chamber will be a welcomed addition to the existing offer.
Where the Hyperbaric Center for Dogs will be located?
I decided to locate the Center in Trois-Rivières in order to have a central place in Quebec. This space will host the fist chamber that will serve for Discover and Desensitize packages and for hourly rentals. Other chambers will be available for long term renting at home and it will travel everywhere in Quebec... and elsewhere!!! 
Who am I?
I am 67 years old, I am a certified translator and I share my life with my partner Alain, my dogs, Eldorado 9 yo and Helly 4 yo and my horse Malcolm, 18 yo. I am active in the canine world since more than 30 years and I am still learning every day…
But, this is not enough to describe me…
I’m a passionate… of arts, letters, human relations, nature and animals… all the animals, but mostly by dogs… Although, horses, dogs, cats, hamster and others have always been part of my life, it is only in 1988 that I have adopted my first own dog, Léo, a Belgian shepherd Tervuren. Léo has been an extraordinary companion! Always willing for play, run, training, etc. With Léo, I discovered unconditional love and a privileged relationship that we can have with a dog. But, I know now that I made huge mistakes, however unintentionally, but the more important is to recognize them and try to not repeat them… Léo was a great ambassador of his breed and I developed a passion for the Belgian shepherd and dog sports while I wonder about core principles of dog behaviour… Léo has shared a part of his life with Lennie who I adopted at 3 years old. Lennie had such a joy of life despite an extremely difficult start in life. She was the true example of resilience! Thereafter, my sweet Folie! came to join them. Léo and Lennie have taken to heart her education and they have made an almost perfect dog who had developed extraordinary skills to be « urban dog »… Despite good conventional health care, Folie! had developed severe mobility issues, which rang a bell for me and questioning my « beliefs » about health and nutrition. After lose Léo and Lennie from the same pathology with a few years intervals, I introduced to Folie! a new companion… Eldorado… my beautiful Eldorado… If they all made me question, each in its own way, my knowledge, this is Eldorado who give me courage to act, this is him who taught me to follow my instinct. I changed all my health, feeding and education habits and, above all, I revisited the concept of respect that is at the heart of the relationship. Eldorado is an extremely sensitive being and I have a special link with him that I discovered during his education and sport training, but more particularly, through his illness. Eldorado taught me to listen… listen to him and listen to me… Actually, he taught me to live… but that, it is a long story that I will share later… And then, there is Helly!!! my happy buddy, my sun, my happiness… who adds so much humour and… action in my life!!! In fact, Eldorado is my teacher, my mentor and Helly… my laboratory, but he does not complain at all!!!
Thanks to them, and I reiterate, THANKS to them, I left out a career in translation that no longer suited me to turn me toward my passion, canine behaviour through dog sports… a nice combination!!! I follow training programs to confirm and complete my knowledges and I feel like a fish in water… But there remains one cloud on the horizon, my beautiful Eldorado’s health… It is like I made him a promise to do everything in my power to give him the life he deserves and to share my knowledge with others to the benefits of dogs…
What I need and what you get
My goal is to raise $30 000 to buy an Oxynova series 9 hyperbaric chamber
Why Oxynova? 
For the superior quality of the product. Oxynova is the first flexible hyperbaric chamber manufacturer in Quebec and I trust their products. I need a product that has proven its worth, because the chamber will be use intensively… I will write an article in the FAQ to more fully explain particular strengths of the Oxynova hyperbaric chambers.
Why Series 9? Because it is the largest (282 cm x 92 cm) and it has more portholes (8). It is particularly well suited for first experiences, for both, human (for those that, like me, suffer from claustrophobia) and dog.
How the money will be use?
To buy the hyperbaric chamber only. I already have people ready to convert one room in the Studio to create an intimate and welcoming space for HOT needs.
What is my backup plan?
I hope to reach my goal quickly, however if I cannot reach it within the deadline, I will continue to raise money and get credit tanks to money already collected. Anyway, all money raised will be used to buy the hyperbaric chamber in one way or another…
What I am going to do if I surpass my goal?
Money will be spent for the 2nd phase of my project, the purchase of the 2nd hyperbaric chamber that will be use for long-term rents for the 40 days protocols at home.
How you can contribute?

By purchasing pre-sale packages.
By purchasing drawing tickets.
By purchasing products and services from my generous collaborators.
You may share this campaign in your network to help spread the word.
You can contact me to become a « generous collaborator »

What you can get in exchange for your contribution.
To help me finance this project, I offer pre-sale packages at very advantageous prices. Also, thanks to generous collaborators, I can offer products and services in link with animals and health.
Each dollar invested is important for me, there is no little amount, there is just dollars that accumulate and that bring me closer to my goal. I will be grateful no matter the amount, because it will help me to reach my 2 goals : heal my beautiful Eldorado and allow other persons to do the same for their « living being » that shares their life.
I do not ask you to give me money (although you can make it if you want and I would be grateful), I ask you to invest in my project, in a health and wellness project for dogs… So, if you are ready to invest, I have something for you.
Risks and challenges 
I am surrounded by neurologic, orthopedic and sports medicine specialists veterinarians. I accumulated a lot of information by discussing with them and by doing research. Thus, I realized that HOT can make the difference in the life of many dog… and their humans and certain are ready to refer the Centre. However, I also know that this is not everyone that can afford it. The rental will not necessarily cost-effective in the short term and it is thanks to your support that I will be able to offer rapidly this service for those who are in urgent need, without too many expectations in terms of profitability. Furthermore, the fact that the hyperbaric centre for dogs is part of an existing centre, it will be support by the others activities of the Studio. Moreover, as soon as the profitability will be there, I intend to create a fund to provide free packages for low incomes families, selected on specific criteria.
Others ways you can help
SHARE and SPREAD THE WORD!!!
You also help by organizing activities (fun match, photo shoot for dogs, etc) to raise funds.
 
Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

story:
Hello, my name is Nathan Rands. Together with my wife Madeline, I have made this page in hopes that we can get the help we need. 

Whats the deal?

Well, my wife nd I are a young married couple, and we have been renting for over a year. The house we are renting is the perfect place for us to start a family, but unfortunately with us having trouble having children, we have been putting our money towards IVF (In vitro fertilisation), as we have had no luck so far. The house is for sale though, so that means tht someone could buy it as an investment and keep us as the tenants, or someone could buy it, have us leave, and live here for themselves... This will cause a great deal of stress, and we don't want this. We want to buy the house but we just don't have the deposit.

 

What we are looking for, is enough money for a deposit. We can pay off a mortgage, we just need that little boost to allow us to get it. We were told that unless we had at least $10,000, there probably isnt much of a chance of us getting the house. Recently we have had to purchase a new (secondhand) car, as my old car died. So our savings dropped yet again.

 

So yeah, a little bit of bad luck in our direction...

 

I dont know what I can offer, other than my thanks forever. If you have suggestions, please let me know if there is anything you would like specifically. My wife makes cakes as a living at a family owned cake shop called "Frangipanis Cakes" and I thought that she could make cakes, but I don't know the rules about sending cakes overseas etc.

 

Thankyou for reading our story, I appreciate your time!
